2875 if (u == STB__chunked) {
2876 stb__chunked *s = (stb__chunked *) context - 1;
2877 return stb__parent(s);
2878 } else {
2879 return (stb__alloc *) context - 1;
2880 }
2881 }
2882}
2883
2884static void stb__insert_alloc(stb__alloc *src, stb__alloc *s)
2885{
2886 s->prevn = &src->child;
2887 s->next = src->child;
2888 src->child = s+1;
2889 if (s->next)
2890 *stb__prevn(s->next) = &s->next;
2891}
2892
2893static void stb__insert_nochild(stb__alloc *src, stb__nochildren *s)
2894{
2895 s->prevn = &src->child;
2896 s->next = src->child;
2897 src->child = s+1;
2898 if (s->next)
2899 *stb__prevn(s->next) = &s->next;
2900}
2901
2902static void * malloc_base(void *context, size_t size, stb__alloc_type t, int align)
2903{
2904 void *p;
2905
2906 stb__alloc *src = stb__get_context(context);
2907
2908 if (align <= 0) {
2909 // compute worst-case C packed alignment
2910 // e.g. a 24-byte struct is 8-aligned
2911 int align_proposed = 1 << stb_lowbit8((unsigned int) size);
2912
2913 if (align_proposed < 0)
2914 align_proposed = 4;
2915
2916 if (align_proposed == 0) {
2917 if (size == 0)
2918 align_proposed = 1;
2919 else
2920 align_proposed = 256;
2921 }
2922
2923 // a negative alignment means 'don't align any larger
2924 // than this'; so -16 means we align 1,2,4,8, or 16
2925
2926 if (align < 0) {
2927 if (align_proposed > -align)
2928 align_proposed = -align;
2929 }
2930
2931 align = align_proposed;
2932 }
2933
2934 assert(stb_is_pow2(align));
2935
2936 // don't cause misalignment when allocating nochildren
2937 if (t == STB__nochildren && align > 8)
2938 t = STB__alloc;
2939
2940 switch (t) {
2941 case STB__alloc: {
2942 stb__alloc *s = (stb__alloc *) malloc(size + sizeof(*s));
2943 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
2944 p = s+1;
2945 s->child = NULL;
2946 stb__insert_alloc(src, s);
2947
2948 stb__setchunks(s,NULL);
2949 break;
2950 }
2951
2952 case STB__nochildren: {
2953 stb__nochildren *s = (stb__nochildren *) malloc(size + sizeof(*s));
2954 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
2955 p = s+1;
2956 stb__insert_nochild(src, s);
2957 break;
2958 }
2959
2960 case STB__chunk_raw: {
2961 p = stb__alloc_chunk(src, (int) size, align, 0);
2962 if (p == NULL) return NULL;
2963 break;
2964 }
2965
2966 case STB__chunked: {
2967 stb__chunked *s;
2968 if (align < sizeof(stb_uintptr)) align = sizeof(stb_uintptr);
2969 s = (stb__chunked *) stb__alloc_chunk(src, (int) size, align, sizeof(*s));
2970 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
2971 stb__setparent(s, src);
2972 p = s+1;
2973 break;
2974 }
2975
2976 default: p = NULL; assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */
2977 }
2978
2979 ++stb_alloc_count_alloc;
2980 return p;
2981}
2982
2983void *stb_malloc_global(size_t size)
2984{
2985 return malloc_base(NULL, size, STB__alloc, stb_alloc_alignment);
2986}
2987
2988void *stb_malloc(void *context, size_t size)
2989{
2990 return malloc_base(context, size, STB__alloc, stb_alloc_alignment);
2991}
2992
2993void *stb_malloc_nofree(void *context, size_t size)
2994{
2995 return malloc_base(context, size, STB__chunked, stb_alloc_alignment);
2996}
2997
2998void *stb_malloc_leaf(void *context, size_t size)
2999{
3000 return malloc_base(context, size, STB__nochildren, stb_alloc_alignment);
3001}
3002
3003void *stb_malloc_raw(void *context, size_t size)
3004{
3005 return malloc_base(context, size, STB__chunk_raw, stb_alloc_alignment);
3006}
3007
3008char *stb_malloc_string(void *context, size_t size)
3009{
3010 return (char *) malloc_base(context, size, STB__chunk_raw, 1);
3011}
3012
3013void *stb_realloc(void *ptr, size_t newsize)
3014{
3015 stb__alloc_type t;
3016
3017 if (ptr == NULL) return stb_malloc(NULL, newsize);
3018 if (newsize == 0) { stb_free(ptr); return NULL; }
3019
3020 t = stb__identify(ptr);
3021 assert(t == STB__alloc || t == STB__nochildren);
3022
3023 if (t == STB__alloc) {
3024 stb__alloc *s = (stb__alloc *) ptr - 1;
3025
3026 s = (stb__alloc *) realloc(s, newsize + sizeof(*s));
3027 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
3028
3029 ptr = s+1;
3030
3031 // update pointers
3032 (*s->prevn) = ptr;
3033 if (s->next)
3034 *stb__prevn(s->next) = &s->next;
3035
3036 if (s->child)
3037 *stb__prevn(s->child) = &s->child;
3038
3039 return ptr;
3040 } else {
3041 stb__nochildren *s = (stb__nochildren *) ptr - 1;
3042
3043 s = (stb__nochildren *) realloc(ptr, newsize + sizeof(s));
3044 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
3045
3046 // update pointers
3047 (*s->prevn) = s+1;
3048 if (s->next)
3049 *stb__prevn(s->next) = &s->next;
3050
3051 return s+1;
3052 }
3053}
3054
3055void *stb_realloc_c(void *context, void *ptr, size_t newsize)
3056{
3057 if (ptr == NULL) return stb_malloc(context, newsize);
3058 if (newsize == 0) { stb_free(ptr); return NULL; }
3059 // @TODO: verify you haven't changed contexts
3060 return stb_realloc(ptr, newsize);
3061}
3062
3063void stb_reassign(void *new_context, void *ptr)
3064{
3065 stb__alloc *src = stb__get_context(new_context);
3066
3067 stb__alloc_type t = stb__identify(ptr);
3068 assert(t == STB__alloc || t == STB__nochildren);
3069
3070 if (t == STB__alloc) {
3071 stb__alloc *s = (stb__alloc *) ptr - 1;
3072
3073 // unlink from old
3074 *(s->prevn) = s->next;
3075 if (s->next)
3076 *stb__prevn(s->next) = s->prevn;
3077
3078 stb__insert_alloc(src, s);
3079 } else {
3080 stb__nochildren *s = (stb__nochildren *) ptr - 1;
3081
3082 // unlink from old
3083 *(s->prevn) = s->next;
3084 if (s->next)
3085 *stb__prevn(s->next) = s->prevn;
3086
3087 stb__insert_nochild(src, s);
3088 }
3089}
3090
3091#endif
3092
3093
3095//
3096// stb_arr
3097//
3098// An stb_arr is directly useable as a pointer (use the actual type in your
3099// definition), but when it resizes, it returns a new pointer and you can't
3100// use the old one, so you have to be careful to copy-in-out as necessary.
3101//
3102// Use a NULL pointer as a 0-length array.
3103//
3104// float *my_array = NULL, *temp;
3105//
3106// // add elements on the end one at a time
3107// stb_arr_push(my_array, 0.0f);
3108// stb_arr_push(my_array, 1.0f);
3109// stb_arr_push(my_array, 2.0f);
3110//
3111// assert(my_array[1] == 2.0f);
3112//
3113// // add an uninitialized element at the end, then assign it
3114// *stb_arr_add(my_array) = 3.0f;
3115//
3116// // add three uninitialized elements at the end
3117// temp = stb_arr_addn(my_array,3);
3118// temp[0] = 4.0f;
3119// temp[1] = 5.0f;
3120// temp[2] = 6.0f;
3121//
3122// assert(my_array[5] == 5.0f);
3123//
3124// // remove the last one
3125// stb_arr_pop(my_array);
3126//
3127// assert(stb_arr_len(my_array) == 6);
3128
3129
3130#ifdef STB_MALLOC_WRAPPER
3131 #define STB__PARAMS , char *file, int line
3132 #define STB__ARGS , file, line
3133#else
3134 #define STB__PARAMS
3135 #define STB__ARGS
3136#endif
3137
3138// calling this function allocates an empty stb_arr attached to p
3139// (whereas NULL isn't attached to anything)
3140STB_EXTERN void stb_arr_malloc(void **target, void *context);
3141
3142// call this function with a non-NULL value to have all successive
3143// stbs that are created be attached to the associated parent. Note
3144// that once a given stb_arr is non-empty, it stays attached to its
3145// current parent, even if you call this function again.
3146// it turns the previous value, so you can restore it
3147STB_EXTERN void* stb_arr_malloc_parent(void *p);
3148
3149// simple functions written on top of other functions
3150#define stb_arr_empty(a) ( stb_arr_len(a) == 0 )
3151#define stb_arr_add(a) ( stb_arr_addn((a),1) )
3152#define stb_arr_push(a,v) ( *stb_arr_add(a)=(v) )
3153
3154typedef struct
3155{
3156 int len, limit;
3157 int stb_malloc;
3158 unsigned int signature;
3159} stb__arr;
3160
3161#define stb_arr_signature 0x51bada7b // ends with 0123 in decimal
3162
3163// access the header block stored before the data
3164#define stb_arrhead(a) /*lint --e(826)*/ (((stb__arr *) (a)) - 1)
3165#define stb_arrhead2(a) /*lint --e(826)*/ (((stb__arr *) (a)) - 1)
3166
3167#ifdef STB_DEBUG
3168#define stb_arr_check(a) assert(!a || stb_arrhead(a)->signature == stb_arr_signature)
3169#define stb_arr_check2(a) assert(!a || stb_arrhead2(a)->signature == stb_arr_signature)
3170#else
3171#define stb_arr_check(a) ((void) 0)
3172#define stb_arr_check2(a) ((void) 0)
3173#endif
3174
3175// ARRAY LENGTH
3176
3177// get the array length; special case if pointer is NULL
3178#define stb_arr_len(a) (a ? stb_arrhead(a)->len : 0)
3179#define stb_arr_len2(a) ((stb__arr *) (a) ? stb_arrhead2(a)->len : 0)
3180#define stb_arr_lastn(a) (stb_arr_len(a)-1)
3181
3182// check whether a given index is valid -- tests 0 <= i < stb_arr_len(a)
3183#define stb_arr_valid(a,i) (a ? (int) (i) < stb_arrhead(a)->len : 0)
3184
3185// change the array length so is is exactly N entries long, creating
3186// uninitialized entries as needed
3187#define stb_arr_setlen(a,n) \
3188 (stb__arr_setlen((void **) &(a), sizeof(a[0]), (n)))
3189
3190// change the array length so that N is a valid index (that is, so
3191// it is at least N entries long), creating uninitialized entries as needed
3192#define stb_arr_makevalid(a,n) \
3193 (stb_arr_len(a) < (n)+1 ? stb_arr_setlen(a,(n)+1),(a) : (a))
3194
3195// remove the last element of the array, returning it
3196#define stb_arr_pop(a) ((stb_arr_check(a), (a))[--stb_arrhead(a)->len])
3197
3198// access the last element in the array
3199#define stb_arr_last(a) ((stb_arr_check(a), (a))[stb_arr_len(a)-1])
3200
3201// is iterator at end of list?
3202#define stb_arr_end(a,i) ((i) >= &(a)[stb_arr_len(a)])
3203
3204// (internal) change the allocated length of the array
3205#define stb_arr__grow(a,n) (stb_arr_check(a), stb_arrhead(a)->len += (n))
3206
3207// add N new uninitialized elements to the end of the array
3208#define stb_arr__addn(a,n) /*lint --e(826)*/ \
3209 ((stb_arr_len(a)+(n) > stb_arrcurmax(a)) \
3210 ? (stb__arr_addlen((void **) &(a),sizeof(*a),(n)),0) \
3211 : ((stb_arr__grow(a,n), 0)))
3212
3213// add N new uninitialized elements to the end of the array, and return
3214// a pointer to the first new one
3215#define stb_arr_addn(a,n) (stb_arr__addn((a),n),(a)+stb_arr_len(a)-(n))
3216
3217// add N new uninitialized elements starting at index 'i'
3218#define stb_arr_insertn(a,i,n) (stb__arr_insertn((void **) &(a), sizeof(*a), (i), (n)))
3219
3220// insert an element at i
3221#define stb_arr_insert(a,i,v) (stb__arr_insertn((void **) &(a), sizeof(*a), (i), (1)), ((a)[i] = v))
3222
3223// delete N elements from the middle starting at index 'i'
3224#define stb_arr_deleten(a,i,n) (stb__arr_deleten((void **) &(a), sizeof(*a), (i), (n)))
3225
3226// delete the i'th element
3227#define stb_arr_delete(a,i) stb_arr_deleten(a,i,1)
3228
3229// delete the i'th element, swapping down from the end
3230#define stb_arr_fastdelete(a,i) \
3231 (stb_swap(&a[i], &a[stb_arrhead(a)->len-1], sizeof(*a)), stb_arr_pop(a))
3232
3233
3234// ARRAY STORAGE
3235
3236// get the array maximum storage; special case if NULL
3237#define stb_arrcurmax(a) (a ? stb_arrhead(a)->limit : 0)
3238#define stb_arrcurmax2(a) (a ? stb_arrhead2(a)->limit : 0)
3239
3240// set the maxlength of the array to n in anticipation of further growth
3241#define stb_arr_setsize(a,n) (stb_arr_check(a), stb__arr_setsize((void **) &(a),sizeof((a)[0]),n))
3242
3243// make sure maxlength is large enough for at least N new allocations
3244#define stb_arr_atleast(a,n) (stb_arr_len(a)+(n) > stb_arrcurmax(a) \
3245 ? stb_arr_setsize((a), (n)) : 0)
3246
3247// make a copy of a given array (copies contents via 'memcpy'!)
3248#define stb_arr_copy(a) stb__arr_copy(a, sizeof((a)[0]))
3249
3250// compute the storage needed to store all the elements of the array
3251#define stb_arr_storage(a) (stb_arr_len(a) * sizeof((a)[0]))
3252
3253#define stb_arr_for(v,arr) for((v)=(arr); (v) < (arr)+stb_arr_len(arr); ++(v))
3254
3255// IMPLEMENTATION
3256
3257STB_EXTERN void stb_arr_free_(void **p);
3258STB_EXTERN void *stb__arr_copy_(void *p, int elem_size);
3259STB_EXTERN void stb__arr_setsize_(void **p, int size, int limit STB__PARAMS);
3260STB_EXTERN void stb__arr_setlen_(void **p, int size, int newlen STB__PARAMS);
3261STB_EXTERN void stb__arr_addlen_(void **p, int size, int addlen STB__PARAMS);
3262STB_EXTERN void stb__arr_deleten_(void **p, int size, int loc, int n STB__PARAMS);
3263STB_EXTERN void stb__arr_insertn_(void **p, int size, int loc, int n STB__PARAMS);
3264
3265#define stb_arr_free(p) stb_arr_free_((void **) &(p))
3266#define stb__arr_copy stb__arr_copy_
3267
3268#ifndef STB_MALLOC_WRAPPER
3269 #define stb__arr_setsize stb__arr_setsize_
3270 #define stb__arr_setlen stb__arr_setlen_
3271 #define stb__arr_addlen stb__arr_addlen_
3272 #define stb__arr_deleten stb__arr_deleten_
3273 #define stb__arr_insertn stb__arr_insertn_
3274#else
3275 #define stb__arr_addlen(p,s,n) stb__arr_addlen_(p,s,n,__FILE__,__LINE__)
3276 #define stb__arr_setlen(p,s,n) stb__arr_setlen_(p,s,n,__FILE__,__LINE__)
3277 #define stb__arr_setsize(p,s,n) stb__arr_setsize_(p,s,n,__FILE__,__LINE__)
3278 #define stb__arr_deleten(p,s,i,n) stb__arr_deleten_(p,s,i,n,__FILE__,__LINE__)
3279 #define stb__arr_insertn(p,s,i,n) stb__arr_insertn_(p,s,i,n,__FILE__,__LINE__)
3280#endif
3281
3282#ifdef STB_DEFINE
3283static void *stb__arr_context;
3284
3285void *stb_arr_malloc_parent(void *p)
3286{
3287 void *q = stb__arr_context;
3288 stb__arr_context = p;
3289 return q;
3290}
3291
3292void stb_arr_malloc(void **target, void *context)
3293{
3294 stb__arr *q = (stb__arr *) stb_malloc(context, sizeof(*q));
3295 q->len = q->limit = 0;
3296 q->stb_malloc = 1;
3297 q->signature = stb_arr_signature;
3298 *target = (void *) (q+1);
3299}
3300
3301static void * stb__arr_malloc(int size)
3302{
3303 if (stb__arr_context)
3304 return stb_malloc(stb__arr_context, size);
3305 return malloc(size);
3306}
3307
3308void * stb__arr_copy_(void *p, int elem_size)
3309{
3310 stb__arr *q;
3311 if (p == NULL) return p;
3312 q = (stb__arr *) stb__arr_malloc(sizeof(*q) + elem_size * stb_arrhead2(p)->limit);
3313 stb_arr_check2(p);
3314 memcpy(q, stb_arrhead2(p), sizeof(*q) + elem_size * stb_arrhead2(p)->len);
3315 q->stb_malloc = !!stb__arr_context;
3316 return q+1;
3317}
3318
3319void stb_arr_free_(void **pp)
3320{
3321 void *p = *pp;
3322 stb_arr_check2(p);
3323 if (p) {
3324 stb__arr *q = stb_arrhead2(p);
3325 if (q->stb_malloc)
3326 stb_free(q);
3327 else
3328 free(q);
3329 }
3330 *pp = NULL;
3331}
3332
3333static void stb__arrsize_(void **pp, int size, int limit, int len STB__PARAMS)
3334{
3335 void *p = *pp;
3336 stb__arr *a;
3337 stb_arr_check2(p);
3338 if (p == NULL) {
3339 if (len == 0 && size == 0) return;
3340 a = (stb__arr *) stb__arr_malloc(sizeof(*a) + size*limit);
3341 a->limit = limit;
3342 a->len = len;
3343 a->stb_malloc = !!stb__arr_context;
3344 a->signature = stb_arr_signature;
3345 } else {
3346 a = stb_arrhead2(p);
3347 a->len = len;
3348 if (a->limit < limit) {
3349 void *p;
3350 if (a->limit >= 4 && limit < a->limit * 2)
3351 limit = a->limit * 2;
3352 if (a->stb_malloc)
3353 p = stb_realloc(a, sizeof(*a) + limit*size);
3354 else
3355 #ifdef STB_MALLOC_WRAPPER
3356 p = stb__realloc(a, sizeof(*a) + limit*size, file, line);
3357 #else
3358 p = realloc(a, sizeof(*a) + limit*size);
3359 #endif
3360 if (p) {
3361 a = (stb__arr *) p;
3362 a->limit = limit;
3363 } else {
3364 // throw an error!
3365 }
3366 }
3367 }
3368 a->len = stb_min(a->len, a->limit);
3369 *pp = a+1;
3370}
3371
3372void stb__arr_setsize_(void **pp, int size, int limit STB__PARAMS)
3373{
3374 void *p = *pp;
3375 stb_arr_check2(p);
3376 stb__arrsize_(pp, size, limit, stb_arr_len2(p) STB__ARGS);
3377}
3378
3379void stb__arr_setlen_(void **pp, int size, int newlen STB__PARAMS)
3380{
3381 void *p = *pp;
3382 stb_arr_check2(p);
3383 if (stb_arrcurmax2(p) < newlen || p == NULL) {
3384 stb__arrsize_(pp, size, newlen, newlen STB__ARGS);
3385 } else {
3386 stb_arrhead2(p)->len = newlen;
3387 }
3388}
3389
3390void stb__arr_addlen_(void **p, int size, int addlen STB__PARAMS)
3391{
3392 stb__arr_setlen_(p, size, stb_arr_len2(*p) + addlen STB__ARGS);
3393}
3394
3395void stb__arr_insertn_(void **pp, int size, int i, int n STB__PARAMS)
3396{
3397 void *p = *pp;
3398 if (n) {
3399 int z;
3400
3401 if (p == NULL) {
3402 stb__arr_addlen_(pp, size, n STB__ARGS);
3403 return;
3404 }
3405
3406 z = stb_arr_len2(p);
3407 stb__arr_addlen_(&p, size, n STB__ARGS);
3408 memmove((char *) p + (i+n)*size, (char *) p + i*size, size * (z-i));
3409 }
3410 *pp = p;
3411}
3412
3413void stb__arr_deleten_(void **pp, int size, int i, int n STB__PARAMS)
3414{
3415 void *p = *pp;
3416 if (n) {
3417 memmove((char *) p + i*size, (char *) p + (i+n)*size, size * (stb_arr_len2(p)-(i+n)));
3418 stb_arrhead2(p)->len -= n;
3419 }
3420 *pp = p;
3421}
3422
3423#endif
3424
3426//
3427// Hashing
3428//
3429// typical use for this is to make a power-of-two hash table.
3430//
3431// let N = size of table (2^n)
3432// let H = stb_hash(str)
3433// let S = stb_rehash(H) | 1
3434//
3435// then hash probe sequence P(i) for i=0..N-1
3436// P(i) = (H + S*i) & (N-1)
3437//
3438// the idea is that H has 32 bits of hash information, but the
3439// table has only, say, 2^20 entries so only uses 20 of the bits.
3440// then by rehashing the original H we get 2^12 different probe
3441// sequences for a given initial probe location. (So it's optimal
3442// for 64K tables and its optimality decreases past that.)
3443//
3444// ok, so I've added something that generates _two separate_
3445// 32-bit hashes simultaneously which should scale better to
3446// very large tables.
3447
3448
3449STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hash(char *str);
3450STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hashptr(void *p);
3451STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hashlen(char *str, int len);
3452STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_rehash_improved(unsigned int v);
3453STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hash_fast(void *p, int len);
3454STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hash2(char *str, unsigned int *hash2_ptr);
3455STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_hash_number(unsigned int hash);
3456
3457#define stb_rehash(x) ((x) + ((x) >> 6) + ((x) >> 19))
3458
3459#ifdef STB_DEFINE
3460unsigned int stb_hash(char *str)
3461{
3462 unsigned int hash = 0;
3463 while (*str)
3464 hash = (hash << 7) + (hash >> 25) + *str++;
3465 return hash + (hash >> 16);
3466}
3467
3468unsigned int stb_hashlen(char *str, int len)
3469{
3470 unsigned int hash = 0;
3471 while (len-- > 0 && *str)
3472 hash = (hash << 7) + (hash >> 25) + *str++;
3473 return hash + (hash >> 16);
3474}
3475
3476unsigned int stb_hashptr(void *p)
3477{
3478 unsigned int x = (unsigned int)(size_t) p;
3479
3480 // typically lacking in low bits and high bits
3481 x = stb_rehash(x);
3482 x += x << 16;
3483
3484 // pearson's shuffle
3485 x ^= x << 3;
3486 x += x >> 5;
3487 x ^= x << 2;
3488 x += x >> 15;
3489 x ^= x << 10;
3490 return stb_rehash(x);
3491}
3492
3493unsigned int stb_rehash_improved(unsigned int v)
3494{
3495 return stb_hashptr((void *)(size_t) v);
3496}
3497
3498unsigned int stb_hash2(char *str, unsigned int *hash2_ptr)
3499{
3500 unsigned int hash1 = 0x3141592c;
3501 unsigned int hash2 = 0x77f044ed;
3502 while (*str) {
3503 hash1 = (hash1 << 7) + (hash1 >> 25) + *str;
3504 hash2 = (hash2 << 11) + (hash2 >> 21) + *str;
3505 ++str;
3506 }
3507 *hash2_ptr = hash2 + (hash1 >> 16);
3508 return hash1 + (hash2 >> 16);
3509}
3510
3511// Paul Hsieh hash
3512#define stb__get16(p) ((p)[0] | ((p)[1] << 8))
3513
3514unsigned int stb_hash_fast(void *p, int len)
3515{
3516 unsigned char *q = (unsigned char *) p;
3517 unsigned int hash = len;
3518
3519 if (len <= 0 || q == NULL) return 0;
3520
3521 /* Main loop */
3522 for (;len > 3; len -= 4) {
3523 unsigned int val;
3524 hash += stb__get16(q);
3525 val = (stb__get16(q+2) << 11);
3526 hash = (hash << 16) ^ hash ^ val;
3527 q += 4;
3528 hash += hash >> 11;
3529 }
3530
3531 /* Handle end cases */
3532 switch (len) {
3533 case 3: hash += stb__get16(q);
3534 hash ^= hash << 16;
3535 hash ^= q[2] << 18;
3536 hash += hash >> 11;
3537 break;
3538 case 2: hash += stb__get16(q);
3539 hash ^= hash << 11;
3540 hash += hash >> 17;
3541 break;
3542 case 1: hash += q[0];
3543 hash ^= hash << 10;
3544 hash += hash >> 1;
3545 break;
3546 case 0: break;
3547 }
3548
3549 /* Force "avalanching" of final 127 bits */
3550 hash ^= hash << 3;
3551 hash += hash >> 5;
3552 hash ^= hash << 4;
3553 hash += hash >> 17;
3554 hash ^= hash << 25;
3555 hash += hash >> 6;
3556
3557 return hash;
3558}
3559
3560unsigned int stb_hash_number(unsigned int hash)
3561{
3562 hash ^= hash << 3;
3563 hash += hash >> 5;
3564 hash ^= hash << 4;
3565 hash += hash >> 17;
3566 hash ^= hash << 25;
3567 hash += hash >> 6;
3568 return hash;
3569}
3570
3571#endif
3572
3573#ifdef STB_PERFECT_HASH
3575//
3576// Perfect hashing for ints/pointers
3577//
3578// This is mainly useful for making faster pointer-indexed tables
3579// that don't change frequently. E.g. for stb_ischar().
3580//
3581
3582typedef struct
3583{
3584 stb_uint32 addend;
3585 stb_uint multiplicand;
3586 stb_uint b_mask;
3587 stb_uint8 small_bmap[16];
3588 stb_uint16 *large_bmap;
3589
3590 stb_uint table_mask;
3591 stb_uint32 *table;
3592} stb_perfect;
3593
3594STB_EXTERN int stb_perfect_create(stb_perfect *,unsigned int*,int n);
3595STB_EXTERN void stb_perfect_destroy(stb_perfect *);
3596STB_EXTERN int stb_perfect_hash(stb_perfect *, unsigned int x);
3597extern int stb_perfect_hash_max_failures;
3598
3599#ifdef STB_DEFINE
3600
3601int stb_perfect_hash_max_failures;
3602
3603int stb_perfect_hash(stb_perfect *p, unsigned int x)
3604{
3605 stb_uint m = x * p->multiplicand;
3606 stb_uint y = x >> 16;
3607 stb_uint bv = (m >> 24) + y;
3608 stb_uint av = (m + y) >> 12;
3609 if (p->table == NULL) return -1; // uninitialized table fails
3610 bv &= p->b_mask;
3611 av &= p->table_mask;
3612 if (p->large_bmap)
3613 av ^= p->large_bmap[bv];
3614 else
3615 av ^= p->small_bmap[bv];
3616 return p->table[av] == x ? av : -1;
3617}
3618
3619static void stb__perfect_prehash(stb_perfect *p, stb_uint x, stb_uint16 *a, stb_uint16 *b)
3620{
3621 stb_uint m = x * p->multiplicand;
3622 stb_uint y = x >> 16;
3623 stb_uint bv = (m >> 24) + y;
3624 stb_uint av = (m + y) >> 12;
3625 bv &= p->b_mask;
3626 av &= p->table_mask;
3627 *b = bv;
3628 *a = av;
3629}
3630
3631static unsigned long stb__perfect_rand(void)
3632{
3633 static unsigned long stb__rand;
3634 stb__rand = stb__rand * 2147001325 + 715136305;
3635 return 0x31415926 ^ ((stb__rand >> 16) + (stb__rand << 16));
3636}
3637
3638typedef struct {
3639 unsigned short count;
3640 unsigned short b;
3641 unsigned short map;
3642 unsigned short *entries;
3643} stb__slot;
3644
3645static int stb__slot_compare(const void *p, const void *q)
3646{
3647 stb__slot *a = (stb__slot *) p;
3648 stb__slot *b = (stb__slot *) q;
3649 return a->count > b->count ? -1 : a->count < b->count; // sort large to small
3650}
3651
3652int stb_perfect_create(stb_perfect *p, unsigned int *v, int n)
3653{
3654 unsigned int buffer1[64], buffer2[64], buffer3[64], buffer4[64], buffer5[32];
3655 unsigned short *as = (unsigned short *) stb_temp(buffer1, sizeof(*v)*n);
3656 unsigned short *bs = (unsigned short *) stb_temp(buffer2, sizeof(*v)*n);
3657 unsigned short *entries = (unsigned short *) stb_temp(buffer4, sizeof(*entries) * n);
3658 int size = 1 << stb_log2_ceil(n), bsize=8;
3659 int failure = 0,i,j,k;
3660
3661 assert(n <= 32768);
3662 p->large_bmap = NULL;
3663
3664 for(;;) {
3665 stb__slot *bcount = (stb__slot *) stb_temp(buffer3, sizeof(*bcount) * bsize);
3666 unsigned short *bloc = (unsigned short *) stb_temp(buffer5, sizeof(*bloc) * bsize);
3667 unsigned short *e;
3668 int bad=0;
3669
3670 p->addend = stb__perfect_rand();
3671 p->multiplicand = stb__perfect_rand() | 1;
3672 p->table_mask = size-1;
3673 p->b_mask = bsize-1;
3674 p->table = (stb_uint32 *) malloc(size * sizeof(*p->table));
3675
3676 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i) {
3677 bcount[i].b = i;
3678 bcount[i].count = 0;
3679 bcount[i].map = 0;
3680 }
3681 for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
3682 stb__perfect_prehash(p, v[i], as+i, bs+i);
3683 ++bcount[bs[i]].count;
3684 }
3685 qsort(bcount, bsize, sizeof(*bcount), stb__slot_compare);
3686 e = entries; // now setup up their entries index
3687 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i) {
3688 bcount[i].entries = e;
3689 e += bcount[i].count;
3690 bcount[i].count = 0;
3691 bloc[bcount[i].b] = i;
3692 }
3693 // now fill them out
3694 for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
3695 int b = bs[i];
3696 int w = bloc[b];
3697 bcount[w].entries[bcount[w].count++] = i;
3698 }
3699 stb_tempfree(buffer5,bloc);
3700 // verify
3701 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i)
3702 for (j=0; j < bcount[i].count; ++j)
3703 assert(bs[bcount[i].entries[j]] == bcount[i].b);
3704 memset(p->table, 0, size*sizeof(*p->table));
3705
3706 // check if any b has duplicate a
3707 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i) {
3708 if (bcount[i].count > 1) {
3709 for (j=0; j < bcount[i].count; ++j) {
3710 if (p->table[as[bcount[i].entries[j]]])
3711 bad = 1;
3712 p->table[as[bcount[i].entries[j]]] = 1;
3713 }
3714 for (j=0; j < bcount[i].count; ++j) {
3715 p->table[as[bcount[i].entries[j]]] = 0;
3716 }
3717 if (bad) break;
3718 }
3719 }
3720
3721 if (!bad) {
3722 // go through the bs and populate the table, first fit
3723 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i) {
3724 if (bcount[i].count) {
3725 // go through the candidate table[b] values
3726 for (j=0; j < size; ++j) {
3727 // go through the a values and see if they fit
3728 for (k=0; k < bcount[i].count; ++k) {
3729 int a = as[bcount[i].entries[k]];
3730 if (p->table[(a^j)&p->table_mask]) {
3731 break; // fails
3732 }
3733 }
3734 // if succeeded, accept
3735 if (k == bcount[i].count) {
3736 bcount[i].map = j;
3737 for (k=0; k < bcount[i].count; ++k) {
3738 int a = as[bcount[i].entries[k]];
3739 p->table[(a^j)&p->table_mask] = 1;
3740 }
3741 break;
3742 }
3743 }
3744 if (j == size)
3745 break; // no match for i'th entry, so break out in failure
3746 }
3747 }
3748 if (i == bsize) {
3749 // success... fill out map
3750 if (bsize <= 16 && size <= 256) {
3751 p->large_bmap = NULL;
3752 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i)
3753 p->small_bmap[bcount[i].b] = (stb_uint8) bcount[i].map;
3754 } else {
3755 p->large_bmap = (unsigned short *) malloc(sizeof(*p->large_bmap) * bsize);
3756 for (i=0; i < bsize; ++i)
3757 p->large_bmap[bcount[i].b] = bcount[i].map;
3758 }
3759
3760 // initialize table to v[0], so empty slots will fail
3761 for (i=0; i < size; ++i)
3762 p->table[i] = v[0];
3763
3764 for (i=0; i < n; ++i)
3765 if (p->large_bmap)
3766 p->table[as[i] ^ p->large_bmap[bs[i]]] = v[i];
3767 else
3768 p->table[as[i] ^ p->small_bmap[bs[i]]] = v[i];
3769
3770 // and now validate that none of them collided
3771 for (i=0; i < n; ++i)
3772 assert(stb_perfect_hash(p, v[i]) >= 0);
3773
3774 stb_tempfree(buffer3, bcount);
3775 break;
3776 }
3777 }
3778 free(p->table);
3779 p->table = NULL;
3780 stb_tempfree(buffer3, bcount);
3781
3782 ++failure;
3783 if (failure >= 4 && bsize < size) bsize *= 2;
3784 if (failure >= 8 && (failure & 3) == 0 && size < 4*n) {
3785 size *= 2;
3786 bsize *= 2;
3787 }
3788 if (failure == 6) {
3789 // make sure the input data is unique, so we don't infinite loop
3790 unsigned int *data = (unsigned int *) stb_temp(buffer3, n * sizeof(*data));
3791 memcpy(data, v, sizeof(*data) * n);
3792 qsort(data, n, sizeof(*data), stb_intcmp(0));
3793 for (i=1; i < n; ++i) {
3794 if (data[i] == data[i-1])
3795 size = 0; // size is return value, so 0 it
3796 }
3797 stb_tempfree(buffer3, data);
3798 if (!size) break;
3799 }
3800 }
3801
3802 if (failure > stb_perfect_hash_max_failures)
3803 stb_perfect_hash_max_failures = failure;
3804
3805 stb_tempfree(buffer1, as);
3806 stb_tempfree(buffer2, bs);
3807 stb_tempfree(buffer4, entries);
3808
3809 return size;
3810}
3811
3812void stb_perfect_destroy(stb_perfect *p)
3813{
3814 if (p->large_bmap) free(p->large_bmap);
3815 if (p->table ) free(p->table);
3816 p->large_bmap = NULL;
3817 p->table = NULL;
3818 p->b_mask = 0;
3819 p->table_mask = 0;
3820}
3821#endif
3822
3824//
3825// Perfect hash clients
3826
3827STB_EXTERN int stb_ischar(char s, char *set);
3828
3829#ifdef STB_DEFINE
3830
3831int stb_ischar(char c, char *set)
3832{
3833 static unsigned char bit[8] = { 1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128 };
3834 static stb_perfect p;
3835 static unsigned char (*tables)[256];
3836 static char ** sets = NULL;
3837
3838 int z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) set);
3839 if (z < 0) {
3840 int i,k,n,j,f;
3841 // special code that means free all existing data
3842 if (set == NULL) {
3843 stb_arr_free(sets);
3844 free(tables);
3845 tables = NULL;
3846 stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
3847 return 0;
3848 }
3849 stb_arr_push(sets, set);
3850 stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
3851 n = stb_perfect_create(&p, (unsigned int *) (char **) sets, stb_arr_len(sets));
3852 assert(n != 0);
3853 k = (n+7) >> 3;
3854 tables = (unsigned char (*)[256]) realloc(tables, sizeof(*tables) * k);
3855 memset(tables, 0, sizeof(*tables) * k);
3856 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(sets); ++i) {
3857 k = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) sets[i]);
3858 assert(k >= 0);
3859 n = k >> 3;
3860 f = bit[k&7];
3861 for (j=0; !j || sets[i][j]; ++j) {
3862 tables[n][(unsigned char) sets[i][j]] |= f;
3863 }
3864 }
3865 z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) set);
3866 }
3867 return tables[z >> 3][(unsigned char) c] & bit[z & 7];
3868}
3869
3870#endif
3871#endif
3872
3874//
3875// Instantiated data structures
3876//
3877// This is an attempt to implement a templated data structure.
3878//
3879// Hash table: call stb_define_hash(TYPE,N,KEY,K1,K2,HASH,VALUE)
3880// TYPE -- will define a structure type containing the hash table
3881// N -- the name, will prefix functions named:
3882// N create
3883// N destroy
3884// N get
3885// N set, N add, N update,
3886// N remove
3887// KEY -- the type of the key. 'x == y' must be valid
3888// K1,K2 -- keys never used by the app, used as flags in the hashtable
3889// HASH -- a piece of code ending with 'return' that hashes key 'k'
3890// VALUE -- the type of the value. 'x = y' must be valid
3891//
3892// Note that stb_define_hash_base can be used to define more sophisticated
3893// hash tables, e.g. those that make copies of the key or use special
3894// comparisons (e.g. strcmp).
3895
3896#define STB_(prefix,name) stb__##prefix##name
3897#define STB__(prefix,name) prefix##name
3898#define STB__use(x) x
3899#define STB__skip(x)
3900
3901#define stb_declare_hash(PREFIX,TYPE,N,KEY,VALUE) \
3902 typedef struct stb__st_##TYPE TYPE;\
3903 PREFIX int STB__(N, init)(TYPE *h, int count);\
3904 PREFIX int STB__(N, memory_usage)(TYPE *h);\
3905 PREFIX TYPE * STB__(N, create)(void);\
3906 PREFIX TYPE * STB__(N, copy)(TYPE *h);\
3907 PREFIX void STB__(N, destroy)(TYPE *h);\
3908 PREFIX int STB__(N,get_flag)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE *v);\
3909 PREFIX VALUE STB__(N,get)(TYPE *a, KEY k);\
3910 PREFIX int STB__(N, set)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE v);\
3911 PREFIX int STB__(N, add)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE v);\
3912 PREFIX int STB__(N, update)(TYPE*a,KEY k,VALUE v);\
3913 PREFIX int STB__(N, remove)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE *v);
3914
3915#define STB_nocopy(x) (x)
3916#define STB_nodelete(x) 0
3917#define STB_nofields
3918#define STB_nonullvalue(x)
3919#define STB_nullvalue(x) x
3920#define STB_safecompare(x) x
3921#define STB_nosafe(x)
3922#define STB_noprefix
3923
3924#ifdef __GNUC__
3925#define STB__nogcc(x)
3926#else
3927#define STB__nogcc(x) x
3928#endif
3929
3930#define stb_define_hash_base(PREFIX,TYPE,FIELDS,N,NC,LOAD_FACTOR, \
3931 KEY,EMPTY,DEL,COPY,DISPOSE,SAFE, \
3932 VCOMPARE,CCOMPARE,HASH, \
3933 VALUE,HASVNULL,VNULL) \
3934 \
3935typedef struct \
3936{ \
3937 KEY k; \
3938 VALUE v; \
3939} STB_(N,_hashpair); \
3940 \
3941STB__nogcc( typedef struct stb__st_##TYPE TYPE; ) \
3942struct stb__st_##TYPE { \
3943 FIELDS \
3944 STB_(N,_hashpair) *table; \
3945 unsigned int mask; \
3946 int count, limit; \
3947 int deleted; \
3948 \
3949 int delete_threshhold; \
3950 int grow_threshhold; \
3951 int shrink_threshhold; \
3952 unsigned char alloced, has_empty, has_del; \
3953 VALUE ev; VALUE dv; \
3954}; \
3955 \
3956static unsigned int STB_(N, hash)(KEY k) \
3957{ \
3958 HASH \
3959} \
3960 \
3961PREFIX int STB__(N, init)(TYPE *h, int count) \
3962{ \
3963 int i; \
3964 if (count < 4) count = 4; \
3965 h->limit = count; \
3966 h->count = 0; \
3967 h->mask = count-1; \
3968 h->deleted = 0; \
3969 h->grow_threshhold = (int) (count * LOAD_FACTOR); \
3970 h->has_empty = h->has_del = 0; \
3971 h->alloced = 0; \
3972 if (count <= 64) \
3973 h->shrink_threshhold = 0; \
3974 else \
3975 h->shrink_threshhold = (int) (count * (LOAD_FACTOR/2.25)); \
3976 h->delete_threshhold = (int) (count * (1-LOAD_FACTOR)/2); \
3977 h->table = (STB_(N,_hashpair)*) malloc(sizeof(h->table[0]) * count); \
3978 if (h->table == NULL) return 0; \
3979 /* ideally this gets turned into a memset32 automatically */ \
3980 for (i=0; i < count; ++i) \
3981 h->table[i].k = EMPTY; \
3982 return 1; \
3983} \
3984 \
3985PREFIX int STB__(N, memory_usage)(TYPE *h) \
3986{ \
3987 return sizeof(*h) + h->limit * sizeof(h->table[0]); \
3988} \
3989 \
3990PREFIX TYPE * STB__(N, create)(void) \
3991{ \
3992 TYPE *h = (TYPE *) malloc(sizeof(*h)); \
3993 if (h) { \
3994 if (STB__(N, init)(h, 16)) \
3995 h->alloced = 1; \
3996 else { free(h); h=NULL; } \
3997 } \
3998 return h; \
3999} \
4000 \
4001PREFIX void STB__(N, destroy)(TYPE *a) \
4002{ \
4003 int i; \
4004 for (i=0; i < a->limit; ++i) \
4005 if (!CCOMPARE(a->table[i].k,EMPTY) && !CCOMPARE(a->table[i].k, DEL)) \
4006 DISPOSE(a->table[i].k); \
4007 free(a->table); \
4008 if (a->alloced) \
4009 free(a); \
4010} \
4011 \
4012static void STB_(N, rehash)(TYPE *a, int count); \
4013 \
4014PREFIX int STB__(N,get_flag)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE *v) \
4015{ \
4016 unsigned int h = STB_(N, hash)(k); \
4017 unsigned int n = h & a->mask, s; \
4018 if (CCOMPARE(k,EMPTY)){ if (a->has_empty) *v = a->ev; return a->has_empty;}\
4019 if (CCOMPARE(k,DEL)) { if (a->has_del ) *v = a->dv; return a->has_del; }\
4020 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4021 SAFE(if (!CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,DEL))) \
4022 if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) { *v = a->table[n].v; return 1; } \
4023 s = stb_rehash(h) | 1; \
4024 for(;;) { \
4025 n = (n + s) & a->mask; \
4026 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4027 SAFE(if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,DEL)) continue;) \
4028 if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) \
4029 { *v = a->table[n].v; return 1; } \
4030 } \
4031} \
4032 \
4033HASVNULL( \
4034 PREFIX VALUE STB__(N,get)(TYPE *a, KEY k) \
4035 { \
4036 VALUE v; \
4037 if (STB__(N,get_flag)(a,k,&v)) return v; \
4038 else return VNULL; \
4039 } \
4040) \
4041 \
4042PREFIX int STB__(N,getkey)(TYPE *a, KEY k, KEY *kout) \
4043{ \
4044 unsigned int h = STB_(N, hash)(k); \
4045 unsigned int n = h & a->mask, s; \
4046 if (CCOMPARE(k,EMPTY)||CCOMPARE(k,DEL)) return 0; \
4047 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4048 SAFE(if (!CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,DEL))) \
4049 if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) { *kout = a->table[n].k; return 1; } \
4050 s = stb_rehash(h) | 1; \
4051 for(;;) { \
4052 n = (n + s) & a->mask; \
4053 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4054 SAFE(if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,DEL)) continue;) \
4055 if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) \
4056 { *kout = a->table[n].k; return 1; } \
4057 } \
4058} \
4059 \
4060static int STB_(N,addset)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE v, \
4061 int allow_new, int allow_old, int copy) \
4062{ \
4063 unsigned int h = STB_(N, hash)(k); \
4064 unsigned int n = h & a->mask; \
4065 int b = -1; \
4066 if (CCOMPARE(k,EMPTY)) { \
4067 if (a->has_empty ? allow_old : allow_new) { \
4068 n=a->has_empty; a->ev = v; a->has_empty = 1; return !n; \
4069 } else return 0; \
4070 } \
4071 if (CCOMPARE(k,DEL)) { \
4072 if (a->has_del ? allow_old : allow_new) { \
4073 n=a->has_del; a->dv = v; a->has_del = 1; return !n; \
4074 } else return 0; \
4075 } \
4076 if (!CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k, EMPTY)) { \
4077 unsigned int s; \
4078 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k, DEL)) \
4079 b = n; \
4080 else if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) { \
4081 if (allow_old) \
4082 a->table[n].v = v; \
4083 return !allow_new; \
4084 } \
4085 s = stb_rehash(h) | 1; \
4086 for(;;) { \
4087 n = (n + s) & a->mask; \
4088 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k, EMPTY)) break; \
4089 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k, DEL)) { \
4090 if (b < 0) b = n; \
4091 } else if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) { \
4092 if (allow_old) \
4093 a->table[n].v = v; \
4094 return !allow_new; \
4095 } \
4096 } \
4097 } \
4098 if (!allow_new) return 0; \
4099 if (b < 0) b = n; else --a->deleted; \
4100 a->table[b].k = copy ? COPY(k) : k; \
4101 a->table[b].v = v; \
4102 ++a->count; \
4103 if (a->count > a->grow_threshhold) \
4104 STB_(N,rehash)(a, a->limit*2); \
4105 return 1; \
4106} \
4107 \
4108PREFIX int STB__(N, set)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE v){return STB_(N,addset)(a,k,v,1,1,1);}\
4109PREFIX int STB__(N, add)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE v){return STB_(N,addset)(a,k,v,1,0,1);}\
4110PREFIX int STB__(N, update)(TYPE*a,KEY k,VALUE v){return STB_(N,addset)(a,k,v,0,1,1);}\
4111 \
4112PREFIX int STB__(N, remove)(TYPE *a, KEY k, VALUE *v) \
4113{ \
4114 unsigned int h = STB_(N, hash)(k); \
4115 unsigned int n = h & a->mask, s; \
4116 if (CCOMPARE(k,EMPTY)) { if (a->has_empty) { if(v)*v = a->ev; a->has_empty=0; return 1; } return 0; } \
4117 if (CCOMPARE(k,DEL)) { if (a->has_del ) { if(v)*v = a->dv; a->has_del =0; return 1; } return 0; } \
4118 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4119 if (SAFE(CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,DEL) || ) !VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) { \
4120 s = stb_rehash(h) | 1; \
4121 for(;;) { \
4122 n = (n + s) & a->mask; \
4123 if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,EMPTY)) return 0; \
4124 SAFE(if (CCOMPARE(a->table[n].k, DEL)) continue;) \
4125 if (VCOMPARE(a->table[n].k,k)) break; \
4126 } \
4127 } \
4128 DISPOSE(a->table[n].k); \
4129 a->table[n].k = DEL; \
4130 --a->count; \
4131 ++a->deleted; \
4132 if (v != NULL) \
4133 *v = a->table[n].v; \
4134 if (a->count < a->shrink_threshhold) \
4135 STB_(N, rehash)(a, a->limit >> 1); \
4136 else if (a->deleted > a->delete_threshhold) \
4137 STB_(N, rehash)(a, a->limit); \
4138 return 1; \
4139} \
4140 \
4141PREFIX TYPE * STB__(NC, copy)(TYPE *a) \
4142{ \
4143 int i; \
4144 TYPE *h = (TYPE *) malloc(sizeof(*h)); \
4145 if (!h) return NULL; \
4146 if (!STB__(N, init)(h, a->limit)) { free(h); return NULL; } \
4147 h->count = a->count; \
4148 h->deleted = a->deleted; \
4149 h->alloced = 1; \
4150 h->ev = a->ev; h->dv = a->dv; \
4151 h->has_empty = a->has_empty; h->has_del = a->has_del; \
4152 memcpy(h->table, a->table, h->limit * sizeof(h->table[0])); \
4153 for (i=0; i < a->limit; ++i) \
4154 if (!CCOMPARE(h->table[i].k,EMPTY) && !CCOMPARE(h->table[i].k,DEL)) \
4155 h->table[i].k = COPY(h->table[i].k); \
4156 return h; \
4157} \
4158 \
4159static void STB_(N, rehash)(TYPE *a, int count) \
4160{ \
4161 int i; \
4162 TYPE b; \
4163 STB__(N, init)(&b, count); \
4164 for (i=0; i < a->limit; ++i) \
4165 if (!CCOMPARE(a->table[i].k,EMPTY) && !CCOMPARE(a->table[i].k,DEL)) \
4166 STB_(N,addset)(&b, a->table[i].k, a->table[i].v,1,1,0); \
4167 free(a->table); \
4168 a->table = b.table; \
4169 a->mask = b.mask; \
4170 a->count = b.count; \
4171 a->limit = b.limit; \
4172 a->deleted = b.deleted; \
4173 a->delete_threshhold = b.delete_threshhold; \
4174 a->grow_threshhold = b.grow_threshhold; \
4175 a->shrink_threshhold = b.shrink_threshhold; \
4176}
4177
4178#define STB_equal(a,b) ((a) == (b))
4179
4180#define stb_define_hash(TYPE,N,KEY,EMPTY,DEL,HASH,VALUE) \
4181 stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, TYPE,STB_nofields,N,NC,0.85f, \
4182 KEY,EMPTY,DEL,STB_nocopy,STB_nodelete,STB_nosafe, \
4183 STB_equal,STB_equal,HASH, \
4184 VALUE,STB_nonullvalue,0)
4185
4186#define stb_define_hash_vnull(TYPE,N,KEY,EMPTY,DEL,HASH,VALUE,VNULL) \
4187 stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, TYPE,STB_nofields,N,NC,0.85f, \
4188 KEY,EMPTY,DEL,STB_nocopy,STB_nodelete,STB_nosafe, \
4189 STB_equal,STB_equal,HASH, \
4190 VALUE,STB_nullvalue,VNULL)
4191
4193//
4194// stb_ptrmap
4195//
4196// An stb_ptrmap data structure is an O(1) hash table between pointers. One
4197// application is to let you store "extra" data associated with pointers,
4198// which is why it was originally called stb_extra.
4199
4200stb_declare_hash(STB_EXTERN, stb_ptrmap, stb_ptrmap_, void *, void *)
4201stb_declare_hash(STB_EXTERN, stb_idict, stb_idict_, stb_int32, stb_int32)
4202stb_declare_hash(STB_EXTERN, stb_uidict, stbi_uidict_, stb_uint32, stb_uint32)
4203
4204STB_EXTERN void stb_ptrmap_delete(stb_ptrmap *e, void (*free_func)(void *));
4205STB_EXTERN stb_ptrmap *stb_ptrmap_new(void);
4206
4207STB_EXTERN stb_idict * stb_idict_new_size(int size);
4208STB_EXTERN void stb_idict_remove_all(stb_idict *e);
4209STB_EXTERN void stb_uidict_reset(stb_uidict *e);
4210
4211#ifdef STB_DEFINE
4212
4213#define STB_EMPTY ((void *) 2)
4214#define STB_EDEL ((void *) 6)
4215
4216stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix,stb_ptrmap, STB_nofields, stb_ptrmap_,stb_ptrmap_,0.85f,
4217 void *,STB_EMPTY,STB_EDEL,STB_nocopy,STB_nodelete,STB_nosafe,
4218 STB_equal,STB_equal,return stb_hashptr(k);,
4219 void *,STB_nullvalue,NULL)
4220
4221stb_ptrmap *stb_ptrmap_new(void)
4222{
4223 return stb_ptrmap_create();
4224}
4225
4226void stb_ptrmap_delete(stb_ptrmap *e, void (*free_func)(void *))
4227{
4228 int i;
4229 if (free_func)
4230 for (i=0; i < e->limit; ++i)
4231 if (e->table[i].k != STB_EMPTY && e->table[i].k != STB_EDEL) {
4232 if (free_func == free)
4233 free(e->table[i].v); // allow STB_MALLOC_WRAPPER to operate
4234 else
4235 free_func(e->table[i].v);
4236 }
4237 stb_ptrmap_destroy(e);
4238}
4239
4240// extra fields needed for stua_dict
4241#define STB_IEMPTY ((int) 1)
4242#define STB_IDEL ((int) 3)
4243stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, stb_idict, short type; short gc; STB_nofields, stb_idict_,stb_idict_,0.95f,
4244 stb_int32,STB_IEMPTY,STB_IDEL,STB_nocopy,STB_nodelete,STB_nosafe,
4245 STB_equal,STB_equal,
4246 return stb_rehash_improved(k);,stb_int32,STB_nonullvalue,0)
4247
4248stb_idict * stb_idict_new_size(int size)
4249{
4250 stb_idict *e = (stb_idict *) malloc(sizeof(*e));
4251 if (e) {
4252 if (!stb_is_pow2(size))
4253 size = 1 << stb_log2_ceil(size);
4254 stb_idict_init(e, size);
4255 e->alloced = 1;
4256 }
4257 return e;
4258}
4259
4260void stb_idict_remove_all(stb_idict *e)
4261{
4262 int n;
4263 for (n=0; n < e->limit; ++n)
4264 e->table[n].k = STB_IEMPTY;
4265 e->has_empty = e->has_del = 0;
4266 e->count = 0;
4267 e->deleted = 0;
4268}
4269
4270stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, stb_uidict, STB_nofields, stb_uidict_,stb_uidict_,0.85f,
4271 stb_int32,0xffffffff,0xfffffffe,STB_nocopy,STB_nodelete,STB_nosafe,
4272 STB_equal,STB_equal,
4273 return stb_rehash_improved(k);,stb_uint32,STB_nonullvalue,0)
4274
4275void stb_uidict_reset(stb_uidict *e)
4276{
4277 int n;
4278 for (n=0; n < e->limit; ++n)
4279 e->table[n].k = 0xffffffff;
4280 e->has_empty = e->has_del = 0;
4281 e->count = 0;
4282 e->deleted = 0;
4283}
4284#endif
4285
4287//
4288// stb_sparse_ptr_matrix
4289//
4290// An stb_ptrmap data structure is an O(1) hash table storing an arbitrary
4291// block of data for a given pair of pointers.
4292//
4293// If create=0, returns
4294
4295typedef struct stb__st_stb_spmatrix stb_spmatrix;
4296
4297STB_EXTERN stb_spmatrix * stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_new(int val_size);
4298STB_EXTERN void stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_free(stb_spmatrix *z);
4299STB_EXTERN void * stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_get(stb_spmatrix *z, void *a, void *b, int create);
4300
4301#ifdef STB_DEFINE
4302typedef struct
4303{
4304 void *a;
4305 void *b;
4306} stb__ptrpair;
4307
4308static stb__ptrpair stb__ptrpair_empty = { (void *) 1, (void *) 1 };
4309static stb__ptrpair stb__ptrpair_del = { (void *) 2, (void *) 2 };
4310
4311#define STB__equal_ptrpair(x,y) ((x).a == (y).a && (x).b == (y).b)
4312
4313stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, stb_spmatrix, int val_size; void *arena;, stb__spmatrix_,stb__spmatrix_, 0.85,
4314 stb__ptrpair, stb__ptrpair_empty, stb__ptrpair_del,
4315 STB_nocopy, STB_nodelete, STB_nosafe,
4316 STB__equal_ptrpair, STB__equal_ptrpair, return stb_rehash(stb_hashptr(k.a))+stb_hashptr(k.b);,
4317 void *, STB_nullvalue, 0)
4318
4319stb_spmatrix *stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_new(int val_size)
4320{
4321 stb_spmatrix *m = stb__spmatrix_create();
4322 if (m) m->val_size = val_size;
4323 if (m) m->arena = stb_malloc_global(1);
4324 return m;
4325}
4326
4327void stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_free(stb_spmatrix *z)
4328{
4329 if (z->arena) stb_free(z->arena);
4330 stb__spmatrix_destroy(z);
4331}
4332
4333void *stb_sparse_ptr_matrix_get(stb_spmatrix *z, void *a, void *b, int create)
4334{
4335 stb__ptrpair t = { a,b };
4336 void *data = stb__spmatrix_get(z, t);
4337 if (!data && create) {
4338 data = stb_malloc_raw(z->arena, z->val_size);
4339 if (!data) return NULL;
4340 memset(data, 0, z->val_size);
4341 stb__spmatrix_add(z, t, data);
4342 }
4343 return data;
4344}
4345#endif
4346
4347
4348
4350//
4351// SDICT: Hash Table for Strings (symbol table)
4352//
4353// if "use_arena=1", then strings will be copied
4354// into blocks and never freed until the sdict is freed;
4355// otherwise they're malloc()ed and free()d on the fly.
4356// (specify use_arena=1 if you never stb_sdict_remove)
4357
4358stb_declare_hash(STB_EXTERN, stb_sdict, stb_sdict_, char *, void *)
4359
4360STB_EXTERN stb_sdict * stb_sdict_new(int use_arena);
4361STB_EXTERN stb_sdict * stb_sdict_copy(stb_sdict*);
4362STB_EXTERN void stb_sdict_delete(stb_sdict *);
4363STB_EXTERN void * stb_sdict_change(stb_sdict *, char *str, void *p);
4364STB_EXTERN int stb_sdict_count(stb_sdict *d);
4365
4366STB_EXTERN int stb_sdict_internal_limit(stb_sdict *d);
4367STB_EXTERN char * stb_sdict_internal_key(stb_sdict *d, int n);
4368STB_EXTERN void * stb_sdict_internal_value(stb_sdict *d, int n);
4369
4370#define stb_sdict_for(d,i,q,z) \
4371 for(i=0; i < stb_sdict_internal_limit(d) ? (q=stb_sdict_internal_key(d,i),z=stb_sdict_internal_value(d,i),1) : 0; ++i) \
4372 if (q==NULL||q==(void *) 1);else // reversed makes macro friendly
4373
4374#ifdef STB_DEFINE
4375
4376// if in same translation unit, for speed, don't call accessors
4377#undef stb_sdict_for
4378#define stb_sdict_for(d,i,q,z) \
4379 for(i=0; i < (d)->limit ? (q=(d)->table[i].k,z=(d)->table[i].v,1) : 0; ++i) \
4380 if (q==NULL||q==(void *) 1);else // reversed makes macro friendly
4381
4382#define STB_DEL ((void *) 1)
4383#define STB_SDEL ((char *) 1)
4384
4385#define stb_sdict__copy(x) \
4386 stb_p_strcpy_s(a->arena ? stb_malloc_string(a->arena, strlen(x)+1) \
4387 : (char *) malloc(strlen(x)+1), strlen(x)+1, x)
4388
4389#define stb_sdict__dispose(x) if (!a->arena) free(x)
4390
4391stb_define_hash_base(STB_noprefix, stb_sdict, void*arena;, stb_sdict_,stb_sdictinternal_, 0.85f,
4392 char *, NULL, STB_SDEL, stb_sdict__copy, stb_sdict__dispose,
4393 STB_safecompare, !strcmp, STB_equal, return stb_hash(k);,
4394 void *, STB_nullvalue, NULL)
4395
4396int stb_sdict_count(stb_sdict *a)
4397{
4398 return a->count;
4399}
4400
4401int stb_sdict_internal_limit(stb_sdict *a)
4402{
4403 return a->limit;
4404}
4405char* stb_sdict_internal_key(stb_sdict *a, int n)
4406{
4407 return a->table[n].k;
4408}
4409void* stb_sdict_internal_value(stb_sdict *a, int n)
4410{
4411 return a->table[n].v;
4412}
4413
4414stb_sdict * stb_sdict_new(int use_arena)
4415{
4416 stb_sdict *d = stb_sdict_create();
4417 if (d == NULL) return NULL;
4418 d->arena = use_arena ? stb_malloc_global(1) : NULL;
4419 return d;
4420}
4421
4422stb_sdict* stb_sdict_copy(stb_sdict *old)
4423{
4424 stb_sdict *n;
4425 void *old_arena = old->arena;
4426 void *new_arena = old_arena ? stb_malloc_global(1) : NULL;
4427 old->arena = new_arena;
4428 n = stb_sdictinternal_copy(old);
4429 old->arena = old_arena;
4430 if (n)
4431 n->arena = new_arena;
4432 else if (new_arena)
4433 stb_free(new_arena);
4434 return n;
4435}
4436
4437
4438void stb_sdict_delete(stb_sdict *d)
4439{
4440 if (d->arena)
4441 stb_free(d->arena);
4442 stb_sdict_destroy(d);
4443}
4444
4445void * stb_sdict_change(stb_sdict *d, char *str, void *p)
4446{
4447 void *q = stb_sdict_get(d, str);
4448 stb_sdict_set(d, str, p);
4449 return q;
4450}
4451#endif
4452
4454//
4455// Instantiated data structures
4456//
4457// This is an attempt to implement a templated data structure.
4458// What you do is define a struct foo, and then include several
4459// pointer fields to struct foo in your struct. Then you call
4460// the instantiator, which creates the functions that implement
4461// the data structure. This requires massive undebuggable #defines,
4462// so we limit the cases where we do this.
4463//
4464// AA tree is an encoding of a 2-3 tree whereas RB trees encode a 2-3-4 tree;
4465// much simpler code due to fewer cases.
4466
4467#define stb__bst_parent(x) x
4468#define stb__bst_noparent(x)
4469
4470#define stb_bst_fields(N) \
4471 *STB_(N,left), *STB_(N,right); \
4472 unsigned char STB_(N,level)
4473
4474#define stb_bst_fields_parent(N) \
4475 *STB_(N,left), *STB_(N,right), *STB_(N,parent); \
4476 unsigned char STB_(N,level)
4477
4478#define STB__level(N,x) ((x) ? (x)->STB_(N,level) : 0)
4479
4480#define stb_bst_base(TYPE, N, TREE, M, compare, PAR) \
4481 \
4482static int STB_(N,_compare)(TYPE *p, TYPE *q) \
4483{ \
4484 compare \
4485} \
4486 \
4487static void STB_(N,setleft)(TYPE *q, TYPE *v) \
4488{ \
4489 q->STB_(N,left) = v; \
4490 PAR(if (v) v->STB_(N,parent) = q;) \
4491} \
4492 \
4493static void STB_(N,setright)(TYPE *q, TYPE *v) \
4494{ \
4495 q->STB_(N,right) = v; \
4496 PAR(if (v) v->STB_(N,parent) = q;) \
4497} \
4498 \
4499static TYPE *STB_(N,skew)(TYPE *q) \
4500{ \
4501 if (q == NULL) return q; \
4502 if (q->STB_(N,left) \
4503 && q->STB_(N,left)->STB_(N,level) == q->STB_(N,level)) { \
4504 TYPE *p = q->STB_(N,left); \
4505 STB_(N,setleft)(q, p->STB_(N,right)); \
4506 STB_(N,setright)(p, q); \
4507 return p; \
4508 } \
4509 return q; \
4510} \
4511 \
4512static TYPE *STB_(N,split)(TYPE *p) \
4513{ \
4514 TYPE *q = p->STB_(N,right); \
4515 if (q && q->STB_(N,right) \
4516 && q->STB_(N,right)->STB_(N,level) == p->STB_(N,level)) { \
4517 STB_(N,setright)(p, q->STB_(N,left)); \
4518 STB_(N,setleft)(q,p); \
4519 ++q->STB_(N,level); \
4520 return q; \
4521 } \
4522 return p; \
4523} \
4524 \
4525TYPE *STB__(N,insert)(TYPE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4526{ \
4527 int c; \
4528 if (tree == NULL) { \
4529 item->STB_(N,left) = NULL; \
4530 item->STB_(N,right) = NULL; \
4531 item->STB_(N,level) = 1; \
4532 PAR(item->STB_(N,parent) = NULL;) \
4533 return item; \
4534 } \
4535 c = STB_(N,_compare)(item,tree); \
4536 if (c == 0) { \
4537 if (item != tree) { \
4538 STB_(N,setleft)(item, tree->STB_(N,left)); \
4539 STB_(N,setright)(item, tree->STB_(N,right)); \
4540 item->STB_(N,level) = tree->STB_(N,level); \
4541 PAR(item->STB_(N,parent) = NULL;) \
4542 } \
4543 return item; \
4544 } \
4545 if (c < 0) \
4546 STB_(N,setleft )(tree, STB__(N,insert)(tree->STB_(N,left), item)); \
4547 else \
4548 STB_(N,setright)(tree, STB__(N,insert)(tree->STB_(N,right), item)); \
4549 tree = STB_(N,skew)(tree); \
4550 tree = STB_(N,split)(tree); \
4551 PAR(tree->STB_(N,parent) = NULL;) \
4552 return tree; \
4553} \
4554 \
4555TYPE *STB__(N,remove)(TYPE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4556{ \
4557 static TYPE *delnode, *leaf, *restore; \
4558 if (tree == NULL) return NULL; \
4559 leaf = tree; \
4560 if (STB_(N,_compare)(item, tree) < 0) { \
4561 STB_(N,setleft)(tree, STB__(N,remove)(tree->STB_(N,left), item)); \
4562 } else { \
4563 TYPE *r; \
4564 delnode = tree; \
4565 r = STB__(N,remove)(tree->STB_(N,right), item); \
4566 /* maybe move 'leaf' up to this location */ \
4567 if (restore == tree) { tree = leaf; leaf = restore = NULL; } \
4568 STB_(N,setright)(tree,r); \
4569 assert(tree->STB_(N,right) != tree); \
4570 } \
4571 if (tree == leaf) { \
4572 if (delnode == item) { \
4573 tree = tree->STB_(N,right); \
4574 assert(leaf->STB_(N,left) == NULL); \
4575 /* move leaf (the right sibling) up to delnode */ \
4576 STB_(N,setleft )(leaf, item->STB_(N,left )); \
4577 STB_(N,setright)(leaf, item->STB_(N,right)); \
4578 leaf->STB_(N,level) = item->STB_(N,level); \
4579 if (leaf != item) \
4580 restore = delnode; \
4581 } \
4582 delnode = NULL; \
4583 } else { \
4584 if (STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,left) ) < tree->STB_(N,level)-1 || \
4585 STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,right)) < tree->STB_(N,level)-1) { \
4586 --tree->STB_(N,level); \
4587 if (STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,right)) > tree->STB_(N,level)) \
4588 tree->STB_(N,right)->STB_(N,level) = tree->STB_(N,level); \
4589 tree = STB_(N,skew)(tree); \
4590 STB_(N,setright)(tree, STB_(N,skew)(tree->STB_(N,right))); \
4591 if (tree->STB_(N,right)) \
4592 STB_(N,setright)(tree->STB_(N,right), \
4593 STB_(N,skew)(tree->STB_(N,right)->STB_(N,right))); \
4594 tree = STB_(N,split)(tree); \
4595 if (tree->STB_(N,right)) \
4596 STB_(N,setright)(tree, STB_(N,split)(tree->STB_(N,right))); \
4597 } \
4598 } \
4599 PAR(if (tree) tree->STB_(N,parent) = NULL;) \
4600 return tree; \
4601} \
4602 \
4603TYPE *STB__(N,last)(TYPE *tree) \
4604{ \
4605 if (tree) \
4606 while (tree->STB_(N,right)) tree = tree->STB_(N,right); \
4607 return tree; \
4608} \
4609 \
4610TYPE *STB__(N,first)(TYPE *tree) \
4611{ \
4612 if (tree) \
4613 while (tree->STB_(N,left)) tree = tree->STB_(N,left); \
4614 return tree; \
4615} \
4616 \
4617TYPE *STB__(N,next)(TYPE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4618{ \
4619 TYPE *next = NULL; \
4620 if (item->STB_(N,right)) \
4621 return STB__(N,first)(item->STB_(N,right)); \
4622 PAR( \
4623 while(item->STB_(N,parent)) { \
4624 TYPE *up = item->STB_(N,parent); \
4625 if (up->STB_(N,left) == item) return up; \
4626 item = up; \
4627 } \
4628 return NULL; \
4629 ) \
4630 while (tree != item) { \
4631 if (STB_(N,_compare)(item, tree) < 0) { \
4632 next = tree; \
4633 tree = tree->STB_(N,left); \
4634 } else { \
4635 tree = tree->STB_(N,right); \
4636 } \
4637 } \
4638 return next; \
4639} \
4640 \
4641TYPE *STB__(N,prev)(TYPE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4642{ \
4643 TYPE *next = NULL; \
4644 if (item->STB_(N,left)) \
4645 return STB__(N,last)(item->STB_(N,left)); \
4646 PAR( \
4647 while(item->STB_(N,parent)) { \
4648 TYPE *up = item->STB_(N,parent); \
4649 if (up->STB_(N,right) == item) return up; \
4650 item = up; \
4651 } \
4652 return NULL; \
4653 ) \
4654 while (tree != item) { \
4655 if (STB_(N,_compare)(item, tree) < 0) { \
4656 tree = tree->STB_(N,left); \
4657 } else { \
4658 next = tree; \
4659 tree = tree->STB_(N,right); \
4660 } \
4661 } \
4662 return next; \
4663} \
4664 \
4665STB__DEBUG( \
4666 void STB__(N,_validate)(TYPE *tree, int root) \
4667 { \
4668 if (tree == NULL) return; \
4669 PAR(if(root) assert(tree->STB_(N,parent) == NULL);) \
4670 assert(STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,left) ) == tree->STB_(N,level)-1); \
4671 assert(STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,right)) <= tree->STB_(N,level)); \
4672 assert(STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,right)) >= tree->STB_(N,level)-1); \
4673 if (tree->STB_(N,right)) { \
4674 assert(STB__level(N,tree->STB_(N,right)->STB_(N,right)) \
4675 != tree->STB_(N,level)); \
4676 PAR(assert(tree->STB_(N,right)->STB_(N,parent) == tree);) \
4677 } \
4678 PAR(if(tree->STB_(N,left)) assert(tree->STB_(N,left)->STB_(N,parent) == tree);) \
4679 STB__(N,_validate)(tree->STB_(N,left) ,0); \
4680 STB__(N,_validate)(tree->STB_(N,right),0); \
4681 } \
4682) \
4683 \
4684typedef struct \
4685{ \
4686 TYPE *root; \
4687} TREE; \
4688 \
4689void STB__(M,Insert)(TREE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4690{ tree->root = STB__(N,insert)(tree->root, item); } \
4691void STB__(M,Remove)(TREE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4692{ tree->root = STB__(N,remove)(tree->root, item); } \
4693TYPE *STB__(M,Next)(TREE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4694{ return STB__(N,next)(tree->root, item); } \
4695TYPE *STB__(M,Prev)(TREE *tree, TYPE *item) \
4696{ return STB__(N,prev)(tree->root, item); } \
4697TYPE *STB__(M,First)(TREE *tree) { return STB__(N,first)(tree->root); } \
4698TYPE *STB__(M,Last) (TREE *tree) { return STB__(N,last) (tree->root); } \
4699void STB__(M,Init)(TREE *tree) { tree->root = NULL; }
4700
4701
4702#define stb_bst_find(N,tree,fcompare) \
4703{ \
4704 int c; \
4705 while (tree != NULL) { \
4706 fcompare \
4707 if (c == 0) return tree; \
4708 if (c < 0) tree = tree->STB_(N,left); \
4709 else tree = tree->STB_(N,right); \
4710 } \
4711 return NULL; \
4712}
4713
4714#define stb_bst_raw(TYPE,N,TREE,M,vfield,VTYPE,compare,PAR) \
4715 stb_bst_base(TYPE,N,TREE,M, \
4716 VTYPE a = p->vfield; VTYPE b = q->vfield; return (compare);, PAR ) \
4717 \
4718TYPE *STB__(N,find)(TYPE *tree, VTYPE a) \
4719 stb_bst_find(N,tree,VTYPE b = tree->vfield; c = (compare);) \
4720TYPE *STB__(M,Find)(TREE *tree, VTYPE a) \
4721{ return STB__(N,find)(tree->root, a); }
4722
4723#define stb_bst(TYPE,N,TREE,M,vfield,VTYPE,compare) \
4724 stb_bst_raw(TYPE,N,TREE,M,vfield,VTYPE,compare,stb__bst_noparent)
4725#define stb_bst_parent(TYPE,N,TREE,M,vfield,VTYPE,compare) \
4726 stb_bst_raw(TYPE,N,TREE,M,vfield,VTYPE,compare,stb__bst_parent)
4727
4728
4729
4731//
4732// Pointer Nulling
4733//
4734// This lets you automatically NULL dangling pointers to "registered"
4735// objects. Note that you have to make sure you call the appropriate
4736// functions when you free or realloc blocks of memory that contain
4737// pointers or pointer targets. stb.h can automatically do this for
4738// stb_arr, or for all frees/reallocs if it's wrapping them.
4739//
4740
4741#ifdef STB_NPTR
4742
4743STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_set(void *address_of_pointer, void *value_to_write);
4744STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_didset(void *address_of_pointer);
4745
4746STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_didfree(void *address_being_freed, int len);
4747STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_free(void *address_being_freed, int len);
4748
4749STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_didrealloc(void *new_address, void *old_address, int len);
4750STB_EXTERN void stb_nptr_recache(void); // recache all known pointers
4751 // do this after pointer sets outside your control, slow
4752
4753#ifdef STB_DEFINE
4754// for fast updating on free/realloc, we need to be able to find
4755// all the objects (pointers and targets) within a given block;
4756// this precludes hashing
4757
4758// we use a three-level hierarchy of memory to minimize storage:
4759// level 1: 65536 pointers to stb__memory_node (always uses 256 KB)
4760// level 2: each stb__memory_node represents a 64K block of memory
4761// with 256 stb__memory_leafs (worst case 64MB)
4762// level 3: each stb__memory_leaf represents 256 bytes of memory
4763// using a list of target locations and a list of pointers
4764// (which are hopefully fairly short normally!)
4765
4766// this approach won't work in 64-bit, which has a much larger address
4767// space. need to redesign
4768
4769#define STB__NPTR_ROOT_LOG2 16
4770#define STB__NPTR_ROOT_NUM (1 << STB__NPTR_ROOT_LOG2)
4771#define STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT (32 - STB__NPTR_ROOT_LOG2)
4772
4773#define STB__NPTR_NODE_LOG2 5
4774#define STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM (1 << STB__NPTR_NODE_LOG2)
4775#define STB__NPTR_NODE_MASK (STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM-1)
4776#define STB__NPTR_NODE_SHIFT (STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT - STB__NPTR_NODE_LOG2)
4777#define STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(x) (((x) >> STB__NPTR_NODE_SHIFT) & STB__NPTR_NODE_MASK)
4778
4779typedef struct stb__st_nptr
4780{
4781 void *ptr; // address of actual pointer
4782 struct stb__st_nptr *next; // next pointer with same target
4783 struct stb__st_nptr **prev; // prev pointer with same target, address of 'next' field (or first)
4784 struct stb__st_nptr *next_in_block;
4785} stb__nptr;
4786
4787typedef struct stb__st_nptr_target
4788{
4789 void *ptr; // address of target
4790 stb__nptr *first; // address of first nptr pointing to this
4791 struct stb__st_nptr_target *next_in_block;
4792} stb__nptr_target;
4793
4794typedef struct
4795{
4796 stb__nptr *pointers;
4797 stb__nptr_target *targets;
4798} stb__memory_leaf;
4799
4800typedef struct
4801{
4802 stb__memory_leaf *children[STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM];
4803} stb__memory_node;
4804
4805stb__memory_node *stb__memtab_root[STB__NPTR_ROOT_NUM];
4806
4807static stb__memory_leaf *stb__nptr_find_leaf(void *mem)
4808{
4809 stb_uint32 address = (stb_uint32) mem;
4810 stb__memory_node *z = stb__memtab_root[address >> STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT];
4811 if (z)
4812 return z->children[STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(address)];
4813 else
4814 return NULL;
4815}
4816
4817static void * stb__nptr_alloc(int size)
4818{
4819 return stb__realloc_raw(0,size);
4820}
4821
4822static void stb__nptr_free(void *p)
4823{
4824 stb__realloc_raw(p,0);
4825}
4826
4827static stb__memory_leaf *stb__nptr_make_leaf(void *mem)
4828{
4829 stb_uint32 address = (stb_uint32) mem;
4830 stb__memory_node *z = stb__memtab_root[address >> STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT];
4831 stb__memory_leaf *f;
4832 if (!z) {
4833 int i;
4834 z = (stb__memory_node *) stb__nptr_alloc(sizeof(*stb__memtab_root[0]));
4835 stb__memtab_root[address >> STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT] = z;
4836 for (i=0; i < 256; ++i)
4837 z->children[i] = 0;
4838 }
4839 f = (stb__memory_leaf *) stb__nptr_alloc(sizeof(*f));
4840 z->children[STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(address)] = f;
4841 f->pointers = NULL;
4842 f->targets = NULL;
4843 return f;
4844}
4845
4846static stb__nptr_target *stb__nptr_find_target(void *target, int force)
4847{
4848 stb__memory_leaf *p = stb__nptr_find_leaf(target);
4849 if (p) {
4850 stb__nptr_target *t = p->targets;
4851 while (t) {
4852 if (t->ptr == target)
4853 return t;
4854 t = t->next_in_block;
4855 }
4856 }
4857 if (force) {
4858 stb__nptr_target *t = (stb__nptr_target*) stb__nptr_alloc(sizeof(*t));
4859 if (!p) p = stb__nptr_make_leaf(target);
4860 t->ptr = target;
4861 t->first = NULL;
4862 t->next_in_block = p->targets;
4863 p->targets = t;
4864 return t;
4865 } else
4866 return NULL;
4867}
4868
4869static stb__nptr *stb__nptr_find_pointer(void *ptr, int force)
4870{
4871 stb__memory_leaf *p = stb__nptr_find_leaf(ptr);
4872 if (p) {
4873 stb__nptr *t = p->pointers;
4874 while (t) {
4875 if (t->ptr == ptr)
4876 return t;
4877 t = t->next_in_block;
4878 }
4879 }
4880 if (force) {
4881 stb__nptr *t = (stb__nptr *) stb__nptr_alloc(sizeof(*t));
4882 if (!p) p = stb__nptr_make_leaf(ptr);
4883 t->ptr = ptr;
4884 t->next = NULL;
4885 t->prev = NULL;
4886 t->next_in_block = p->pointers;
4887 p->pointers = t;
4888 return t;
4889 } else
4890 return NULL;
4891}
4892
4893void stb_nptr_set(void *address_of_pointer, void *value_to_write)
4894{
4895 if (*(void **)address_of_pointer != value_to_write) {
4896 *(void **) address_of_pointer = value_to_write;
4897 stb_nptr_didset(address_of_pointer);
4898 }
4899}
4900
4901void stb_nptr_didset(void *address_of_pointer)
4902{
4903 // first unlink from old chain
4904 void *new_address;
4905 stb__nptr *p = stb__nptr_find_pointer(address_of_pointer, 1); // force building if doesn't exist
4906 if (p->prev) { // if p->prev is NULL, we just built it, or it was NULL
4907 *(p->prev) = p->next;
4908 if (p->next) p->next->prev = p->prev;
4909 }
4910 // now add to new chain
4911 new_address = *(void **)address_of_pointer;
4912 if (new_address != NULL) {
4913 stb__nptr_target *t = stb__nptr_find_target(new_address, 1);
4914 p->next = t->first;
4915 if (p->next) p->next->prev = &p->next;
4916 p->prev = &t->first;
4917 t->first = p;
4918 } else {
4919 p->prev = NULL;
4920 p->next = NULL;
4921 }
4922}
4923
4924void stb__nptr_block(void *address, int len, void (*function)(stb__memory_leaf *f, int datum, void *start, void *end), int datum)
4925{
4926 void *end_address = (void *) ((char *) address + len - 1);
4927 stb__memory_node *n;
4928 stb_uint32 start = (stb_uint32) address;
4929 stb_uint32 end = start + len - 1;
4930
4931 int b0 = start >> STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT;
4932 int b1 = end >> STB__NPTR_ROOT_SHIFT;
4933 int b=b0,i,e0,e1;
4934
4935 e0 = STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(start);
4936
4937 if (datum <= 0) {
4938 // first block
4939 n = stb__memtab_root[b0];
4940 if (n) {
4941 if (b0 != b1)
4942 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM-1;
4943 else
4944 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(end);
4945 for (i=e0; i <= e1; ++i)
4946 if (n->children[i])
4947 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4948 }
4949 if (b1 > b0) {
4950 // blocks other than the first and last block
4951 for (b=b0+1; b < b1; ++b) {
4952 n = stb__memtab_root[b];
4953 if (n)
4954 for (i=0; i <= STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM-1; ++i)
4955 if (n->children[i])
4956 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4957 }
4958 // last block
4959 n = stb__memtab_root[b1];
4960 if (n) {
4961 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(end);
4962 for (i=0; i <= e1; ++i)
4963 if (n->children[i])
4964 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4965 }
4966 }
4967 } else {
4968 if (b1 > b0) {
4969 // last block
4970 n = stb__memtab_root[b1];
4971 if (n) {
4972 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(end);
4973 for (i=e1; i >= 0; --i)
4974 if (n->children[i])
4975 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4976 }
4977 // blocks other than the first and last block
4978 for (b=b1-1; b > b0; --b) {
4979 n = stb__memtab_root[b];
4980 if (n)
4981 for (i=STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM-1; i >= 0; --i)
4982 if (n->children[i])
4983 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4984 }
4985 }
4986 // first block
4987 n = stb__memtab_root[b0];
4988 if (n) {
4989 if (b0 != b1)
4990 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM-1;
4991 else
4992 e1 = STB__NPTR_NODE_OFFSET(end);
4993 for (i=e1; i >= e0; --i)
4994 if (n->children[i])
4995 function(n->children[i], datum, address, end_address);
4996 }
4997 }
4998}
4999
5000static void stb__nptr_delete_pointers(stb__memory_leaf *f, int offset, void *start, void *end)
5001{
5002 stb__nptr **p = &f->pointers;
5003 while (*p) {
5004 stb__nptr *n = *p;
5005 if (n->ptr >= start && n->ptr <= end) {
5006 // unlink
5007 if (n->prev) {
5008 *(n->prev) = n->next;
5009 if (n->next) n->next->prev = n->prev;
5010 }
5011 *p = n->next_in_block;
5012 stb__nptr_free(n);
5013 } else
5014 p = &(n->next_in_block);
5015 }
5016}
5017
5018static void stb__nptr_delete_targets(stb__memory_leaf *f, int offset, void *start, void *end)
5019{
5020 stb__nptr_target **p = &f->targets;
5021 while (*p) {
5022 stb__nptr_target *n = *p;
5023 if (n->ptr >= start && n->ptr <= end) {
5024 // null pointers
5025 stb__nptr *z = n->first;
5026 while (z) {
5027 stb__nptr *y = z->next;
5028 z->prev = NULL;
5029 z->next = NULL;
5030 *(void **) z->ptr = NULL;
5031 z = y;
5032 }
5033 // unlink this target
5034 *p = n->next_in_block;
5035 stb__nptr_free(n);
5036 } else
5037 p = &(n->next_in_block);
5038 }
5039}
5040
5041void stb_nptr_didfree(void *address_being_freed, int len)
5042{
5043 // step one: delete all pointers in this block
5044 stb__nptr_block(address_being_freed, len, stb__nptr_delete_pointers, 0);
5045 // step two: NULL all pointers to this block; do this second to avoid NULLing deleted pointers
5046 stb__nptr_block(address_being_freed, len, stb__nptr_delete_targets, 0);
5047}
5048
5049void stb_nptr_free(void *address_being_freed, int len)
5050{
5051 free(address_being_freed);
5052 stb_nptr_didfree(address_being_freed, len);
5053}
5054
5055static void stb__nptr_move_targets(stb__memory_leaf *f, int offset, void *start, void *end)
5056{
5057 stb__nptr_target **t = &f->targets;
5058 while (*t) {
5059 stb__nptr_target *n = *t;
5060 if (n->ptr >= start && n->ptr <= end) {
5061 stb__nptr *z;
5062 stb__memory_leaf *f;
5063 // unlink n
5064 *t = n->next_in_block;
5065 // update n to new address
5066 n->ptr = (void *) ((char *) n->ptr + offset);
5067 f = stb__nptr_find_leaf(n->ptr);
5068 if (!f) f = stb__nptr_make_leaf(n->ptr);
5069 n->next_in_block = f->targets;
5070 f->targets = n;
5071 // now go through all pointers and make them point here
5072 z = n->first;
5073 while (z) {
5074 *(void**) z->ptr = n->ptr;
5075 z = z->next;
5076 }
5077 } else
5078 t = &(n->next_in_block);
5079 }
5080}
5081
5082static void stb__nptr_move_pointers(stb__memory_leaf *f, int offset, void *start, void *end)
5083{
5084 stb__nptr **p = &f->pointers;
5085 while (*p) {
5086 stb__nptr *n = *p;
5087 if (n->ptr >= start && n->ptr <= end) {
5088 // unlink
5089 *p = n->next_in_block;
5090 n->ptr = (void *) ((int) n->ptr + offset);
5091 // move to new block
5092 f = stb__nptr_find_leaf(n->ptr);
5093 if (!f) f = stb__nptr_make_leaf(n->ptr);
5094 n->next_in_block = f->pointers;
5095 f->pointers = n;
5096 } else
5097 p = &(n->next_in_block);
5098 }
5099}
5100
5101void stb_nptr_realloc(void *new_address, void *old_address, int len)
5102{
5103 if (new_address == old_address) return;
5104
5105 // have to move the pointers first, because moving the targets
5106 // requires writing to the pointers-to-the-targets, and if some of those moved too,
5107 // we need to make sure we don't write to the old memory
5108
5109 // step one: move all pointers within the block
5110 stb__nptr_block(old_address, len, stb__nptr_move_pointers, (char *) new_address - (char *) old_address);
5111 // step two: move all targets within the block
5112 stb__nptr_block(old_address, len, stb__nptr_move_targets, (char *) new_address - (char *) old_address);
5113}
5114
5115void stb_nptr_move(void *new_address, void *old_address)
5116{
5117 stb_nptr_realloc(new_address, old_address, 1);
5118}
5119
5120void stb_nptr_recache(void)
5121{
5122 int i,j;
5123 for (i=0; i < STB__NPTR_ROOT_NUM; ++i)
5124 if (stb__memtab_root[i])
5125 for (j=0; j < STB__NPTR_NODE_NUM; ++j)
5126 if (stb__memtab_root[i]->children[j]) {
5127 stb__nptr *p = stb__memtab_root[i]->children[j]->pointers;
5128 while (p) {
5129 stb_nptr_didset(p->ptr);
5130 p = p->next_in_block;
5131 }
5132 }
5133}
5134
5135#endif // STB_DEFINE
5136#endif // STB_NPTR
5137
5138
5140//
5141// File Processing
5142//
5143
5144
5145#ifdef _WIN32
5146 #define stb_rename(x,y) _wrename((const wchar_t *)stb__from_utf8(x), (const wchar_t *)stb__from_utf8_alt(y))
5147#else
5148 #define stb_rename rename
5149#endif
5150
5151STB_EXTERN void stb_fput_varlen64(FILE *f, stb_uint64 v);
5152STB_EXTERN stb_uint64 stb_fget_varlen64(FILE *f);
5153STB_EXTERN int stb_size_varlen64(stb_uint64 v);
5154
5155
5156#define stb_filec (char *) stb_file
5157#define stb_fileu (unsigned char *) stb_file
5158STB_EXTERN void * stb_file(char *filename, size_t *length);
5159STB_EXTERN void * stb_file_max(char *filename, size_t *length);
5160STB_EXTERN size_t stb_filelen(FILE *f);
5161STB_EXTERN int stb_filewrite(char *filename, void *data, size_t length);
5162STB_EXTERN int stb_filewritestr(char *filename, char *data);
5163STB_EXTERN char ** stb_stringfile(char *filename, int *len);
5164STB_EXTERN char ** stb_stringfile_trimmed(char *name, int *len, char comm);
5165STB_EXTERN char * stb_fgets(char *buffer, int buflen, FILE *f);
5166STB_EXTERN char * stb_fgets_malloc(FILE *f);
5167STB_EXTERN int stb_fexists(char *filename);
5168STB_EXTERN int stb_fcmp(char *s1, char *s2);
5169STB_EXTERN int stb_feq(char *s1, char *s2);
5170STB_EXTERN time_t stb_ftimestamp(char *filename);
5171
5172STB_EXTERN int stb_fullpath(char *abs, int abs_size, char *rel);
5173STB_EXTERN FILE * stb_fopen(char *filename, const char *mode);
5174STB_EXTERN int stb_fclose(FILE *f, int keep);
5175
5176enum
5177{
5178 stb_keep_no = 0,
5179 stb_keep_yes = 1,
5180 stb_keep_if_different = 2,
5181};
5182
5183STB_EXTERN int stb_copyfile(char *src, char *dest);
5184
5185STB_EXTERN void stb_fput_varlen64(FILE *f, stb_uint64 v);
5186STB_EXTERN stb_uint64 stb_fget_varlen64(FILE *f);
5187STB_EXTERN int stb_size_varlen64(stb_uint64 v);
5188
5189STB_EXTERN void stb_fwrite32(FILE *f, stb_uint32 datum);
5190STB_EXTERN void stb_fput_varlen (FILE *f, int v);
5191STB_EXTERN void stb_fput_varlenu(FILE *f, unsigned int v);
5192STB_EXTERN int stb_fget_varlen (FILE *f);
5193STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_fget_varlenu(FILE *f);
5194STB_EXTERN void stb_fput_ranged (FILE *f, int v, int b, stb_uint n);
5195STB_EXTERN int stb_fget_ranged (FILE *f, int b, stb_uint n);
5196STB_EXTERN int stb_size_varlen (int v);
5197STB_EXTERN int stb_size_varlenu(unsigned int v);
5198STB_EXTERN int stb_size_ranged (int b, stb_uint n);
5199
5200STB_EXTERN int stb_fread(void *data, size_t len, size_t count, void *f);
5201STB_EXTERN int stb_fwrite(void *data, size_t len, size_t count, void *f);
5202
5203#if 0
5204typedef struct
5205{
5206 FILE *base_file;
5207 char *buffer;
5208 int buffer_size;
5209 int buffer_off;
5210 int buffer_left;
5211} STBF;
5212
5213STB_EXTERN STBF *stb_tfopen(char *filename, char *mode);
5214STB_EXTERN int stb_tfread(void *data, size_t len, size_t count, STBF *f);
5215STB_EXTERN int stb_tfwrite(void *data, size_t len, size_t count, STBF *f);
5216#endif
5217
5218#ifdef STB_DEFINE
5219
5220#if 0
5221STBF *stb_tfopen(char *filename, char *mode)
5222{
5223 STBF *z;
5224 FILE *f = stb_p_fopen(filename, mode);
5225 if (!f) return NULL;
5226 z = (STBF *) malloc(sizeof(*z));
5227 if (!z) { fclose(f); return NULL; }
5228 z->base_file = f;
5229 if (!strcmp(mode, "rb") || !strcmp(mode, "wb")) {
5230 z->buffer_size = 4096;
5231 z->buffer_off = z->buffer_size;
5232 z->buffer_left = 0;
5233 z->buffer = malloc(z->buffer_size);
5234 if (!z->buffer) { free(z); fclose(f); return NULL; }
5235 } else {
5236 z->buffer = 0;
5237 z->buffer_size = 0;
5238 z->buffer_left = 0;
5239 }
5240 return z;
5241}
5242
5243int stb_tfread(void *data, size_t len, size_t count, STBF *f)
5244{
5245 int total = len*count, done=0;
5246 if (!total) return 0;
5247 if (total <= z->buffer_left) {
5248 memcpy(data, z->buffer + z->buffer_off, total);
5249 z->buffer_off += total;
5250 z->buffer_left -= total;
5251 return count;
5252 } else {
5253 char *out = (char *) data;
5254
5255 // consume all buffered data
5256 memcpy(data, z->buffer + z->buffer_off, z->buffer_left);
5257 done = z->buffer_left;
5258 out += z->buffer_left;
5259 z->buffer_left=0;
5260
5261 if (total-done > (z->buffer_size >> 1)) {
5262 done += fread(out
5263 }
5264 }
5265}
5266#endif
5267
5268void stb_fwrite32(FILE *f, stb_uint32 x)
5269{
5270 fwrite(&x, 4, 1, f);
5271}
5272
5273#if defined(_WIN32)
5274 #define stb__stat _stat
5275#else
5276 #define stb__stat stat
5277#endif
5278
5279int stb_fexists(char *filename)
5280{
5281 struct stb__stat buf;
5282 return stb__windows(
5283 _wstat((const wchar_t *)stb__from_utf8(filename), &buf),
5284 stat(filename,&buf)
5285 ) == 0;
5286}
5287
5288time_t stb_ftimestamp(char *filename)
5289{
5290 struct stb__stat buf;
5291 if (stb__windows(
5292 _wstat((const wchar_t *)stb__from_utf8(filename), &buf),
5293 stat(filename,&buf)
5294 ) == 0)
5295 {
5296 return buf.st_mtime;
5297 } else {
5298 return 0;
5299 }
5300}
5301
5302size_t stb_filelen(FILE *f)
5303{
5304 long len, pos;
5305 pos = ftell(f);
5306 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
5307 len = ftell(f);
5308 fseek(f, pos, SEEK_SET);
5309 return (size_t) len;
5310}
5311
5312void *stb_file(char *filename, size_t *length)
5313{
5314 FILE *f = stb__fopen(filename, "rb");
5315 char *buffer;
5316 size_t len, len2;
5317 if (!f) return NULL;
5318 len = stb_filelen(f);
5319 buffer = (char *) malloc(len+2); // nul + extra
5320 len2 = fread(buffer, 1, len, f);
5321 if (len2 == len) {
5322 if (length) *length = len;
5323 buffer[len] = 0;
5324 } else {
5325 free(buffer);
5326 buffer = NULL;
5327 }
5328 fclose(f);
5329 return buffer;
5330}
5331
5332int stb_filewrite(char *filename, void *data, size_t length)
5333{
5334 FILE *f = stb_fopen(filename, "wb");
5335 if (f) {
5336 unsigned char *data_ptr = (unsigned char *) data;
5337 size_t remaining = length;
5338 while (remaining > 0) {
5339 size_t len2 = remaining > 65536 ? 65536 : remaining;
5340 size_t len3 = fwrite(data_ptr, 1, len2, f);
5341 if (len2 != len3) {
5342 fprintf(stderr, "Failed while writing %s\n", filename);
5343 break;
5344 }
5345 remaining -= len2;
5346 data_ptr += len2;
5347 }
5348 stb_fclose(f, stb_keep_if_different);
5349 }
5350 return f != NULL;
5351}
5352
5353int stb_filewritestr(char *filename, char *data)
5354{
5355 return stb_filewrite(filename, data, strlen(data));
5356}
5357
5358void * stb_file_max(char *filename, size_t *length)
5359{
5360 FILE *f = stb__fopen(filename, "rb");
5361 char *buffer;
5362 size_t len, maxlen;
5363 if (!f) return NULL;
5364 maxlen = *length;
5365 buffer = (char *) malloc(maxlen+1);
5366 len = fread(buffer, 1, maxlen, f);
5367 buffer[len] = 0;
5368 fclose(f);
5369 *length = len;
5370 return buffer;
5371}
5372
5373char ** stb_stringfile(char *filename, int *plen)
5374{
5375 FILE *f = stb__fopen(filename, "rb");
5376 char *buffer, **list=NULL, *s;
5377 size_t len, count, i;
5378
5379 if (!f) return NULL;
5380 len = stb_filelen(f);
5381 buffer = (char *) malloc(len+1);
5382 len = fread(buffer, 1, len, f);
5383 buffer[len] = 0;
5384 fclose(f);
5385
5386 // two passes through: first time count lines, second time set them
5387 for (i=0; i < 2; ++i) {
5388 s = buffer;
5389 if (i == 1)
5390 list[0] = s;
5391 count = 1;
5392 while (*s) {
5393 if (*s == '\n' || *s == '\r') {
5394 // detect if both cr & lf are together
5395 int crlf = (s[0] + s[1]) == ('\n' + '\r');
5396 if (i == 1) *s = 0;
5397 if (crlf) ++s;
5398 if (s[1]) { // it's not over yet
5399 if (i == 1) list[count] = s+1;
5400 ++count;
5401 }
5402 }
5403 ++s;
5404 }
5405 if (i == 0) {
5406 list = (char **) malloc(sizeof(*list) * (count+1) + len+1);
5407 if (!list) return NULL;
5408 list[count] = 0;
5409 // recopy the file so there's just a single allocation to free
5410 memcpy(&list[count+1], buffer, len+1);
5411 free(buffer);
5412 buffer = (char *) &list[count+1];
5413 if (plen) *plen = (int) count;
5414 }
5415 }
5416 return list;
5417}
5418
5419char ** stb_stringfile_trimmed(char *name, int *len, char comment)
5420{
5421 int i,n,o=0;
5422 char **s = stb_stringfile(name, &n);
5423 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
5424 for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
5425 char *p = stb_skipwhite(s[i]);
5426 if (*p && *p != comment)
5427 s[o++] = p;
5428 }
5429 s[o] = NULL;
5430 if (len) *len = o;
5431 return s;
5432}
5433
5434char * stb_fgets(char *buffer, int buflen, FILE *f)
5435{
5436 char *p;
5437 buffer[0] = 0;
5438 p = fgets(buffer, buflen, f);
5439 if (p) {
5440 int n = (int) (strlen(p)-1);
5441 if (n >= 0)
5442 if (p[n] == '\n')
5443 p[n] = 0;
5444 }
5445 return p;
5446}
5447
5448char * stb_fgets_malloc(FILE *f)
5449{
5450 // avoid reallocing for small strings
5451 char quick_buffer[800];
5452 quick_buffer[sizeof(quick_buffer)-2] = 0;
5453 if (!fgets(quick_buffer, sizeof(quick_buffer), f))
5454 return NULL;
5455
5456 if (quick_buffer[sizeof(quick_buffer)-2] == 0) {
5457 size_t n = strlen(quick_buffer);
5458 if (n > 0 && quick_buffer[n-1] == '\n')
5459 quick_buffer[n-1] = 0;
5460 return stb_p_strdup(quick_buffer);
5461 } else {
5462 char *p;
5463 char *a = stb_p_strdup(quick_buffer);
5464 size_t len = sizeof(quick_buffer)-1;
5465
5466 while (!feof(f)) {
5467 if (a[len-1] == '\n') break;
5468 a = (char *) realloc(a, len*2);
5469 p = &a[len];
5470 p[len-2] = 0;
5471 if (!fgets(p, (int) len, f))
5472 break;
5473 if (p[len-2] == 0) {
5474 len += strlen(p);
5475 break;
5476 }
5477 len = len + (len-1);
5478 }
5479 if (a[len-1] == '\n')
5480 a[len-1] = 0;
5481 return a;
5482 }
5483}
5484
5485int stb_fullpath(char *abs, int abs_size, char *rel)
5486{
5487 #ifdef _WIN32
5488 return _fullpath(abs, rel, abs_size) != NULL;
5489 #else
5490 if (rel[0] == '/' || rel[0] == '~') {
5491 if ((int) strlen(rel) >= abs_size)
5492 return 0;
5493 stb_p_strcpy_s(abs,65536,rel);
5494 return STB_TRUE;
5495 } else {
5496 int n;
5497 getcwd(abs, abs_size);
5498 n = strlen(abs);
5499 if (n+(int) strlen(rel)+2 <= abs_size) {
5500 abs[n] = '/';
5501 stb_p_strcpy_s(abs+n+1, 65536,rel);
5502 return STB_TRUE;
5503 } else {
5504 return STB_FALSE;
5505 }
5506 }
5507 #endif
5508}
5509
5510static int stb_fcmp_core(FILE *f, FILE *g)
5511{
5512 char buf1[1024],buf2[1024];
5513 int n1,n2, res=0;
5514
5515 while (1) {
5516 n1 = (int) fread(buf1, 1, sizeof(buf1), f);
5517 n2 = (int) fread(buf2, 1, sizeof(buf2), g);
5518 res = memcmp(buf1,buf2,stb_min(n1,n2));
5519 if (res)
5520 break;
5521 if (n1 != n2) {
5522 res = n1 < n2 ? -1 : 1;
5523 break;
5524 }
5525 if (n1 == 0)
5526 break;
5527 }
5528
5529 fclose(f);
5530 fclose(g);
5531 return res;
5532}
5533
5534int stb_fcmp(char *s1, char *s2)
5535{
5536 FILE *f = stb__fopen(s1, "rb");
5537 FILE *g = stb__fopen(s2, "rb");
5538
5539 if (f == NULL || g == NULL) {
5540 if (f) fclose(f);
5541 if (g) {
5542 fclose(g);
5543 return STB_TRUE;
5544 }
5545 return f != NULL;
5546 }
5547
5548 return stb_fcmp_core(f,g);
5549}
