8175 if (b->p[i] != NULL)
8176 p[n++] = b->p[i];
8177 break;
8178 }
8179 case STB_ps_array: {
8180 stb_ps_array *a = GetArray(ps);
8181 p = (void **) malloc(sizeof(*p) * a->count);
8182 memcpy(p, a->p, sizeof(*p) * a->count);
8183 *count = a->count;
8184 return p;
8185 }
8186 case STB_ps_hash: {
8187 stb_ps_hash *h = GetHash(ps);
8188 p = (void **) malloc(sizeof(*p) * h->count);
8189 for (i=0; i < h->size; ++i)
8190 if (!stb_ps_empty((size_t)h->table[i]))
8191 p[n++] = h->table[i];
8192 break;
8193 }
8194 }
8195 *count = n;
8196 return p;
8197}
8198
8199int stb_ps_writelist(stb_ps *ps, void **list, int size )
8200{
8201 int i,n=0;
8202 switch (3 & (int)(size_t) ps) {
8203 case STB_ps_direct:
8204 if (ps == NULL || size <= 0) return 0;
8205 list[0] = ps;
8206 return 1;
8207 case STB_ps_bucket: {
8208 stb_ps_bucket *b = GetBucket(ps);
8209 for (i=0; i < STB_BUCKET_SIZE; ++i)
8210 if (b->p[i] != NULL && n < size)
8211 list[n++] = b->p[i];
8212 return n;
8213 }
8214 case STB_ps_array: {
8215 stb_ps_array *a = GetArray(ps);
8216 n = stb_min(size, a->count);
8217 memcpy(list, a->p, sizeof(*list) * n);
8218 return n;
8219 }
8220 case STB_ps_hash: {
8221 stb_ps_hash *h = GetHash(ps);
8222 if (size <= 0) return 0;
8223 for (i=0; i < h->count; ++i) {
8224 if (!stb_ps_empty((size_t)h->table[i])) {
8225 list[n++] = h->table[i];
8226 if (n == size) break;
8227 }
8228 }
8229 return n;
8230 }
8231 }
8232 return 0; /* NOTREACHED */
8233}
8234
8235int stb_ps_enum(stb_ps *ps, void *data, int (*func)(void *value, void *data))
8236{
8237 int i;
8238 switch (3 & (int)(size_t) ps) {
8239 case STB_ps_direct:
8240 if (ps == NULL) return STB_TRUE;
8241 return func(ps, data);
8242 case STB_ps_bucket: {
8243 stb_ps_bucket *b = GetBucket(ps);
8244 for (i=0; i < STB_BUCKET_SIZE; ++i)
8245 if (b->p[i] != NULL)
8246 if (!func(b->p[i], data))
8247 return STB_FALSE;
8248 return STB_TRUE;
8249 }
8250 case STB_ps_array: {
8251 stb_ps_array *a = GetArray(ps);
8252 for (i=0; i < a->count; ++i)
8253 if (!func(a->p[i], data))
8254 return STB_FALSE;
8255 return STB_TRUE;
8256 }
8257 case STB_ps_hash: {
8258 stb_ps_hash *h = GetHash(ps);
8259 for (i=0; i < h->count; ++i)
8260 if (!stb_ps_empty((size_t)h->table[i]))
8261 if (!func(h->table[i], data))
8262 return STB_FALSE;
8263 return STB_TRUE;
8264 }
8265 }
8266 return STB_TRUE; /* NOTREACHED */
8267}
8268
8269int stb_ps_count (stb_ps *ps)
8270{
8271 switch (3 & (int)(size_t) ps) {
8272 case STB_ps_direct:
8273 return ps != NULL;
8274 case STB_ps_bucket: {
8275 stb_ps_bucket *b = GetBucket(ps);
8276 return (b->p[0] != NULL) + (b->p[1] != NULL) +
8277 (b->p[2] != NULL) + (b->p[3] != NULL);
8278 }
8279 case STB_ps_array: {
8280 stb_ps_array *a = GetArray(ps);
8281 return a->count;
8282 }
8283 case STB_ps_hash: {
8284 stb_ps_hash *h = GetHash(ps);
8285 return h->count;
8286 }
8287 }
8288 return 0;
8289}
8290
8291void ** stb_ps_fastlist(stb_ps *ps, int *count)
8292{
8293 static void *storage;
8294
8295 switch (3 & (int)(size_t) ps) {
8296 case STB_ps_direct:
8297 if (ps == NULL) { *count = 0; return NULL; }
8298 storage = ps;
8299 *count = 1;
8300 return &storage;
8301 case STB_ps_bucket: {
8302 stb_ps_bucket *b = GetBucket(ps);
8303 *count = STB_BUCKET_SIZE;
8304 return b->p;
8305 }
8306 case STB_ps_array: {
8307 stb_ps_array *a = GetArray(ps);
8308 *count = a->count;
8309 return a->p;
8310 }
8311 case STB_ps_hash: {
8312 stb_ps_hash *h = GetHash(ps);
8313 *count = h->size;
8314 return h->table;
8315 }
8316 }
8317 return NULL; /* NOTREACHED */
8318}
8319
8320int stb_ps_subset(stb_ps *bigger, stb_ps *smaller)
8321{
8322 int i, listlen;
8323 void **list = stb_ps_fastlist(smaller, &listlen);
8324 for(i=0; i < listlen; ++i)
8325 if (stb_ps_fastlist_valid(list[i]))
8326 if (!stb_ps_find(bigger, list[i]))
8327 return 0;
8328 return 1;
8329}
8330
8331int stb_ps_eq(stb_ps *p0, stb_ps *p1)
8332{
8333 if (stb_ps_count(p0) != stb_ps_count(p1))
8334 return 0;
8335 return stb_ps_subset(p0, p1);
8336}
8337
8338#undef GetBucket
8339#undef GetArray
8340#undef GetHash
8341
8342#undef EncodeBucket
8343#undef EncodeArray
8344#undef EncodeHash
8345
8346#endif
8347
8348
8350//
8351// Random Numbers via Meresenne Twister or LCG
8352//
8353
8354STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_srandLCG(unsigned int seed);
8355STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_randLCG(void);
8356STB_EXTERN double stb_frandLCG(void);
8357
8358STB_EXTERN void stb_srand(unsigned int seed);
8359STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_rand(void);
8360STB_EXTERN double stb_frand(void);
8361STB_EXTERN void stb_shuffle(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz,
8362 unsigned int seed);
8363STB_EXTERN void stb_reverse(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz);
8364
8365STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_randLCG_explicit(unsigned int seed);
8366
8367#define stb_rand_define(x,y) \
8368 \
8369 unsigned int x(void) \
8370 { \
8371 static unsigned int stb__rand = y; \
8372 stb__rand = stb__rand * 2147001325 + 715136305; /* BCPL */ \
8373 return 0x31415926 ^ ((stb__rand >> 16) + (stb__rand << 16)); \
8374 }
8375
8376#ifdef STB_DEFINE
8377unsigned int stb_randLCG_explicit(unsigned int seed)
8378{
8379 return seed * 2147001325 + 715136305;
8380}
8381
8382static unsigned int stb__rand_seed=0;
8383
8384unsigned int stb_srandLCG(unsigned int seed)
8385{
8386 unsigned int previous = stb__rand_seed;
8387 stb__rand_seed = seed;
8388 return previous;
8389}
8390
8391unsigned int stb_randLCG(void)
8392{
8393 stb__rand_seed = stb__rand_seed * 2147001325 + 715136305; // BCPL generator
8394 // shuffle non-random bits to the middle, and xor to decorrelate with seed
8395 return 0x31415926 ^ ((stb__rand_seed >> 16) + (stb__rand_seed << 16));
8396}
8397
8398double stb_frandLCG(void)
8399{
8400 return stb_randLCG() / ((double) (1 << 16) * (1 << 16));
8401}
8402
8403void stb_shuffle(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz, unsigned int seed)
8404{
8405 char *a;
8406 unsigned int old_seed;
8407 int i;
8408 if (seed)
8409 old_seed = stb_srandLCG(seed);
8410 a = (char *) p + (n-1) * sz;
8411
8412 for (i=(int) n; i > 1; --i) {
8413 int j = stb_randLCG() % i;
8414 stb_swap(a, (char *) p + j * sz, sz);
8415 a -= sz;
8416 }
8417 if (seed)
8418 stb_srandLCG(old_seed);
8419}
8420
8421void stb_reverse(void *p, size_t n, size_t sz)
8422{
8423 size_t i,j = n-1;
8424 for (i=0; i < j; ++i,--j) {
8425 stb_swap((char *) p + i * sz, (char *) p + j * sz, sz);
8426 }
8427}
8428
8429// public domain Mersenne Twister by Michael Brundage
8430#define STB__MT_LEN 624
8431
8432int stb__mt_index = STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(int)+1;
8433unsigned int stb__mt_buffer[STB__MT_LEN];
8434
8435void stb_srand(unsigned int seed)
8436{
8437 int i;
8438 stb__mt_buffer[0]= seed & 0xffffffffUL;
8439 for (i=1 ; i < STB__MT_LEN; ++i)
8440 stb__mt_buffer[i] = (1812433253UL * (stb__mt_buffer[i-1] ^ (stb__mt_buffer[i-1] >> 30)) + i);
8441 stb__mt_index = STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned int);
8442}
8443
8444#define STB__MT_IA 397
8445#define STB__MT_IB (STB__MT_LEN - STB__MT_IA)
8446#define STB__UPPER_MASK 0x80000000
8447#define STB__LOWER_MASK 0x7FFFFFFF
8448#define STB__MATRIX_A 0x9908B0DF
8449#define STB__TWIST(b,i,j) ((b)[i] & STB__UPPER_MASK) | ((b)[j] & STB__LOWER_MASK)
8450#define STB__MAGIC(s) (((s)&1)*STB__MATRIX_A)
8451
8452unsigned int stb_rand()
8453{
8454 unsigned int * b = stb__mt_buffer;
8455 int idx = stb__mt_index;
8456 unsigned int s,r;
8457 int i;
8458
8459 if (idx >= STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned int)) {
8460 if (idx > STB__MT_LEN*sizeof(unsigned int))
8461 stb_srand(0);
8462 idx = 0;
8463 i = 0;
8464 for (; i < STB__MT_IB; i++) {
8465 s = STB__TWIST(b, i, i+1);
8466 b[i] = b[i + STB__MT_IA] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8467 }
8468 for (; i < STB__MT_LEN-1; i++) {
8469 s = STB__TWIST(b, i, i+1);
8470 b[i] = b[i - STB__MT_IB] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8471 }
8472
8473 s = STB__TWIST(b, STB__MT_LEN-1, 0);
8474 b[STB__MT_LEN-1] = b[STB__MT_IA-1] ^ (s >> 1) ^ STB__MAGIC(s);
8475 }
8476 stb__mt_index = idx + sizeof(unsigned int);
8477
8478 r = *(unsigned int *)((unsigned char *)b + idx);
8479
8480 r ^= (r >> 11);
8481 r ^= (r << 7) & 0x9D2C5680;
8482 r ^= (r << 15) & 0xEFC60000;
8483 r ^= (r >> 18);
8484
8485 return r;
8486}
8487
8488double stb_frand(void)
8489{
8490 return stb_rand() / ((double) (1 << 16) * (1 << 16));
8491}
8492
8493#endif
8494
8495
8497//
8498// stb_dupe
8499//
8500// stb_dupe is a duplicate-finding system for very, very large data
8501// structures--large enough that sorting is too slow, but not so large
8502// that we can't keep all the data in memory. using it works as follows:
8503//
8504// 1. create an stb_dupe:
8505// provide a hash function
8506// provide an equality function
8507// provide an estimate for the size
8508// optionally provide a comparison function
8509//
8510// 2. traverse your data, 'adding' pointers to the stb_dupe
8511//
8512// 3. finish and ask for duplicates
8513//
8514// the stb_dupe will discard its intermediate data and build
8515// a collection of sorted lists of duplicates, with non-duplicate
8516// entries omitted entirely
8517//
8518//
8519// Implementation strategy:
8520//
8521// while collecting the N items, we keep a hash table of approximate
8522// size sqrt(N). (if you tell use the N up front, the hash table is
8523// just that size exactly)
8524//
8525// each entry in the hash table is just an stb__arr of pointers (no need
8526// to use stb_ps, because we don't need to delete from these)
8527//
8528// for step 3, for each entry in the hash table, we apply stb_dupe to it
8529// recursively. once the size gets small enough (or doesn't decrease
8530// significantly), we switch to either using qsort() on the comparison
8531// function, or else we just do the icky N^2 gather
8532
8533
8534typedef struct stb_dupe stb_dupe;
8535
8536typedef int (*stb_compare_func)(void *a, void *b);
8537typedef int (*stb_hash_func)(void *a, unsigned int seed);
8538
8539STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_free(stb_dupe *sd);
8540STB_EXTERN stb_dupe *stb_dupe_create(stb_hash_func hash,
8541 stb_compare_func eq, int size, stb_compare_func ineq);
8542STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_add(stb_dupe *sd, void *item);
8543STB_EXTERN void stb_dupe_finish(stb_dupe *sd);
8544STB_EXTERN int stb_dupe_numsets(stb_dupe *sd);
8545STB_EXTERN void **stb_dupe_set(stb_dupe *sd, int num);
8546STB_EXTERN int stb_dupe_set_count(stb_dupe *sd, int num);
8547
8548struct stb_dupe
8549{
8550 void ***hash_table;
8551 int hash_size;
8552 int size_log2;
8553 int population;
8554
8555 int hash_shift;
8556 stb_hash_func hash;
8557
8558 stb_compare_func eq;
8559 stb_compare_func ineq;
8560
8561 void ***dupes;
8562};
8563
8564#ifdef STB_DEFINE
8565
8566int stb_dupe_numsets(stb_dupe *sd)
8567{
8568 assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8569 return stb_arr_len(sd->dupes);
8570}
8571
8572void **stb_dupe_set(stb_dupe *sd, int num)
8573{
8574 assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8575 return sd->dupes[num];
8576}
8577
8578int stb_dupe_set_count(stb_dupe *sd, int num)
8579{
8580 assert(sd->hash_table == NULL);
8581 return stb_arr_len(sd->dupes[num]);
8582}
8583
8584stb_dupe *stb_dupe_create(stb_hash_func hash, stb_compare_func eq, int size,
8585 stb_compare_func ineq)
8586{
8587 int i, hsize;
8588 stb_dupe *sd = (stb_dupe *) malloc(sizeof(*sd));
8589
8590 sd->size_log2 = 4;
8591 hsize = 1 << sd->size_log2;
8592 while (hsize * hsize < size) {
8593 ++sd->size_log2;
8594 hsize *= 2;
8595 }
8596
8597 sd->hash = hash;
8598 sd->eq = eq;
8599 sd->ineq = ineq;
8600 sd->hash_shift = 0;
8601
8602 sd->population = 0;
8603 sd->hash_size = hsize;
8604 sd->hash_table = (void ***) malloc(sizeof(*sd->hash_table) * hsize);
8605 for (i=0; i < hsize; ++i)
8606 sd->hash_table[i] = NULL;
8607
8608 sd->dupes = NULL;
8609
8610 return sd;
8611}
8612
8613void stb_dupe_add(stb_dupe *sd, void *item)
8614{
8615 stb_uint32 hash = sd->hash(item, sd->hash_shift);
8616 int z = hash & (sd->hash_size-1);
8617 stb_arr_push(sd->hash_table[z], item);
8618 ++sd->population;
8619}
8620
8621void stb_dupe_free(stb_dupe *sd)
8622{
8623 int i;
8624 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(sd->dupes); ++i)
8625 if (sd->dupes[i])
8626 stb_arr_free(sd->dupes[i]);
8627 stb_arr_free(sd->dupes);
8628 free(sd);
8629}
8630
8631static stb_compare_func stb__compare;
8632
8633static int stb__dupe_compare(const void *a, const void *b)
8634{
8635 void *p = *(void **) a;
8636 void *q = *(void **) b;
8637
8638 return stb__compare(p,q);
8639}
8640
8641void stb_dupe_finish(stb_dupe *sd)
8642{
8643 int i,j,k;
8644 assert(sd->dupes == NULL);
8645 for (i=0; i < sd->hash_size; ++i) {
8646 void ** list = sd->hash_table[i];
8647 if (list != NULL) {
8648 int n = stb_arr_len(list);
8649 // @TODO: measure to find good numbers instead of just making them up!
8650 int thresh = (sd->ineq ? 200 : 20);
8651 // if n is large enough to be worth it, and n is smaller than
8652 // before (so we can guarantee we'll use a smaller hash table);
8653 // and there are enough hash bits left, assuming full 32-bit hash
8654 if (n > thresh && n < (sd->population >> 3) && sd->hash_shift + sd->size_log2*2 < 32) {
8655
8656 // recursively process this row using stb_dupe, O(N log log N)
8657
8658 stb_dupe *d = stb_dupe_create(sd->hash, sd->eq, n, sd->ineq);
8659 d->hash_shift = stb_randLCG_explicit(sd->hash_shift);
8660 for (j=0; j < n; ++j)
8661 stb_dupe_add(d, list[j]);
8662 stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8663 stb_dupe_finish(d);
8664 for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(d->dupes); ++j) {
8665 stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, d->dupes[j]);
8666 d->dupes[j] = NULL; // take over ownership
8667 }
8668 stb_dupe_free(d);
8669
8670 } else if (sd->ineq) {
8671
8672 // process this row using qsort(), O(N log N)
8673 stb__compare = sd->ineq;
8674 qsort(list, n, sizeof(list[0]), stb__dupe_compare);
8675
8676 // find equal subsequences of the list
8677 for (j=0; j < n-1; ) {
8678 // find a subsequence from j..k
8679 for (k=j; k < n; ++k)
8680 // only use ineq so eq can be left undefined
8681 if (sd->ineq(list[j], list[k]))
8682 break;
8683 // k is the first one not in the subsequence
8684 if (k-j > 1) {
8685 void **mylist = NULL;
8686 stb_arr_setlen(mylist, k-j);
8687 memcpy(mylist, list+j, sizeof(list[j]) * (k-j));
8688 stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, mylist);
8689 }
8690 j = k;
8691 }
8692 stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8693 } else {
8694
8695 // process this row using eq(), O(N^2)
8696 for (j=0; j < n; ++j) {
8697 if (list[j] != NULL) {
8698 void **output = NULL;
8699 for (k=j+1; k < n; ++k) {
8700 if (sd->eq(list[j], list[k])) {
8701 if (output == NULL)
8702 stb_arr_push(output, list[j]);
8703 stb_arr_push(output, list[k]);
8704 list[k] = NULL;
8705 }
8706 }
8707 list[j] = NULL;
8708 if (output)
8709 stb_arr_push(sd->dupes, output);
8710 }
8711 }
8712 stb_arr_free(sd->hash_table[i]);
8713 }
8714 }
8715 }
8716 free(sd->hash_table);
8717 sd->hash_table = NULL;
8718}
8719#endif
8720
8722//
8723// templatized Sort routine
8724//
8725// This is an attempt to implement a templated sorting algorithm.
8726// To use it, you have to explicitly instantiate it as a _function_,
8727// then you call that function. This allows the comparison to be inlined,
8728// giving the sort similar performance to C++ sorts.
8729//
8730// It implements quicksort with three-way-median partitioning (generally
8731// well-behaved), with a final insertion sort pass.
8732//
8733// When you define the compare expression, you should assume you have
8734// elements of your array pointed to by 'a' and 'b', and perform the comparison
8735// on those. OR you can use one or more statements; first say '0;', then
8736// write whatever code you want, and compute the result into a variable 'c'.
8737
8738#define stb_declare_sort(FUNCNAME, TYPE) \
8739 void FUNCNAME(TYPE *p, int n)
8740#define stb_define_sort(FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE) \
8741 stb__define_sort( void, FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE)
8742#define stb_define_sort_static(FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE) \
8743 stb__define_sort(static void, FUNCNAME,TYPE,COMPARE)
8744
8745#define stb__define_sort(MODE, FUNCNAME, TYPE, COMPARE) \
8746 \
8747static void STB_(FUNCNAME,_ins_sort)(TYPE *p, int n) \
8748{ \
8749 int i,j; \
8750 for (i=1; i < n; ++i) { \
8751 TYPE t = p[i], *a = &t; \
8752 j = i; \
8753 while (j > 0) { \
8754 TYPE *b = &p[j-1]; \
8755 int c = COMPARE; \
8756 if (!c) break; \
8757 p[j] = p[j-1]; \
8758 --j; \
8759 } \
8760 if (i != j) \
8761 p[j] = t; \
8762 } \
8763} \
8764 \
8765static void STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(TYPE *p, int n) \
8766{ \
8767 /* threshold for transitioning to insertion sort */ \
8768 while (n > 12) { \
8769 TYPE *a,*b,t; \
8770 int c01,c12,c,m,i,j; \
8771 \
8772 /* compute median of three */ \
8773 m = n >> 1; \
8774 a = &p[0]; \
8775 b = &p[m]; \
8776 c = COMPARE; \
8777 c01 = c; \
8778 a = &p[m]; \
8779 b = &p[n-1]; \
8780 c = COMPARE; \
8781 c12 = c; \
8782 /* if 0 >= mid >= end, or 0 < mid < end, then use mid */ \
8783 if (c01 != c12) { \
8784 /* otherwise, we'll need to swap something else to middle */ \
8785 int z; \
8786 a = &p[0]; \
8787 b = &p[n-1]; \
8788 c = COMPARE; \
8789 /* 0>mid && mid<n: 0>n => n; 0<n => 0 */ \
8790 /* 0<mid && mid>n: 0>n => 0; 0<n => n */ \
8791 z = (c == c12) ? 0 : n-1; \
8792 t = p[z]; \
8793 p[z] = p[m]; \
8794 p[m] = t; \
8795 } \
8796 /* now p[m] is the median-of-three */ \
8797 /* swap it to the beginning so it won't move around */ \
8798 t = p[0]; \
8799 p[0] = p[m]; \
8800 p[m] = t; \
8801 \
8802 /* partition loop */ \
8803 i=1; \
8804 j=n-1; \
8805 for(;;) { \
8806 /* handling of equality is crucial here */ \
8807 /* for sentinels & efficiency with duplicates */ \
8808 b = &p[0]; \
8809 for (;;++i) { \
8810 a=&p[i]; \
8811 c = COMPARE; \
8812 if (!c) break; \
8813 } \
8814 a = &p[0]; \
8815 for (;;--j) { \
8816 b=&p[j]; \
8817 c = COMPARE; \
8818 if (!c) break; \
8819 } \
8820 /* make sure we haven't crossed */ \
8821 if (i >= j) break; \
8822 t = p[i]; \
8823 p[i] = p[j]; \
8824 p[j] = t; \
8825 \
8826 ++i; \
8827 --j; \
8828 } \
8829 /* recurse on smaller side, iterate on larger */ \
8830 if (j < (n-i)) { \
8831 STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(p,j); \
8832 p = p+i; \
8833 n = n-i; \
8834 } else { \
8835 STB_(FUNCNAME,_quicksort)(p+i, n-i); \
8836 n = j; \
8837 } \
8838 } \
8839} \
8840 \
8841MODE FUNCNAME(TYPE *p, int n) \
8842{ \
8843 STB_(FUNCNAME, _quicksort)(p, n); \
8844 STB_(FUNCNAME, _ins_sort)(p, n); \
8845} \
8846
8847
8849//
8850// stb_bitset an array of booleans indexed by integers
8851//
8852
8853typedef stb_uint32 stb_bitset;
8854
8855STB_EXTERN stb_bitset *stb_bitset_new(int value, int len);
8856
8857#define stb_bitset_clearall(arr,len) (memset(arr, 0, 4 * (len)))
8858#define stb_bitset_setall(arr,len) (memset(arr, 255, 4 * (len)))
8859
8860#define stb_bitset_setbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] |= (1 << (n & 31)))
8861#define stb_bitset_clearbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] &= ~(1 << (n & 31)))
8862#define stb_bitset_testbit(arr,n) ((arr)[(n) >> 5] & (1 << (n & 31)))
8863
8864STB_EXTERN stb_bitset *stb_bitset_union(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8865
8866STB_EXTERN int *stb_bitset_getlist(stb_bitset *out, int start, int end);
8867
8868STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_eq(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8869STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_disjoint(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8870STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_disjoint_0(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8871STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_subset(stb_bitset *bigger, stb_bitset *smaller, int len);
8872STB_EXTERN int stb_bitset_unioneq_changed(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len);
8873
8874#ifdef STB_DEFINE
8875int stb_bitset_eq(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8876{
8877 int i;
8878 for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8879 if (p0[i] != p1[i]) return 0;
8880 return 1;
8881}
8882
8883int stb_bitset_disjoint(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8884{
8885 int i;
8886 for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8887 if (p0[i] & p1[i]) return 0;
8888 return 1;
8889}
8890
8891int stb_bitset_disjoint_0(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8892{
8893 int i;
8894 for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8895 if ((p0[i] | p1[i]) != 0xffffffff) return 0;
8896 return 1;
8897}
8898
8899int stb_bitset_subset(stb_bitset *bigger, stb_bitset *smaller, int len)
8900{
8901 int i;
8902 for (i=0; i < len; ++i)
8903 if ((bigger[i] & smaller[i]) != smaller[i]) return 0;
8904 return 1;
8905}
8906
8907stb_bitset *stb_bitset_union(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8908{
8909 int i;
8910 stb_bitset *d = (stb_bitset *) malloc(sizeof(*d) * len);
8911 for (i=0; i < len; ++i) d[i] = p0[i] | p1[i];
8912 return d;
8913}
8914
8915int stb_bitset_unioneq_changed(stb_bitset *p0, stb_bitset *p1, int len)
8916{
8917 int i, changed=0;
8918 for (i=0; i < len; ++i) {
8919 stb_bitset d = p0[i] | p1[i];
8920 if (d != p0[i]) {
8921 p0[i] = d;
8922 changed = 1;
8923 }
8924 }
8925 return changed;
8926}
8927
8928stb_bitset *stb_bitset_new(int value, int len)
8929{
8930 int i;
8931 stb_bitset *d = (stb_bitset *) malloc(sizeof(*d) * len);
8932 if (value) value = 0xffffffff;
8933 for (i=0; i < len; ++i) d[i] = value;
8934 return d;
8935}
8936
8937int *stb_bitset_getlist(stb_bitset *out, int start, int end)
8938{
8939 int *list = NULL;
8940 int i;
8941 for (i=start; i < end; ++i)
8942 if (stb_bitset_testbit(out, i))
8943 stb_arr_push(list, i);
8944 return list;
8945}
8946#endif
8947
8949//
8950// stb_wordwrap quality word-wrapping for fixed-width fonts
8951//
8952
8953STB_EXTERN int stb_wordwrap(int *pairs, int pair_max, int count, char *str);
8954STB_EXTERN int *stb_wordwrapalloc(int count, char *str);
8955
8956#ifdef STB_DEFINE
8957
8958int stb_wordwrap(int *pairs, int pair_max, int count, char *str)
8959{
8960 int n=0,i=0, start=0,nonwhite=0;
8961 if (pairs == NULL) pair_max = 0x7ffffff0;
8962 else pair_max *= 2;
8963 // parse
8964 for(;;) {
8965 int s=i; // first whitespace char; last nonwhite+1
8966 int w; // word start
8967 // accept whitespace
8968 while (isspace(str[i])) {
8969 if (str[i] == '\n' || str[i] == '\r') {
8970 if (str[i] + str[i+1] == '\n' + '\r') ++i;
8971 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8972 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8973 n += 2;
8974 nonwhite=0;
8975 start = i+1;
8976 s = start;
8977 }
8978 ++i;
8979 }
8980 if (i >= start+count) {
8981 // we've gone off the end using whitespace
8982 if (nonwhite) {
8983 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8984 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
8985 n += 2;
8986 start = s = i;
8987 nonwhite=0;
8988 } else {
8989 // output all the whitespace
8990 while (i >= start+count) {
8991 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
8992 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
8993 n += 2;
8994 start += count;
8995 }
8996 s = start;
8997 }
8998 }
8999
9000 if (str[i] == 0) break;
9001 // now scan out a word and see if it fits
9002 w = i;
9003 while (str[i] && !isspace(str[i])) {
9004 ++i;
9005 }
9006 // wrapped?
9007 if (i > start + count) {
9008 // huge?
9009 if (i-s <= count) {
9010 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
9011 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
9012 n += 2;
9013 start = w;
9014 } else {
9015 // This word is longer than one line. If we wrap it onto N lines
9016 // there are leftover chars. do those chars fit on the cur line?
9017 // But if we have leading whitespace, we force it to start here.
9018 if ((w-start) + ((i-w) % count) <= count || !nonwhite) {
9019 // output a full line
9020 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
9021 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
9022 n += 2;
9023 start += count;
9024 w = start;
9025 } else {
9026 // output a partial line, trimming trailing whitespace
9027 if (s != start) {
9028 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
9029 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = s-start;
9030 n += 2;
9031 start = w;
9032 }
9033 }
9034 // now output full lines as needed
9035 while (start + count <= i) {
9036 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
9037 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = count;
9038 n += 2;
9039 start += count;
9040 }
9041 }
9042 }
9043 nonwhite=1;
9044 }
9045 if (start < i) {
9046 if (n >= pair_max) return -1;
9047 if (pairs) pairs[n] = start, pairs[n+1] = i-start;
9048 n += 2;
9049 }
9050 return n>>1;
9051}
9052
9053int *stb_wordwrapalloc(int count, char *str)
9054{
9055 int n = stb_wordwrap(NULL,0,count,str);
9056 int *z = NULL;
9057 stb_arr_setlen(z, n*2);
9058 stb_wordwrap(z, n, count, str);
9059 return z;
9060}
9061#endif
9062
9063
9065//
9066// stb_match: wildcards and regexping
9067//
9068
9069STB_EXTERN int stb_wildmatch (char *expr, char *candidate);
9070STB_EXTERN int stb_wildmatchi(char *expr, char *candidate);
9071STB_EXTERN int stb_wildfind (char *expr, char *candidate);
9072STB_EXTERN int stb_wildfindi (char *expr, char *candidate);
9073
9074STB_EXTERN int stb_regex(char *regex, char *candidate);
9075
9076typedef struct stb_matcher stb_matcher;
9077
9078STB_EXTERN stb_matcher *stb_regex_matcher(char *regex);
9079STB_EXTERN int stb_matcher_match(stb_matcher *m, char *str);
9080STB_EXTERN int stb_matcher_find(stb_matcher *m, char *str);
9081STB_EXTERN void stb_matcher_free(stb_matcher *f);
9082
9083STB_EXTERN stb_matcher *stb_lex_matcher(void);
9084STB_EXTERN int stb_lex_item(stb_matcher *m, const char *str, int result);
9085STB_EXTERN int stb_lex_item_wild(stb_matcher *matcher, const char *regex, int result);
9086STB_EXTERN int stb_lex(stb_matcher *m, char *str, int *len);
9087
9088
9089
9090#ifdef STB_DEFINE
9091
9092static int stb__match_qstring(char *candidate, char *qstring, int qlen, int insensitive)
9093{
9094 int i;
9095 if (insensitive) {
9096 for (i=0; i < qlen; ++i)
9097 if (qstring[i] == '?') {
9098 if (!candidate[i]) return 0;
9099 } else
9100 if (tolower(qstring[i]) != tolower(candidate[i]))
9101 return 0;
9102 } else {
9103 for (i=0; i < qlen; ++i)
9104 if (qstring[i] == '?') {
9105 if (!candidate[i]) return 0;
9106 } else
9107 if (qstring[i] != candidate[i])
9108 return 0;
9109 }
9110 return 1;
9111}
9112
9113static int stb__find_qstring(char *candidate, char *qstring, int qlen, int insensitive)
9114{
9115 char c;
9116
9117 int offset=0;
9118 while (*qstring == '?') {
9119 ++qstring;
9120 --qlen;
9121 ++candidate;
9122 if (qlen == 0) return 0;
9123 if (*candidate == 0) return -1;
9124 }
9125
9126 c = *qstring++;
9127 --qlen;
9128 if (insensitive) c = tolower(c);
9129
9130 while (candidate[offset]) {
9131 if (c == (insensitive ? tolower(candidate[offset]) : candidate[offset]))
9132 if (stb__match_qstring(candidate+offset+1, qstring, qlen, insensitive))
9133 return offset;
9134 ++offset;
9135 }
9136
9137 return -1;
9138}
9139
9140int stb__wildmatch_raw2(char *expr, char *candidate, int search, int insensitive)
9141{
9142 int where=0;
9143 int start = -1;
9144
9145 if (!search) {
9146 // parse to first '*'
9147 if (*expr != '*')
9148 start = 0;
9149 while (*expr != '*') {
9150 if (!*expr)
9151 return *candidate == 0 ? 0 : -1;
9152 if (*expr == '?') {
9153 if (!*candidate) return -1;
9154 } else {
9155 if (insensitive) {
9156 if (tolower(*candidate) != tolower(*expr))
9157 return -1;
9158 } else
9159 if (*candidate != *expr)
9160 return -1;
9161 }
9162 ++candidate, ++expr, ++where;
9163 }
9164 } else {
9165 // 0-length search string
9166 if (!*expr)
9167 return 0;
9168 }
9169
9170 assert(search || *expr == '*');
9171 if (!search)
9172 ++expr;
9173
9174 // implicit '*' at this point
9175
9176 while (*expr) {
9177 int o=0;
9178 // combine redundant * characters
9179 while (expr[0] == '*') ++expr;
9180
9181 // ok, at this point, expr[-1] == '*',
9182 // and expr[0] != '*'
9183
9184 if (!expr[0]) return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
9185
9186 // now find next '*'
9187 o = 0;
9188 while (expr[o] != '*') {
9189 if (expr[o] == 0)
9190 break;
9191 ++o;
9192 }
9193 // if no '*', scan to end, then match at end
9194 if (expr[o] == 0 && !search) {
9195 int z;
9196 for (z=0; z < o; ++z)
9197 if (candidate[z] == 0)
9198 return -1;
9199 while (candidate[z])
9200 ++z;
9201 // ok, now check if they match
9202 if (stb__match_qstring(candidate+z-o, expr, o, insensitive))
9203 return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
9204 return -1;
9205 } else {
9206 // if yes '*', then do stb__find_qmatch on the intervening chars
9207 int n = stb__find_qstring(candidate, expr, o, insensitive);
9208 if (n < 0)
9209 return -1;
9210 if (start < 0)
9211 start = where + n;
9212 expr += o;
9213 candidate += n+o;
9214 }
9215
9216 if (*expr == 0) {
9217 assert(search);
9218 return start;
9219 }
9220
9221 assert(*expr == '*');
9222 ++expr;
9223 }
9224
9225 return start >= 0 ? start : 0;
9226}
9227
9228int stb__wildmatch_raw(char *expr, char *candidate, int search, int insensitive)
9229{
9230 char buffer[256];
9231 // handle multiple search strings
9232 char *s = strchr(expr, ';');
9233 char *last = expr;
9234 while (s) {
9235 int z;
9236 // need to allow for non-writeable strings... assume they're small
9237 if (s - last < 256) {
9238 stb_strncpy(buffer, last, (int) (s-last+1));
9239 buffer[s-last] = 0;
9240 z = stb__wildmatch_raw2(buffer, candidate, search, insensitive);
9241 } else {
9242 *s = 0;
9243 z = stb__wildmatch_raw2(last, candidate, search, insensitive);
9244 *s = ';';
9245 }
9246 if (z >= 0) return z;
9247 last = s+1;
9248 s = strchr(last, ';');
9249 }
9250 return stb__wildmatch_raw2(last, candidate, search, insensitive);
9251}
9252
9253int stb_wildmatch(char *expr, char *candidate)
9254{
9255 return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 0,0) >= 0;
9256}
9257
9258int stb_wildmatchi(char *expr, char *candidate)
9259{
9260 return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 0,1) >= 0;
9261}
9262
9263int stb_wildfind(char *expr, char *candidate)
9264{
9265 return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 1,0);
9266}
9267
9268int stb_wildfindi(char *expr, char *candidate)
9269{
9270 return stb__wildmatch_raw(expr, candidate, 1,1);
9271}
9272
9273typedef struct
9274{
9275 stb_int16 transition[256];
9276} stb_dfa;
9277
9278// an NFA node represents a state you're in; it then has
9279// an arbitrary number of edges dangling off of it
9280// note this isn't utf8-y
9281typedef struct
9282{
9283 stb_int16 match; // character/set to match
9284 stb_uint16 node; // output node to go to
9285} stb_nfa_edge;
9286
9287typedef struct
9288{
9289 stb_int16 goal; // does reaching this win the prize?
9290 stb_uint8 active; // is this in the active list
9291 stb_nfa_edge *out;
9292 stb_uint16 *eps; // list of epsilon closures
9293} stb_nfa_node;
9294
9295#define STB__DFA_UNDEF -1
9296#define STB__DFA_GOAL -2
9297#define STB__DFA_END -3
9298#define STB__DFA_MGOAL -4
9299#define STB__DFA_VALID 0
9300
9301#define STB__NFA_STOP_GOAL -1
9302
9303// compiled regexp
9304struct stb_matcher
9305{
9306 stb_uint16 start_node;
9307 stb_int16 dfa_start;
9308 stb_uint32 *charset;
9309 int num_charset;
9310 int match_start;
9311 stb_nfa_node *nodes;
9312 int does_lex;
9313
9314 // dfa matcher
9315 stb_dfa * dfa;
9316 stb_uint32 * dfa_mapping;
9317 stb_int16 * dfa_result;
9318 int num_words_per_dfa;
9319};
9320
9321static int stb__add_node(stb_matcher *matcher)
9322{
9323 stb_nfa_node z;
9324 z.active = 0;
9325 z.eps = 0;
9326 z.goal = 0;
9327 z.out = 0;
9328 stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes, z);
9329 return stb_arr_len(matcher->nodes)-1;
9330}
9331
9332static void stb__add_epsilon(stb_matcher *matcher, int from, int to)
9333{
9334 assert(from != to);
9335 if (matcher->nodes[from].eps == NULL)
9336 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes[from].eps, matcher);
9337 stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes[from].eps, to);
9338}
9339
9340static void stb__add_edge(stb_matcher *matcher, int from, int to, int type)
9341{
9342 stb_nfa_edge z = { (stb_int16)type, (stb_uint16)to };
9343 if (matcher->nodes[from].out == NULL)
9344 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes[from].out, matcher);
9345 stb_arr_push(matcher->nodes[from].out, z);
9346}
9347
9348static char *stb__reg_parse_alt(stb_matcher *m, int s, char *r, stb_uint16 *e);
9349static char *stb__reg_parse(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *regex, stb_uint16 *end)
9350{
9351 int n;
9352 int last_start = -1;
9353 stb_uint16 last_end = start;
9354
9355 while (*regex) {
9356 switch (*regex) {
9357 case '(':
9358 last_start = last_end;
9359 regex = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, last_end, regex+1, &last_end);
9360 if (regex == NULL || *regex != ')')
9361 return NULL;
9362 ++regex;
9363 break;
9364
9365 case '|':
9366 case ')':
9367 *end = last_end;
9368 return regex;
9369
9370 case '?':
9371 if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9372 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_start, last_end);
9373 ++regex;
9374 break;
9375
9376 case '*':
9377 if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9378 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_start, last_end);
9379
9380 // fall through
9381
9382 case '+':
9383 if (last_start < 0) return NULL;
9384 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, last_start);
9385 // prevent links back to last_end from chaining to last_start
9386 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9387 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, n);
9388 last_end = n;
9389 ++regex;
9390 break;
9391
9392 case '{': // not supported!
9393 // @TODO: given {n,m}, clone last_start to last_end m times,
9394 // and include epsilons from start to first m-n blocks
9395 return NULL;
9396
9397 case '\\':
9398 ++regex;
9399 if (!*regex) return NULL;
9400
9401 // fallthrough
9402 default: // match exactly this character
9403 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9404 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, *regex);
9405 last_start = last_end;
9406 last_end = n;
9407 ++regex;
9408 break;
9409
9410 case '$':
9411 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9412 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, '\n');
9413 last_start = last_end;
9414 last_end = n;
9415 ++regex;
9416 break;
9417
9418 case '.':
9419 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9420 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9421 last_start = last_end;
9422 last_end = n;
9423 ++regex;
9424 break;
9425
9426 case '[': {
9427 stb_uint8 flags[256];
9428 int invert = 0,z;
9429 ++regex;
9430 if (matcher->num_charset == 0) {
9431 matcher->charset = (stb_uint *) stb_malloc(matcher, sizeof(*matcher->charset) * 256);
9432 memset(matcher->charset, 0, sizeof(*matcher->charset) * 256);
9433 }
9434
9435 memset(flags,0,sizeof(flags));
9436
9437 // leading ^ is special
9438 if (*regex == '^')
9439 ++regex, invert = 1;
9440
9441 // leading ] is special
9442 if (*regex == ']') {
9443 flags[(int) ']'] = 1;
9444 ++regex;
9445 }
9446 while (*regex != ']') {
9447 stb_uint a;
9448 if (!*regex) return NULL;
9449 a = *regex++;
9450 if (regex[0] == '-' && regex[1] != ']') {
9451 stb_uint i,b = regex[1];
9452 regex += 2;
9453 if (b == 0) return NULL;
9454 if (a > b) return NULL;
9455 for (i=a; i <= b; ++i)
9456 flags[i] = 1;
9457 } else
9458 flags[a] = 1;
9459 }
9460 ++regex;
9461 if (invert) {
9462 int i;
9463 for (i=0; i < 256; ++i)
9464 flags[i] = 1-flags[i];
9465 }
9466
9467 // now check if any existing charset matches
9468 for (z=0; z < matcher->num_charset; ++z) {
9469 int i, k[2] = { 0, 1 << z};
9470 for (i=0; i < 256; ++i) {
9471 unsigned int f = k[flags[i]];
9472 if ((matcher->charset[i] & k[1]) != f)
9473 break;
9474 }
9475 if (i == 256) break;
9476 }
9477
9478 if (z == matcher->num_charset) {
9479 int i;
9480 ++matcher->num_charset;
9481 if (matcher->num_charset > 32) {
9482 assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */
9483 return NULL; // too many charsets, oops
9484 }
9485 for (i=0; i < 256; ++i)
9486 if (flags[i])
9487 matcher->charset[i] |= (1 << z);
9488 }
9489
9490 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9491 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -2 - z);
9492 last_start = last_end;
9493 last_end = n;
9494 break;
9495 }
9496 }
9497 }
9498 *end = last_end;
9499 return regex;
9500}
9501
9502static char *stb__reg_parse_alt(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *regex, stb_uint16 *end)
9503{
9504 stb_uint16 last_end = start;
9505 stb_uint16 main_end;
9506
9507 int head, tail;
9508
9509 head = stb__add_node(matcher);
9510 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, head);
9511
9512 regex = stb__reg_parse(matcher, head, regex, &last_end);
9513 if (regex == NULL) return NULL;
9514 if (*regex == 0 || *regex == ')') {
9515 *end = last_end;
9516 return regex;
9517 }
9518
9519 main_end = last_end;
9520 tail = stb__add_node(matcher);
9521
9522 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, tail);
9523
9524 // start alternatives from the same starting node; use epsilon
9525 // transitions to combine their endings
9526 while(*regex && *regex != ')') {
9527 assert(*regex == '|');
9528 head = stb__add_node(matcher);
9529 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, head);
9530 regex = stb__reg_parse(matcher, head, regex+1, &last_end);
9531 if (regex == NULL)
9532 return NULL;
9533 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, tail);
9534 }
9535
9536 *end = tail;
9537 return regex;
9538}
9539
9540static char *stb__wild_parse(stb_matcher *matcher, int start, char *str, stb_uint16 *end)
9541{
9542 int n;
9543 stb_uint16 last_end;
9544
9545 last_end = stb__add_node(matcher);
9546 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, start, last_end);
9547
9548 while (*str) {
9549 switch (*str) {
9550 // fallthrough
9551 default: // match exactly this character
9552 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9553 if (toupper(*str) == tolower(*str)) {
9554 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, *str);
9555 } else {
9556 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, tolower(*str));
9557 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, toupper(*str));
9558 }
9559 last_end = n;
9560 ++str;
9561 break;
9562
9563 case '?':
9564 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9565 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9566 last_end = n;
9567 ++str;
9568 break;
9569
9570 case '*':
9571 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9572 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, -1);
9573 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, last_end, n);
9574 stb__add_epsilon(matcher, n, last_end);
9575 last_end = n;
9576 ++str;
9577 break;
9578 }
9579 }
9580
9581 // now require end of string to match
9582 n = stb__add_node(matcher);
9583 stb__add_edge(matcher, last_end, n, 0);
9584 last_end = n;
9585
9586 *end = last_end;
9587 return str;
9588}
9589
9590static int stb__opt(stb_matcher *m, int n)
9591{
9592 for(;;) {
9593 stb_nfa_node *p = &m->nodes[n];
9594 if (p->goal) return n;
9595 if (stb_arr_len(p->out)) return n;
9596 if (stb_arr_len(p->eps) != 1) return n;
9597 n = p->eps[0];
9598 }
9599}
9600
9601static void stb__optimize(stb_matcher *m)
9602{
9603 // if the target of any edge is a node with exactly
9604 // one out-epsilon, shorten it
9605 int i,j;
9606 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(m->nodes); ++i) {
9607 stb_nfa_node *p = &m->nodes[i];
9608 for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(p->out); ++j)
9609 p->out[j].node = stb__opt(m,p->out[j].node);
9610 for (j=0; j < stb_arr_len(p->eps); ++j)
9611 p->eps[j] = stb__opt(m,p->eps[j] );
9612 }
9613 m->start_node = stb__opt(m,m->start_node);
9614}
9615
9616void stb_matcher_free(stb_matcher *f)
9617{
9618 stb_free(f);
9619}
9620
9621static stb_matcher *stb__alloc_matcher(void)
9622{
9623 stb_matcher *matcher = (stb_matcher *) stb_malloc(0,sizeof(*matcher));
9624
9625 matcher->start_node = 0;
9626 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->nodes, matcher);
9627 matcher->num_charset = 0;
9628 matcher->match_start = 0;
9629 matcher->does_lex = 0;
9630
9631 matcher->dfa_start = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9632 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa, matcher);
9633 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa_mapping, matcher);
9634 stb_arr_malloc((void **) &matcher->dfa_result, matcher);
9635
9636 stb__add_node(matcher);
9637
9638 return matcher;
9639}
9640
9641static void stb__lex_reset(stb_matcher *matcher)
9642{
9643 // flush cached dfa data
9644 stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa, 0);
9645 stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa_mapping, 0);
9646 stb_arr_setlen(matcher->dfa_result, 0);
9647 matcher->dfa_start = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9648}
9649
9650stb_matcher *stb_regex_matcher(char *regex)
9651{
9652 char *z;
9653 stb_uint16 end;
9654 stb_matcher *matcher = stb__alloc_matcher();
9655 if (*regex == '^') {
9656 matcher->match_start = 1;
9657 ++regex;
9658 }
9659
9660 z = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, matcher->start_node, regex, &end);
9661
9662 if (!z || *z) {
9663 stb_free(matcher);
9664 return NULL;
9665 }
9666
9667 ((matcher->nodes)[(int) end]).goal = STB__NFA_STOP_GOAL;
9668
9669 return matcher;
9670}
9671
9672stb_matcher *stb_lex_matcher(void)
9673{
9674 stb_matcher *matcher = stb__alloc_matcher();
9675
9676 matcher->match_start = 1;
9677 matcher->does_lex = 1;
9678
9679 return matcher;
9680}
9681
9682int stb_lex_item(stb_matcher *matcher, const char *regex, int result)
9683{
9684 char *z;
9685 stb_uint16 end;
9686
9687 z = stb__reg_parse_alt(matcher, matcher->start_node, (char*) regex, &end);
9688
9689 if (z == NULL)
9690 return 0;
9691
9692 stb__lex_reset(matcher);
9693
9694 matcher->nodes[(int) end].goal = result;
9695 return 1;
9696}
9697
9698int stb_lex_item_wild(stb_matcher *matcher, const char *regex, int result)
9699{
9700 char *z;
9701 stb_uint16 end;
9702
9703 z = stb__wild_parse(matcher, matcher->start_node, (char*) regex, &end);
9704
9705 if (z == NULL)
9706 return 0;
9707
9708 stb__lex_reset(matcher);
9709
9710 matcher->nodes[(int) end].goal = result;
9711 return 1;
9712}
9713
9714static void stb__clear(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9715{
9716 int i;
9717 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(list); ++i)
9718 m->nodes[(int) list[i]].active = 0;
9719}
9720
9721static int stb__clear_goalcheck(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9722{
9723 int i, t=0;
9724 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(list); ++i) {
9725 t += m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal;
9726 m->nodes[(int) list[i]].active = 0;
9727 }
9728 return t;
9729}
9730
9731static stb_uint16 * stb__add_if_inactive(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list, int n)
9732{
9733 if (!m->nodes[n].active) {
9734 stb_arr_push(list, n);
9735 m->nodes[n].active = 1;
9736 }
9737 return list;
9738}
9739
9740static stb_uint16 * stb__eps_closure(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9741{
9742 int i,n = stb_arr_len(list);
9743
9744 for(i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9745 stb_uint16 *e = m->nodes[(int) list[i]].eps;
9746 if (e) {
9747 int j,k = stb_arr_len(e);
9748 for (j=0; j < k; ++j)
9749 list = stb__add_if_inactive(m, list, e[j]);
9750 n = stb_arr_len(list);
9751 }
9752 }
9753
9754 return list;
9755}
9756
9757int stb_matcher_match(stb_matcher *m, char *str)
9758{
9759 int result = 0;
9760 int i,j,y,z;
9761 stb_uint16 *previous = NULL;
9762 stb_uint16 *current = NULL;
9763 stb_uint16 *temp;
9764
9765 stb_arr_setsize(previous, 4);
9766 stb_arr_setsize(current, 4);
9767
9768 previous = stb__add_if_inactive(m, previous, m->start_node);
9769 previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9770 stb__clear(m, previous);
9771
9772 while (*str && stb_arr_len(previous)) {
9773 y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9774 for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9775 stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) previous[i]];
9776 z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9777 for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9778 if (n->out[j].match >= 0) {
9779 if (n->out[j].match == *str)
9780 current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9781 } else if (n->out[j].match == -1) {
9782 if (*str != '\n')
9783 current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9784 } else if (n->out[j].match < -1) {
9785 int z = -n->out[j].match - 2;
9786 if (m->charset[(stb_uint8) *str] & (1 << z))
9787 current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9788 }
9789 }
9790 }
9791 stb_arr_setlen(previous, 0);
9792
9793 temp = previous;
9794 previous = current;
9795 current = temp;
9796
9797 previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9798 stb__clear(m, previous);
9799
9800 ++str;
9801 }
9802
9803 // transition to pick up a '$' at the end
9804 y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9805 for (i=0; i < y; ++i)
9806 m->nodes[(int) previous[i]].active = 1;
9807
9808 for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9809 stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) previous[i]];
9810 z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9811 for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9812 if (n->out[j].match == '\n')
9813 current = stb__add_if_inactive(m, current, n->out[j].node);
9814 }
9815 }
9816
9817 previous = stb__eps_closure(m,previous);
9818 stb__clear(m, previous);
9819
9820 y = stb_arr_len(previous);
9821 for (i=0; i < y; ++i)
9822 if (m->nodes[(int) previous[i]].goal)
9823 result = 1;
9824
9825 stb_arr_free(previous);
9826 stb_arr_free(current);
9827
9828 return result && *str == 0;
9829}
9830
9831stb_int16 stb__get_dfa_node(stb_matcher *m, stb_uint16 *list)
9832{
9833 stb_uint16 node;
9834 stb_uint32 data[8], *state, *newstate;
9835 int i,j,n;
9836
9837 state = (stb_uint32 *) stb_temp(data, m->num_words_per_dfa * 4);
9838 memset(state, 0, m->num_words_per_dfa*4);
9839
9840 n = stb_arr_len(list);
9841 for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9842 int x = list[i];
9843 state[x >> 5] |= 1 << (x & 31);
9844 }
9845
9846 // @TODO use a hash table
9847 n = stb_arr_len(m->dfa_mapping);
9848 i=j=0;
9849 for(; j < n; ++i, j += m->num_words_per_dfa) {
9850 // @TODO special case for <= 32
9851 if (!memcmp(state, m->dfa_mapping + j, m->num_words_per_dfa*4)) {
9852 node = i;
9853 goto done;
9854 }
9855 }
9856
9857 assert(stb_arr_len(m->dfa) == i);
9858 node = i;
9859
9860 newstate = stb_arr_addn(m->dfa_mapping, m->num_words_per_dfa);
9861 memcpy(newstate, state, m->num_words_per_dfa*4);
9862
9863 // set all transitions to 'unknown'
9864 stb_arr_add(m->dfa);
9865 memset(m->dfa[i].transition, -1, sizeof(m->dfa[i].transition));
9866
9867 if (m->does_lex) {
9868 int result = -1;
9869 n = stb_arr_len(list);
9870 for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
9871 if (m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal > result)
9872 result = m->nodes[(int) list[i]].goal;
9873 }
9874
9875 stb_arr_push(m->dfa_result, result);
9876 }
9877
9878done:
9879 stb_tempfree(data, state);
9880 return node;
9881}
9882
9883static int stb__matcher_dfa(stb_matcher *m, char *str_c, int *len)
9884{
9885 stb_uint8 *str = (stb_uint8 *) str_c;
9886 stb_int16 node,prevnode;
9887 stb_dfa *trans;
9888 int match_length = 0;
9889 stb_int16 match_result=0;
9890
9891 if (m->dfa_start == STB__DFA_UNDEF) {
9892 stb_uint16 *list;
9893
9894 m->num_words_per_dfa = (stb_arr_len(m->nodes)+31) >> 5;
9895 stb__optimize(m);
9896
9897 list = stb__add_if_inactive(m, NULL, m->start_node);
9898 list = stb__eps_closure(m,list);
9899 if (m->does_lex) {
9900 m->dfa_start = stb__get_dfa_node(m,list);
9901 stb__clear(m, list);
9902 // DON'T allow start state to be a goal state!
9903 // this allows people to specify regexes that can match 0
9904 // characters without them actually matching (also we don't
9905 // check _before_ advancing anyway
9906 if (m->dfa_start <= STB__DFA_MGOAL)
9907 m->dfa_start = -(m->dfa_start - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
9908 } else {
9909 if (stb__clear_goalcheck(m, list))
9910 m->dfa_start = STB__DFA_GOAL;
9911 else
9912 m->dfa_start = stb__get_dfa_node(m,list);
9913 }
9914 stb_arr_free(list);
9915 }
9916
9917 prevnode = STB__DFA_UNDEF;
9918 node = m->dfa_start;
9919 trans = m->dfa;
9920
9921 if (m->dfa_start == STB__DFA_GOAL)
9922 return 1;
9923
9924 for(;;) {
9925 assert(node >= STB__DFA_VALID);
9926
9927 // fast inner DFA loop; especially if STB__DFA_VALID is 0
9928
9929 do {
9930 prevnode = node;
9931 node = trans[node].transition[*str++];
9932 } while (node >= STB__DFA_VALID);
9933
9934 assert(node >= STB__DFA_MGOAL - stb_arr_len(m->dfa));
9935 assert(node < stb_arr_len(m->dfa));
9936
9937 // special case for lex: need _longest_ match, so notice goal
9938 // state without stopping
9939 if (node <= STB__DFA_MGOAL) {
9940 match_length = (int) (str - (stb_uint8 *) str_c);
9941 node = -(node - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
9942 match_result = node;
9943 continue;
9944 }
9945
9946 // slow NFA->DFA conversion
9947
9948 // or we hit the goal or the end of the string, but those
9949 // can only happen once per search...
9950
9951 if (node == STB__DFA_UNDEF) {
9952 // build a list -- @TODO special case <= 32 states
9953 // heck, use a more compact data structure for <= 16 and <= 8 ?!
9954
9955 // @TODO keep states/newstates around instead of reallocating them
9956 stb_uint16 *states = NULL;
9957 stb_uint16 *newstates = NULL;
9958 int i,j,y,z;
9959 stb_uint32 *flags = &m->dfa_mapping[prevnode * m->num_words_per_dfa];
9960 assert(prevnode != STB__DFA_UNDEF);
9961 stb_arr_setsize(states, 4);
9962 stb_arr_setsize(newstates,4);
9963 for (j=0; j < m->num_words_per_dfa; ++j) {
9964 for (i=0; i < 32; ++i) {
9965 if (*flags & (1 << i))
9966 stb_arr_push(states, j*32+i);
9967 }
9968 ++flags;
9969 }
9970 // states is now the states we were in in the previous node;
9971 // so now we can compute what node it transitions to on str[-1]
9972
9973 y = stb_arr_len(states);
9974 for (i=0; i < y; ++i) {
9975 stb_nfa_node *n = &m->nodes[(int) states[i]];
9976 z = stb_arr_len(n->out);
9977 for (j=0; j < z; ++j) {
9978 if (n->out[j].match >= 0) {
9979 if (n->out[j].match == str[-1] || (str[-1] == 0 && n->out[j].match == '\n'))
9980 newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9981 } else if (n->out[j].match == -1) {
9982 if (str[-1] != '\n' && str[-1])
9983 newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9984 } else if (n->out[j].match < -1) {
9985 int z = -n->out[j].match - 2;
9986 if (m->charset[str[-1]] & (1 << z))
9987 newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, n->out[j].node);
9988 }
9989 }
9990 }
9991 // AND add in the start state!
9992 if (!m->match_start || (str[-1] == '\n' && !m->does_lex))
9993 newstates = stb__add_if_inactive(m, newstates, m->start_node);
9994 // AND epsilon close it
9995 newstates = stb__eps_closure(m, newstates);
9996 // if it's a goal state, then that's all there is to it
9997 if (stb__clear_goalcheck(m, newstates)) {
9998 if (m->does_lex) {
9999 match_length = (int) (str - (stb_uint8 *) str_c);
10000 node = stb__get_dfa_node(m,newstates);
10001 match_result = node;
10002 node = -node + STB__DFA_MGOAL;
10003 trans = m->dfa; // could have gotten realloc()ed
10004 } else
10005 node = STB__DFA_GOAL;
10006 } else if (str[-1] == 0 || stb_arr_len(newstates) == 0) {
10007 node = STB__DFA_END;
10008 } else {
10009 node = stb__get_dfa_node(m,newstates);
10010 trans = m->dfa; // could have gotten realloc()ed
10011 }
10012 trans[prevnode].transition[str[-1]] = node;
10013 if (node <= STB__DFA_MGOAL)
10014 node = -(node - STB__DFA_MGOAL);
10015 stb_arr_free(newstates);
10016 stb_arr_free(states);
10017 }
10018
10019 if (node == STB__DFA_GOAL) {
10020 return 1;
10021 }
10022 if (node == STB__DFA_END) {
10023 if (m->does_lex) {
10024 if (match_result) {
10025 if (len) *len = match_length;
10026 return m->dfa_result[(int) match_result];
10027 }
10028 }
10029 return 0;
10030 }
10031
10032 assert(node != STB__DFA_UNDEF);
10033 }
10034}
10035
10036int stb_matcher_find(stb_matcher *m, char *str)
10037{
10038 assert(m->does_lex == 0);
10039 return stb__matcher_dfa(m, str, NULL);
10040}
10041
10042int stb_lex(stb_matcher *m, char *str, int *len)
10043{
10044 assert(m->does_lex);
10045 return stb__matcher_dfa(m, str, len);
10046}
10047
10048#ifdef STB_PERFECT_HASH
10049int stb_regex(char *regex, char *str)
10050{
10051 static stb_perfect p;
10052 static stb_matcher ** matchers;
10053 static char ** regexps;
10054 static char ** regexp_cache;
10055 static unsigned short *mapping;
10056 int z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) regex);
10057 if (z >= 0) {
10058 if (strcmp(regex, regexp_cache[(int) mapping[z]])) {
10059 int i = mapping[z];
10060 stb_matcher_free(matchers[i]);
10061 free(regexp_cache[i]);
10062 regexps[i] = regex;
10063 regexp_cache[i] = stb_p_strdup(regex);
10064 matchers[i] = stb_regex_matcher(regex);
10065 }
10066 } else {
10067 int i,n;
10068 if (regex == NULL) {
10069 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(matchers); ++i) {
10070 stb_matcher_free(matchers[i]);
10071 free(regexp_cache[i]);
10072 }
10073 stb_arr_free(matchers);
10074 stb_arr_free(regexps);
10075 stb_arr_free(regexp_cache);
10076 stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
10077 free(mapping); mapping = NULL;
10078 return -1;
10079 }
10080 stb_arr_push(regexps, regex);
10081 stb_arr_push(regexp_cache, stb_p_strdup(regex));
10082 stb_arr_push(matchers, stb_regex_matcher(regex));
10083 stb_perfect_destroy(&p);
10084 n = stb_perfect_create(&p, (unsigned int *) (char **) regexps, stb_arr_len(regexps));
10085 mapping = (unsigned short *) realloc(mapping, n * sizeof(*mapping));
10086 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(regexps); ++i)
10087 mapping[stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) regexps[i])] = i;
10088 z = stb_perfect_hash(&p, (int)(size_t) regex);
10089 }
10090 return stb_matcher_find(matchers[(int) mapping[z]], str);
10091}
10092#endif
10093#endif // STB_DEFINE
10094
10095
10096#if 0
10098//
10099// C source-code introspection
10100//
10101
10102// runtime structure
10103typedef struct
10104{
10105 char *name;
10106 char *type; // base type
10107 char *comment; // content of comment field
10108 int size; // size of base type
10109 int offset; // field offset
10110 int arrcount[8]; // array sizes; -1 = pointer indirection; 0 = end of list
10111} stb_info_field;
10112
10113typedef struct
10114{
10115 char *structname;
10116 int size;
10117 int num_fields;
10118 stb_info_field *fields;
10119} stb_info_struct;
10120
10121extern stb_info_struct stb_introspect_output[];
10122
10123//
10124
10125STB_EXTERN void stb_introspect_precompiled(stb_info_struct *compiled);
10126STB_EXTERN void stb__introspect(char *path, char *file);
10127
10128#define stb_introspect_ship() stb__introspect(NULL, NULL, stb__introspect_output)
10129
10130#ifdef STB_SHIP
10131#define stb_introspect() stb_introspect_ship()
10132#define stb_introspect_path(p) stb_introspect_ship()
10133#else
10134// bootstrapping: define stb_introspect() (or 'path') the first time
10135#define stb_introspect() stb__introspect(NULL, __FILE__, NULL)
10136#define stb_introspect_auto() stb__introspect(NULL, __FILE__, stb__introspect_output)
10137
10138#define stb_introspect_path(p) stb__introspect(p, __FILE__, NULL)
10139#define stb_introspect_path(p) stb__introspect(p, __FILE__, NULL)
10140#endif
10141
10142#ifdef STB_DEFINE
10143
10144#ifndef STB_INTROSPECT_CPP
10145 #ifdef __cplusplus
10146 #define STB_INTROSPECT_CPP 1
10147 #else
10148 #define STB_INTROSPECT_CPP 0
10149 #endif
10150#endif
10151
10152void stb_introspect_precompiled(stb_info_struct *compiled)
10153{
10154
10155}
10156
10157
10158static void stb__introspect_filename(char *buffer, char *path)
10159{
10160 #if STB_INTROSPECT_CPP
10161 stb_p_sprintf(buffer stb_p_size(9999), "%s/stb_introspect.cpp", path);
10162 #else
10163 stb_p_sprintf(buffer stb_p_size(9999), "%s/stb_introspect.c", path);
10164 #endif
10165}
10166
10167static void stb__introspect_compute(char *path, char *file)
10168{
10169 int i;
10170 char ** include_list = NULL;
10171 char ** introspect_list = NULL;
10172 FILE *f;
10173 f = stb_p_fopen(file, "w");
10174 if (!f) return;
10175
10176 fputs("// if you get compiler errors, change the following 0 to a 1:\n", f);
10177 fputs("#define STB_INTROSPECT_INVALID 0\n\n", f);
10178 fputs("// this will force the code to compile, and force the introspector\n", f);
10179 fputs("// to run and then exit, allowing you to recompile\n\n\n", f);
10180 fputs("#include \"stb.h\"\n\n",f );
10181 fputs("#if STB_INTROSPECT_INVALID\n", f);
10182 fputs(" stb_info_struct stb__introspect_output[] = { (void *) 1 }\n", f);
10183 fputs("#else\n\n", f);
10184 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(include_list); ++i)
10185 fprintf(f, " #include \"%s\"\n", include_list[i]);
10186
10187 fputs(" stb_info_struct stb__introspect_output[] =\n{\n", f);
10188 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(introspect_list); ++i)
10189 fprintf(f, " stb_introspect_%s,\n", introspect_list[i]);
10190 fputs(" };\n", f);
10191 fputs("#endif\n", f);
10192 fclose(f);
10193}
10194
10195static stb_info_struct *stb__introspect_info;
10196
10197#ifndef STB_SHIP
10198
10199#endif
10200
10201void stb__introspect(char *path, char *file, stb_info_struct *compiled)
10202{
10203 static int first=1;
10204 if (!first) return;
10205 first=0;
10206
10207 stb__introspect_info = compiled;
10208
10209 #ifndef STB_SHIP
10210 if (path || file) {
10211 int bail_flag = compiled && compiled[0].structname == (void *) 1;
10212 int needs_building = bail_flag;
10213 struct stb__stat st;
10214 char buffer[1024], buffer2[1024];
10215 if (!path) {
10216 stb_splitpath(buffer, file, STB_PATH);
10217 path = buffer;
10218 }
10219 // bail if the source path doesn't exist
10220 if (!stb_fexists(path)) return;
10221
10222 stb__introspect_filename(buffer2, path);
10223
10224 // get source/include files timestamps, compare to output-file timestamp;
10225 // if mismatched, regenerate
10226
10227 if (stb__stat(buffer2, &st))
10228 needs_building = STB_TRUE;
10229
10230 {
10231 // find any file that contains an introspection command and is newer
10232 // if needs_building is already true, we don't need to do this test,
10233 // but we still need these arrays, so go ahead and get them
10234 char **all[3];
10235 all[0] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.h");
10236 all[1] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.c");
10237 all[2] = stb_readdir_files_mask(path, "*.cpp");
10238 int i,j;
10239 if (needs_building) {
10240 for (j=0; j < 3; ++j) {
10241 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(all[j]); ++i) {
10242 struct stb__stat st2;
10243 if (!stb__stat(all[j][i], &st2)) {
10244 if (st.st_mtime < st2.st_mtime) {
10245 char *z = stb_filec(all[j][i], NULL);
10246 int found=STB_FALSE;
10247 while (y) {
10248 y = strstr(y, "//si");
10249 if (y && isspace(y[4])) {
10250 found = STB_TRUE;
10251 break;
10252 }
10253 }
10254 needs_building = STB_TRUE;
10255 goto done;
10256 }
10257 }
10258 }
10259 }
10260 done:;
10261 }
10262 char *z = stb_filec(all[i], NULL), *y = z;
10263 int found=STB_FALSE;
10264 while (y) {
10265 y = strstr(y, "//si");
10266 if (y && isspace(y[4])) {
10267 found = STB_TRUE;
10268 break;
10269 }
10270 }
10271 if (found)
10272 stb_arr_push(introspect_h, stb_p_strdup(all[i]));
10273 free(z);
10274 }
10275 }
10276 stb_readdir_free(all);
10277 if (!needs_building) {
10278 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(introspect_h); ++i) {
10279 struct stb__stat st2;
10280 if (!stb__stat(introspect_h[i], &st2))
10281 if (st.st_mtime < st2.st_mtime)
10282 needs_building = STB_TRUE;
10283 }
10284 }
10285
10286 if (needs_building) {
10287 stb__introspect_compute(path, buffer2);
10288 }
10289 }
10290 }
10291 #endif
10292}
10293#endif
10294#endif
10295
10296#ifdef STB_INTROSPECT
10297// compile-time code-generator
10298#define INTROSPECT(x) int main(int argc, char **argv) { stb__introspect(__FILE__); return 0; }
10299#define FILE(x)
10300
10301void stb__introspect(char *filename)
10302{
10303 char *file = stb_file(filename, NULL);
10304 char *s = file, *t, **p;
10305 char *out_name = "stb_introspect.c";
10306 char *out_path;
10307 STB_ARR(char) filelist = NULL;
10308 int i,n;
10309 if (!file) stb_fatal("Couldn't open %s", filename);
10310
10311 out_path = stb_splitpathdup(filename, STB_PATH);
10312
10313 // search for the macros
10314 while (*s) {
10315 char buffer[256];
10316 while (*s && !isupper(*s)) ++s;
10317 s = stb_strtok_invert(buffer, s, "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ");
10318 s = stb_skipwhite(s);
10319 if (*s == '(') {
10320 ++s;
10321 t = strchr(s, ')');
10322 if (t == NULL) stb_fatal("Error parsing %s", filename);
10323
10324 }
10325 }
10326}
10327
10328
10329
10330#endif
10331
10332
10334//
10335// STB-C sliding-window dictionary compression
10336//
10337// This uses a DEFLATE-style sliding window, but no bitwise entropy.
10338// Everything is on byte boundaries, so you could then apply a byte-wise
10339// entropy code, though that's nowhere near as effective.
10340//
10341// An STB-C stream begins with a 16-byte header:
10342// 4 bytes: 0x57 0xBC 0x00 0x00
10343// 8 bytes: big-endian size of decompressed data, 64-bits
10344// 4 bytes: big-endian size of window (how far back decompressor may need)
10345//
10346// The following symbols appear in the stream (these were determined ad hoc,
10347// not by analysis):
10348//
10349// [dict] 00000100 yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx
10350// [END] 00000101 11111010 cccccccc cccccccc cccccccc cccccccc
10351// [dict] 00000110 yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10352// [literals] 00000111 zzzzzzzz zzzzzzzz
10353// [literals] 00001zzz zzzzzzzz
10354// [dict] 00010yyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx
10355// [dict] 00011yyy yyyyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10356// [literals] 001zzzzz
10357// [dict] 01yyyyyy yyyyyyyy xxxxxxxx
10358// [dict] 1xxxxxxx yyyyyyyy
10359//
10360// xxxxxxxx: match length - 1
10361// yyyyyyyy: backwards distance - 1
10362// zzzzzzzz: num literals - 1
10363// cccccccc: adler32 checksum of decompressed data
10364// (all big-endian)
10365
10366
10367STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_decompress_length(stb_uchar *input);
10368STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_decompress(stb_uchar *out,stb_uchar *in,stb_uint len);
10369STB_EXTERN stb_uint stb_compress (stb_uchar *out,stb_uchar *in,stb_uint len);
10370STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_window(int z);
10371STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_hashsize(unsigned int z);
10372
10373STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_tofile(char *filename, char *in, stb_uint len);
10374STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_intofile(FILE *f, char *input, stb_uint len);
10375STB_EXTERN char *stb_decompress_fromfile(char *filename, stb_uint *len);
10376
10377STB_EXTERN int stb_compress_stream_start(FILE *f);
10378STB_EXTERN void stb_compress_stream_end(int close);
10379STB_EXTERN void stb_write(char *data, int data_len);
10380
10381#ifdef STB_DEFINE
10382
10383stb_uint stb_decompress_length(stb_uchar *input)
10384{
10385 return (input[8] << 24) + (input[9] << 16) + (input[10] << 8) + input[11];
10386}
10387
10389
10390// simple implementation that just writes whole thing into big block
10391
10392static unsigned char *stb__barrier;
10393static unsigned char *stb__barrier2;
10394static unsigned char *stb__barrier3;
10395static unsigned char *stb__barrier4;
10396
10397static stb_uchar *stb__dout;
10398static void stb__match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10399{
10400 // INVERSE of memmove... write each byte before copying the next...
10401 assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10402 if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10403 if (data < stb__barrier4) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10404 while (length--) *stb__dout++ = *data++;
10405}
10406
10407static void stb__lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10408{
10409 assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10410 if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10411 if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10412 memcpy(stb__dout, data, length);
10413 stb__dout += length;
10414}
10415
10416#define stb__in2(x) ((i[x] << 8) + i[(x)+1])
10417#define stb__in3(x) ((i[x] << 16) + stb__in2((x)+1))
10418#define stb__in4(x) ((i[x] << 24) + stb__in3((x)+1))
10419
10420static stb_uchar *stb_decompress_token(stb_uchar *i)
10421{
10422 if (*i >= 0x20) { // use fewer if's for cases that expand small
10423 if (*i >= 0x80) stb__match(stb__dout-i[1]-1, i[0] - 0x80 + 1), i += 2;
10424 else if (*i >= 0x40) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in2(0) - 0x4000 + 1), i[2]+1), i += 3;
10425 else /* *i >= 0x20 */ stb__lit(i+1, i[0] - 0x20 + 1), i += 1 + (i[0] - 0x20 + 1);
10426 } else { // more ifs for cases that expand large, since overhead is amortized
10427 if (*i >= 0x18) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x180000 + 1), i[3]+1), i += 4;
10428 else if (*i >= 0x10) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x100000 + 1), stb__in2(3)+1), i += 5;
10429 else if (*i >= 0x08) stb__lit(i+2, stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1), i += 2 + (stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1);
10430 else if (*i == 0x07) stb__lit(i+3, stb__in2(1) + 1), i += 3 + (stb__in2(1) + 1);
10431 else if (*i == 0x06) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), i[4]+1), i += 5;
10432 else if (*i == 0x04) stb__match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), stb__in2(4)+1), i += 6;
10433 }
10434 return i;
10435}
10436
10437stb_uint stb_decompress(stb_uchar *output, stb_uchar *i, stb_uint length)
10438{
10439 stb_uint olen;
10440 if (stb__in4(0) != 0x57bC0000) return 0;
10441 if (stb__in4(4) != 0) return 0; // error! stream is > 4GB
10442 olen = stb_decompress_length(i);
10443 stb__barrier2 = i;
10444 stb__barrier3 = i+length;
10445 stb__barrier = output + olen;
10446 stb__barrier4 = output;
10447 i += 16;
10448
10449 stb__dout = output;
10450 while (1) {
10451 stb_uchar *old_i = i;
10452 i = stb_decompress_token(i);
10453 if (i == old_i) {
10454 if (*i == 0x05 && i[1] == 0xfa) {
10455 assert(stb__dout == output + olen);
10456 if (stb__dout != output + olen) return 0;
10457 if (stb_adler32(1, output, olen) != (stb_uint) stb__in4(2))
10458 return 0;
10459 return olen;
10460 } else {
10461 assert(0); /* NOTREACHED */
10462 return 0;
10463 }
10464 }
10465 assert(stb__dout <= output + olen);
10466 if (stb__dout > output + olen)
10467 return 0;
10468 }
10469}
10470
10471char *stb_decompress_fromfile(char *filename, unsigned int *len)
10472{
10473 unsigned int n;
10474 char *q;
10475 unsigned char *p;
10476 FILE *f = stb_p_fopen(filename, "rb"); if (f == NULL) return NULL;
10477 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
10478 n = ftell(f);
10479 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
10480 p = (unsigned char * ) malloc(n); if (p == NULL) return NULL;
10481 fread(p, 1, n, f);
10482 fclose(f);
10483 if (p == NULL) return NULL;
10484 if (p[0] != 0x57 || p[1] != 0xBc || p[2] || p[3]) { free(p); return NULL; }
10485 q = (char *) malloc(stb_decompress_length(p)+1);
10486 if (!q) { free(p); return NULL; }
10487 *len = stb_decompress((unsigned char *) q, p, n);
10488 if (*len) q[*len] = 0;
10489 free(p);
10490 return q;
10491}
10492
10493#if 0
10494// streaming decompressor
10495
10496static struct
10497{
10498 stb__uchar *in_buffer;
10499 stb__uchar *match;
10500
10501 stb__uint pending_literals;
10502 stb__uint pending_match;
10503} xx;
10504
10505
10506
10507static void stb__match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10508{
10509 // INVERSE of memmove... write each byte before copying the next...
10510 assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10511 if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10512 if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10513 while (length--) *stb__dout++ = *data++;
10514}
10515
10516static void stb__lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10517{
10518 assert (stb__dout + length <= stb__barrier);
10519 if (stb__dout + length > stb__barrier) { stb__dout += length; return; }
10520 if (data < stb__barrier2) { stb__dout = stb__barrier+1; return; }
10521 memcpy(stb__dout, data, length);
10522 stb__dout += length;
10523}
10524
10525static void sx_match(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10526{
10527 xx.match = data;
10528 xx.pending_match = length;
10529}
10530
10531static void sx_lit(stb_uchar *data, stb_uint length)
10532{
10533 xx.pending_lit = length;
10534}
10535
10536static int stb_decompress_token_state(void)
10537{
10538 stb__uchar *i = xx.in_buffer;
10539
10540 if (*i >= 0x20) { // use fewer if's for cases that expand small
10541 if (*i >= 0x80) sx_match(stb__dout-i[1]-1, i[0] - 0x80 + 1), i += 2;
10542 else if (*i >= 0x40) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in2(0) - 0x4000 + 1), i[2]+1), i += 3;
10543 else /* *i >= 0x20 */ sx_lit(i+1, i[0] - 0x20 + 1), i += 1;
10544 } else { // more ifs for cases that expand large, since overhead is amortized
10545 if (*i >= 0x18) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x180000 + 1), i[3]+1), i += 4;
10546 else if (*i >= 0x10) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(0) - 0x100000 + 1), stb__in2(3)+1), i += 5;
10547 else if (*i >= 0x08) sx_lit(i+2, stb__in2(0) - 0x0800 + 1), i += 2;
10548 else if (*i == 0x07) sx_lit(i+3, stb__in2(1) + 1), i += 3;
10549 else if (*i == 0x06) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), i[4]+1), i += 5;
10550 else if (*i == 0x04) sx_match(stb__dout-(stb__in3(1)+1), stb__in2(4)+1), i += 6;
10551 else return 0;
10552 }
10553 xx.in_buffer = i;
10554 return 1;
10555}
10556#endif
10557
10558
10559
10561
10562static unsigned int stb_matchlen(stb_uchar *m1, stb_uchar *m2, stb_uint maxlen)
10563{
10564 stb_uint i;
10565 for (i=0; i < maxlen; ++i)
10566 if (m1[i] != m2[i]) return i;
10567 return i;
10568}
10569
10570// simple implementation that just takes the source data in a big block
10571
10572static stb_uchar *stb__out;
10573static FILE *stb__outfile;
10574static stb_uint stb__outbytes;
10575
10576static void stb__write(unsigned char v)
10577{
10578 fputc(v, stb__outfile);
10579 ++stb__outbytes;
10580}
10581
10582#define stb_out(v) (stb__out ? (void)(*stb__out++ = (stb_uchar) (v)) : stb__write((stb_uchar) (v)))
10583
10584static void stb_out2(stb_uint v)
10585{
10586 stb_out(v >> 8);
10587 stb_out(v);
10588}
10589
10590static void stb_out3(stb_uint v) { stb_out(v >> 16); stb_out(v >> 8); stb_out(v); }
10591static void stb_out4(stb_uint v) { stb_out(v >> 24); stb_out(v >> 16);
10592 stb_out(v >> 8 ); stb_out(v); }
10593
10594static void outliterals(stb_uchar *in, ptrdiff_t numlit)
10595{
10596 while (numlit > 65536) {
10597 outliterals(in,65536);
10598 in += 65536;
10599 numlit -= 65536;
10600 }
10601
10602 if (numlit == 0) ;
10603 else if (numlit <= 32) stb_out (0x000020 + (stb_uint) numlit-1);
10604 else if (numlit <= 2048) stb_out2(0x000800 + (stb_uint) numlit-1);
10605 else /* numlit <= 65536) */ stb_out3(0x070000 + (stb_uint) numlit-1);
10606
10607 if (stb__out) {
10608 memcpy(stb__out,in,numlit);
10609 stb__out += numlit;
10610 } else
10611 fwrite(in, 1, numlit, stb__outfile);
10612}
10613
10614static int stb__window = 0x40000; // 256K
10615void stb_compress_window(int z)
10616{
10617 if (z >= 0x1000000) z = 0x1000000; // limit of implementation
10618 if (z < 0x100) z = 0x100; // insanely small
10619 stb__window = z;
10620}
10621
10622static int stb_not_crap(int best, int dist)
10623{
10624 return ((best > 2 && dist <= 0x00100)
10625 || (best > 5 && dist <= 0x04000)
10626 || (best > 7 && dist <= 0x80000));
10627}
10628
10629static stb_uint stb__hashsize = 32768;
10630void stb_compress_hashsize(unsigned int y)
10631{
10632 unsigned int z = 1024;
10633 while (z < y) z <<= 1;
10634 stb__hashsize = z >> 2; // pass in bytes, store #pointers
10635}
10636
10637// note that you can play with the hashing functions all you
10638// want without needing to change the decompressor
10639#define stb__hc(q,h,c) (((h) << 7) + ((h) >> 25) + q[c])
10640#define stb__hc2(q,h,c,d) (((h) << 14) + ((h) >> 18) + (q[c] << 7) + q[d])
10641#define stb__hc3(q,c,d,e) ((q[c] << 14) + (q[d] << 7) + q[e])
10642
10643static stb_uint32 stb__running_adler;
10644
10645static int stb_compress_chunk(stb_uchar *history,
10646 stb_uchar *start,
10647 stb_uchar *end,
10648 int length,
10649 int *pending_literals,
10650 stb_uchar **chash,
10651 stb_uint mask)
10652{
10653 int window = stb__window;
10654 stb_uint match_max;
10655 stb_uchar *lit_start = start - *pending_literals;
10656 stb_uchar *q = start;
10657
10658 #define STB__SCRAMBLE(h) (((h) + ((h) >> 16)) & mask)
10659
10660 // stop short of the end so we don't scan off the end doing
10661 // the hashing; this means we won't compress the last few bytes
10662 // unless they were part of something longer
10663 while (q < start+length && q+12 < end) {
10664 int m;
10665 stb_uint h1,h2,h3,h4, h;
10666 stb_uchar *t;
10667 int best = 2, dist=0;
10668
10669 if (q+65536 > end)
10670 match_max = (stb_uint) (end-q);
10671 else
10672 match_max = 65536u;
10673
10674 #define stb__nc(b,d) ((d) <= window && ((b) > 9 || stb_not_crap(b,d)))
10675
10676 #define STB__TRY(t,p) /* avoid retrying a match we already tried */ \
10677 if (p ? dist != (int) (q-t) : 1) \
10678 if ((m = (int) stb_matchlen(t, q, match_max)) > best)\
10679 if (stb__nc(m,(int) (q-(t)))) \
10680 best = m, dist = (int) (q - (t))
10681
10682 // rather than search for all matches, only try 4 candidate locations,
10683 // chosen based on 4 different hash functions of different lengths.
10684 // this strategy is inspired by LZO; hashing is unrolled here using the
10685 // 'hc' macro
10686 h = stb__hc3(q,0, 1, 2); h1 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10687 t = chash[h1]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,0);
10688 h = stb__hc2(q,h, 3, 4); h2 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10689 h = stb__hc2(q,h, 5, 6); t = chash[h2]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10690 h = stb__hc2(q,h, 7, 8); h3 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10691 h = stb__hc2(q,h, 9,10); t = chash[h3]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10692 h = stb__hc2(q,h,11,12); h4 = STB__SCRAMBLE(h);
10693 t = chash[h4]; if (t) STB__TRY(t,1);
10694
10695 // because we use a shared hash table, can only update it
10696 // _after_ we've probed all of them
10697 chash[h1] = chash[h2] = chash[h3] = chash[h4] = q;
10698
10699 if (best > 2)
10700 assert(dist > 0);
10701
10702 // see if our best match qualifies
10703 if (best < 3) { // fast path literals
10704 ++q;
10705 } else if (best > 2 && best <= 0x80 && dist <= 0x100) {
10706 outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10707 stb_out(0x80 + best-1);
10708 stb_out(dist-1);
10709 } else if (best > 5 && best <= 0x100 && dist <= 0x4000) {
10710 outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10711 stb_out2(0x4000 + dist-1);
10712 stb_out(best-1);
10713 } else if (best > 7 && best <= 0x100 && dist <= 0x80000) {
10714 outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10715 stb_out3(0x180000 + dist-1);
10716 stb_out(best-1);
10717 } else if (best > 8 && best <= 0x10000 && dist <= 0x80000) {
10718 outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10719 stb_out3(0x100000 + dist-1);
10720 stb_out2(best-1);
10721 } else if (best > 9 && dist <= 0x1000000) {
10722 if (best > 65536) best = 65536;
10723 outliterals(lit_start, q-lit_start); lit_start = (q += best);
10724 if (best <= 0x100) {
10725 stb_out(0x06);
10726 stb_out3(dist-1);
10727 stb_out(best-1);
10728 } else {
10729 stb_out(0x04);
10730 stb_out3(dist-1);
10731 stb_out2(best-1);
10732 }
10733 } else { // fallback literals if no match was a balanced tradeoff
10734 ++q;
10735 }
10736 }
10737
10738 // if we didn't get all the way, add the rest to literals
10739 if (q-start < length)
10740 q = start+length;
10741
10742 // the literals are everything from lit_start to q
10743 *pending_literals = (int) (q - lit_start);
10744
10745 stb__running_adler = stb_adler32(stb__running_adler, start, (int) (q - start));
10746 return (int) (q - start);
10747}
10748
10749static int stb_compress_inner(stb_uchar *input, stb_uint length)
10750{
10751 int literals = 0;
10752 stb_uint len,i;
10753
10754 stb_uchar **chash;
10755 chash = (stb_uchar**) malloc(stb__hashsize * sizeof(stb_uchar*));
10756 if (chash == NULL) return 0; // failure
10757 for (i=0; i < stb__hashsize; ++i)
10758 chash[i] = NULL;
10759
10760 // stream signature
10761 stb_out(0x57); stb_out(0xbc);
10762 stb_out2(0);
10763
10764 stb_out4(0); // 64-bit length requires 32-bit leading 0
10765 stb_out4(length);
10766 stb_out4(stb__window);
10767
10768 stb__running_adler = 1;
10769
10770 len = stb_compress_chunk(input, input, input+length, length, &literals, chash, stb__hashsize-1);
10771 assert(len == length);
10772
10773 outliterals(input+length - literals, literals);
10774
10775 free(chash);
10776
10777 stb_out2(0x05fa); // end opcode
10778
10779 stb_out4(stb__running_adler);
10780
10781 return 1; // success
10782}
10783
10784stb_uint stb_compress(stb_uchar *out, stb_uchar *input, stb_uint length)
10785{
10786 stb__out = out;
10787 stb__outfile = NULL;
10788
10789 stb_compress_inner(input, length);
10790
10791 return (stb_uint) (stb__out - out);
10792}
10793
10794int stb_compress_tofile(char *filename, char *input, unsigned int length)
10795{
10796 //int maxlen = length + 512 + (length >> 2); // total guess
10797 //char *buffer = (char *) malloc(maxlen);
10798 //int blen = stb_compress((stb_uchar*)buffer, (stb_uchar*)input, length);
10799
10800 stb__out = NULL;
10801 stb__outfile = stb_p_fopen(filename, "wb");
10802 if (!stb__outfile) return 0;
10803
10804 stb__outbytes = 0;
10805
10806 if (!stb_compress_inner((stb_uchar*)input, length))
10807 return 0;
10808
10809 fclose(stb__outfile);
10810
10811 return stb__outbytes;
10812}
10813
10814int stb_compress_intofile(FILE *f, char *input, unsigned int length)
10815{
10816 //int maxlen = length + 512 + (length >> 2); // total guess
10817 //char *buffer = (char*)malloc(maxlen);
10818 //int blen = stb_compress((stb_uchar*)buffer, (stb_uchar*)input, length);
10819
10820 stb__out = NULL;
10821 stb__outfile = f;
10822 if (!stb__outfile) return 0;
10823
10824 stb__outbytes = 0;
10825
10826 if (!stb_compress_inner((stb_uchar*)input, length))
10827 return 0;
10828
10829 return stb__outbytes;
10830}
10831
10833
10834
10835static size_t stb_out_backpatch_id(void)
10836{
10837 if (stb__out)
10838 return (size_t) stb__out;
10839 else
10840 return ftell(stb__outfile);
10841}
10842
10843static void stb_out_backpatch(size_t id, stb_uint value)
10844{
10845 stb_uchar data[4] = { (stb_uchar)(value >> 24), (stb_uchar)(value >> 16), (stb_uchar)(value >> 8), (stb_uchar)(value) };
10846 if (stb__out) {
10847 memcpy((void *) id, data, 4);
10848 } else {
10849 stb_uint where = ftell(stb__outfile);
10850 fseek(stb__outfile, (long) id, SEEK_SET);
10851 fwrite(data, 4, 1, stb__outfile);
10852 fseek(stb__outfile, where, SEEK_SET);
10853 }
10854}
10855
10856// ok, the wraparound buffer was a total failure. let's instead
10857// use a copying-in-place buffer, which lets us share the code.
10858// This is way less efficient but it'll do for now.
10859
10860static struct
10861{
10862 stb_uchar *buffer;
10863 int size; // physical size of buffer in bytes
10864
10865 int valid; // amount of valid data in bytes
10866 int start; // bytes of data already output
10867
10868 int window;
10869 int fsize;
10870
10871 int pending_literals; // bytes not-quite output but counted in start
10872 int length_id;
10873
10874 stb_uint total_bytes;
10875
10876 stb_uchar **chash;
10877 stb_uint hashmask;
10878} xtb;
10879
10880static int stb_compress_streaming_start(void)
10881{
10882 stb_uint i;
10883 xtb.size = stb__window * 3;
10884 xtb.buffer = (stb_uchar*)malloc(xtb.size);
10885 if (!xtb.buffer) return 0;
10886
10887 xtb.chash = (stb_uchar**)malloc(sizeof(*xtb.chash) * stb__hashsize);
10888 if (!xtb.chash) {
10889 free(xtb.buffer);
10890 return 0;
10891 }
10892
10893 for (i=0; i < stb__hashsize; ++i)
10894 xtb.chash[i] = NULL;
10895
10896 xtb.hashmask = stb__hashsize-1;
10897
10898 xtb.valid = 0;
10899 xtb.start = 0;
10900 xtb.window = stb__window;
10901 xtb.fsize = stb__window;
10902 xtb.pending_literals = 0;
10903 xtb.total_bytes = 0;
10904
10905 // stream signature
10906 stb_out(0x57); stb_out(0xbc); stb_out2(0);
10907
10908 stb_out4(0); // 64-bit length requires 32-bit leading 0
10909
10910 xtb.length_id = (int) stb_out_backpatch_id();
10911 stb_out4(0); // we don't know the output length yet
10912
10913 stb_out4(stb__window);
10914
10915 stb__running_adler = 1;
10916
10917 return 1;
10918}
10919
10920static int stb_compress_streaming_end(void)
10921{
10922 // flush out any remaining data
10923 stb_compress_chunk(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer+xtb.start, xtb.buffer+xtb.valid,
10924 xtb.valid-xtb.start, &xtb.pending_literals, xtb.chash, xtb.hashmask);
10925
10926 // write out pending literals
10927 outliterals(xtb.buffer + xtb.valid - xtb.pending_literals, xtb.pending_literals);
10928
10929 stb_out2(0x05fa); // end opcode
10930 stb_out4(stb__running_adler);
10931
10932 stb_out_backpatch(xtb.length_id, xtb.total_bytes);
10933
10934 free(xtb.buffer);
10935 free(xtb.chash);
10936 return 1;
10937}
10938
10939void stb_write(char *data, int data_len)
10940{
10941 stb_uint i;
10942
10943 // @TODO: fast path for filling the buffer and doing nothing else
10944 // if (xtb.valid + data_len < xtb.size)
10945
10946 xtb.total_bytes += data_len;
10947
10948 while (data_len) {
10949 // fill buffer
10950 if (xtb.valid < xtb.size) {
10951 int amt = xtb.size - xtb.valid;
10952 if (data_len < amt) amt = data_len;
10953 memcpy(xtb.buffer + xtb.valid, data, amt);
10954 data_len -= amt;
10955 data += amt;
10956 xtb.valid += amt;
10957 }
10958 if (xtb.valid < xtb.size)
10959 return;
10960
10961 // at this point, the buffer is full
10962
10963 // if we can process some data, go for it; make sure
10964 // we leave an 'fsize's worth of data, though
10965 if (xtb.start + xtb.fsize < xtb.valid) {
10966 int amount = (xtb.valid - xtb.fsize) - xtb.start;
10967 int n;
10968 assert(amount > 0);
10969 n = stb_compress_chunk(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer + xtb.start, xtb.buffer + xtb.valid,
10970 amount, &xtb.pending_literals, xtb.chash, xtb.hashmask);
10971 xtb.start += n;
10972 }
10973
10974 assert(xtb.start + xtb.fsize >= xtb.valid);
10975 // at this point, our future size is too small, so we
10976 // need to flush some history. we, in fact, flush exactly
