10977 // one window's worth of history
10978
10979 {
10980 int flush = xtb.window;
10981 assert(xtb.start >= flush);
10982 assert(xtb.valid >= flush);
10983
10984 // if 'pending literals' extends back into the shift region,
10985 // write them out
10986 if (xtb.start - xtb.pending_literals < flush) {
10987 outliterals(xtb.buffer + xtb.start - xtb.pending_literals, xtb.pending_literals);
10988 xtb.pending_literals = 0;
10989 }
10990
10991 // now shift the window
10992 memmove(xtb.buffer, xtb.buffer + flush, xtb.valid - flush);
10993 xtb.start -= flush;
10994 xtb.valid -= flush;
10995
10996 for (i=0; i <= xtb.hashmask; ++i)
10997 if (xtb.chash[i] < xtb.buffer + flush)
10998 xtb.chash[i] = NULL;
10999 else
11000 xtb.chash[i] -= flush;
11001 }
11002 // and now that we've made room for more data, go back to the top
11003 }
11004}
11005
11006int stb_compress_stream_start(FILE *f)
11007{
11008 stb__out = NULL;
11009 stb__outfile = f;
11010
11011 if (f == NULL)
11012 return 0;
11013
11014 if (!stb_compress_streaming_start())
11015 return 0;
11016
11017 return 1;
11018}
11019
11020void stb_compress_stream_end(int close)
11021{
11022 stb_compress_streaming_end();
11023 if (close && stb__outfile) {
11024 fclose(stb__outfile);
11025 }
11026}
11027
11028#endif // STB_DEFINE
11029
11031//
11032// File abstraction... tired of not having this... we can write
11033// compressors to be layers over these that auto-close their children.
11034
11035
11036typedef struct stbfile
11037{
11038 int (*getbyte)(struct stbfile *); // -1 on EOF
11039 unsigned int (*getdata)(struct stbfile *, void *block, unsigned int len);
11040
11041 int (*putbyte)(struct stbfile *, int byte);
11042 unsigned int (*putdata)(struct stbfile *, void *block, unsigned int len);
11043
11044 unsigned int (*size)(struct stbfile *);
11045
11046 unsigned int (*tell)(struct stbfile *);
11047 void (*backpatch)(struct stbfile *, unsigned int tell, void *block, unsigned int len);
11048
11049 void (*close)(struct stbfile *);
11050
11051 FILE *f; // file to fread/fwrite
11052 unsigned char *buffer; // input/output buffer
11053 unsigned char *indata, *inend; // input buffer
11054 union {
11055 int various;
11056 void *ptr;
11057 };
11058} stbfile;
11059
11060STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_getc(stbfile *f); // read
11061STB_EXTERN int stb_putc(stbfile *f, int ch); // write
11062STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_getdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len); // read
11063STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_putdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len); // write
11064STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_tell(stbfile *f); // read
11065STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_size(stbfile *f); // read/write
11066STB_EXTERN void stb_backpatch(stbfile *f, unsigned int tell, void *buffer, unsigned int len); // write
11067
11068#ifdef STB_DEFINE
11069
11070unsigned int stb_getc(stbfile *f) { return f->getbyte(f); }
11071int stb_putc(stbfile *f, int ch) { return f->putbyte(f, ch); }
11072
11073unsigned int stb_getdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11074{
11075 return f->getdata(f, buffer, len);
11076}
11077unsigned int stb_putdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11078{
11079 return f->putdata(f, buffer, len);
11080}
11081void stb_close(stbfile *f)
11082{
11083 f->close(f);
11084 free(f);
11085}
11086unsigned int stb_tell(stbfile *f) { return f->tell(f); }
11087unsigned int stb_size(stbfile *f) { return f->size(f); }
11088void stb_backpatch(stbfile *f, unsigned int tell, void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11089{
11090 f->backpatch(f,tell,buffer,len);
11091}
11092
11093// FILE * implementation
11094static int stb__fgetbyte(stbfile *f) { return fgetc(f->f); }
11095static int stb__fputbyte(stbfile *f, int ch) { return fputc(ch, f->f)==0; }
11096static unsigned int stb__fgetdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len) { return (unsigned int) fread(buffer,1,len,f->f); }
11097static unsigned int stb__fputdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len) { return (unsigned int) fwrite(buffer,1,len,f->f); }
11098static unsigned int stb__fsize(stbfile *f) { return (unsigned int) stb_filelen(f->f); }
11099static unsigned int stb__ftell(stbfile *f) { return (unsigned int) ftell(f->f); }
11100static void stb__fbackpatch(stbfile *f, unsigned int where, void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11101{
11102 fseek(f->f, where, SEEK_SET);
11103 fwrite(buffer, 1, len, f->f);
11104 fseek(f->f, 0, SEEK_END);
11105}
11106static void stb__fclose(stbfile *f) { fclose(f->f); }
11107
11108stbfile *stb_openf(FILE *f)
11109{
11110 stbfile m = { stb__fgetbyte, stb__fgetdata,
11111 stb__fputbyte, stb__fputdata,
11112 stb__fsize, stb__ftell, stb__fbackpatch, stb__fclose,
11113 0,0,0, };
11114 stbfile *z = (stbfile *) malloc(sizeof(*z));
11115 if (z) {
11116 *z = m;
11117 z->f = f;
11118 }
11119 return z;
11120}
11121
11122static int stb__nogetbyte(stbfile *f) { assert(0); return -1; }
11123static unsigned int stb__nogetdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len) { assert(0); return 0; }
11124static int stb__noputbyte(stbfile *f, int ch) { assert(0); return 0; }
11125static unsigned int stb__noputdata(stbfile *f, void *buffer, unsigned int len) { assert(0); return 0; }
11126static void stb__nobackpatch(stbfile *f, unsigned int where, void *buffer, unsigned int len) { assert(0); }
11127
11128static int stb__bgetbyte(stbfile *s)
11129{
11130 if (s->indata < s->inend)
11131 return *s->indata++;
11132 else
11133 return -1;
11134}
11135
11136static unsigned int stb__bgetdata(stbfile *s, void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11137{
11138 if (s->indata + len > s->inend)
11139 len = (unsigned int) (s->inend - s->indata);
11140 memcpy(buffer, s->indata, len);
11141 s->indata += len;
11142 return len;
11143}
11144static unsigned int stb__bsize(stbfile *s) { return (unsigned int) (s->inend - s->buffer); }
11145static unsigned int stb__btell(stbfile *s) { return (unsigned int) (s->indata - s->buffer); }
11146
11147static void stb__bclose(stbfile *s)
11148{
11149 if (s->various)
11150 free(s->buffer);
11151}
11152
11153stbfile *stb_open_inbuffer(void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11154{
11155 stbfile m = { stb__bgetbyte, stb__bgetdata,
11156 stb__noputbyte, stb__noputdata,
11157 stb__bsize, stb__btell, stb__nobackpatch, stb__bclose };
11158 stbfile *z = (stbfile *) malloc(sizeof(*z));
11159 if (z) {
11160 *z = m;
11161 z->buffer = (unsigned char *) buffer;
11162 z->indata = z->buffer;
11163 z->inend = z->indata + len;
11164 }
11165 return z;
11166}
11167
11168stbfile *stb_open_inbuffer_free(void *buffer, unsigned int len)
11169{
11170 stbfile *z = stb_open_inbuffer(buffer, len);
11171 if (z)
11172 z->various = 1; // free
11173 return z;
11174}
11175
11176#ifndef STB_VERSION
11177// if we've been cut-and-pasted elsewhere, you get a limited
11178// version of stb_open, without the 'k' flag and utf8 support
11179static void stb__fclose2(stbfile *f)
11180{
11181 fclose(f->f);
11182}
11183
11184stbfile *stb_open(char *filename, char *mode)
11185{
11186 FILE *f = stb_p_fopen(filename, mode);
11187 stbfile *s;
11188 if (f == NULL) return NULL;
11189 s = stb_openf(f);
11190 if (s)
11191 s->close = stb__fclose2;
11192 return s;
11193}
11194#else
11195// the full version depends on some code in stb.h; this
11196// also includes the memory buffer output format implemented with stb_arr
11197static void stb__fclose2(stbfile *f)
11198{
11199 stb_fclose(f->f, f->various);
11200}
11201
11202stbfile *stb_open(char *filename, char *mode)
11203{
11204 FILE *f = stb_fopen(filename, mode[0] == 'k' ? mode+1 : mode);
11205 stbfile *s;
11206 if (f == NULL) return NULL;
11207 s = stb_openf(f);
11208 if (s) {
11209 s->close = stb__fclose2;
11210 s->various = mode[0] == 'k' ? stb_keep_if_different : stb_keep_yes;
11211 }
11212 return s;
11213}
11214
11215static int stb__aputbyte(stbfile *f, int ch)
11216{
11217 stb_arr_push(f->buffer, ch);
11218 return 1;
11219}
11220static unsigned int stb__aputdata(stbfile *f, void *data, unsigned int len)
11221{
11222 memcpy(stb_arr_addn(f->buffer, (int) len), data, len);
11223 return len;
11224}
11225static unsigned int stb__asize(stbfile *f) { return stb_arr_len(f->buffer); }
11226static void stb__abackpatch(stbfile *f, unsigned int where, void *data, unsigned int len)
11227{
11228 memcpy(f->buffer+where, data, len);
11229}
11230static void stb__aclose(stbfile *f)
11231{
11232 *(unsigned char **) f->ptr = f->buffer;
11233}
11234
11235stbfile *stb_open_outbuffer(unsigned char **update_on_close)
11236{
11237 stbfile m = { stb__nogetbyte, stb__nogetdata,
11238 stb__aputbyte, stb__aputdata,
11239 stb__asize, stb__asize, stb__abackpatch, stb__aclose };
11240 stbfile *z = (stbfile *) malloc(sizeof(*z));
11241 if (z) {
11242 z->ptr = update_on_close;
11243 *z = m;
11244 }
11245 return z;
11246}
11247#endif
11248#endif
11249
11250
11252//
11253// Arithmetic coder... based on cbloom's notes on the subject, should be
11254// less code than a huffman code.
11255
11256typedef struct
11257{
11258 unsigned int range_low;
11259 unsigned int range_high;
11260 unsigned int code, range; // decode
11261 int buffered_u8;
11262 int pending_ffs;
11263 stbfile *output;
11264} stb_arith;
11265
11266STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_init_encode(stb_arith *a, stbfile *out);
11267STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_init_decode(stb_arith *a, stbfile *in);
11268STB_EXTERN stbfile *stb_arith_encode_close(stb_arith *a);
11269STB_EXTERN stbfile *stb_arith_decode_close(stb_arith *a);
11270
11271STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_encode(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq);
11272STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_encode_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq);
11273STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_arith_decode_value(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq);
11274STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_decode_advance(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq);
11275STB_EXTERN unsigned int stb_arith_decode_value_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2);
11276STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_decode_advance_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq);
11277
11278STB_EXTERN void stb_arith_encode_byte(stb_arith *a, int byte);
11279STB_EXTERN int stb_arith_decode_byte(stb_arith *a);
11280
11281// this is a memory-inefficient way of doing things, but it's
11282// fast(?) and simple
11283typedef struct
11284{
11285 unsigned short cumfreq;
11286 unsigned short samples;
11287} stb_arith_symstate_item;
11288
11289typedef struct
11290{
11291 int num_sym;
11292 unsigned int pow2;
11293 int countdown;
11294 stb_arith_symstate_item data[1];
11295} stb_arith_symstate;
11296
11297#ifdef STB_DEFINE
11298void stb_arith_init_encode(stb_arith *a, stbfile *out)
11299{
11300 a->range_low = 0;
11301 a->range_high = 0xffffffff;
11302 a->pending_ffs = -1; // means no buffered character currently, to speed up normal case
11303 a->output = out;
11304}
11305
11306static void stb__arith_carry(stb_arith *a)
11307{
11308 int i;
11309 assert(a->pending_ffs != -1); // can't carry with no data
11310 stb_putc(a->output, a->buffered_u8);
11311 for (i=0; i < a->pending_ffs; ++i)
11312 stb_putc(a->output, 0);
11313}
11314
11315static void stb__arith_putbyte(stb_arith *a, int byte)
11316{
11317 if (a->pending_ffs) {
11318 if (a->pending_ffs == -1) { // means no buffered data; encoded for fast path efficiency
11319 if (byte == 0xff)
11320 stb_putc(a->output, byte); // just write it immediately
11321 else {
11322 a->buffered_u8 = byte;
11323 a->pending_ffs = 0;
11324 }
11325 } else if (byte == 0xff) {
11326 ++a->pending_ffs;
11327 } else {
11328 int i;
11329 stb_putc(a->output, a->buffered_u8);
11330 for (i=0; i < a->pending_ffs; ++i)
11331 stb_putc(a->output, 0xff);
11332 }
11333 } else if (byte == 0xff) {
11334 ++a->pending_ffs;
11335 } else {
11336 // fast path
11337 stb_putc(a->output, a->buffered_u8);
11338 a->buffered_u8 = byte;
11339 }
11340}
11341
11342static void stb__arith_flush(stb_arith *a)
11343{
11344 if (a->pending_ffs >= 0) {
11345 int i;
11346 stb_putc(a->output, a->buffered_u8);
11347 for (i=0; i < a->pending_ffs; ++i)
11348 stb_putc(a->output, 0xff);
11349 }
11350}
11351
11352static void stb__renorm_encoder(stb_arith *a)
11353{
11354 stb__arith_putbyte(a, a->range_low >> 24);
11355 a->range_low <<= 8;
11356 a->range_high = (a->range_high << 8) | 0xff;
11357}
11358
11359static void stb__renorm_decoder(stb_arith *a)
11360{
11361 int c = stb_getc(a->output);
11362 a->code = (a->code << 8) + (c >= 0 ? c : 0); // if EOF, insert 0
11363}
11364
11365void stb_arith_encode(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq)
11366{
11367 unsigned int range = a->range_high - a->range_low;
11368 unsigned int old = a->range_low;
11369 range /= totalfreq;
11370 a->range_low += range * cumfreq;
11371 a->range_high = a->range_low + range*freq;
11372 if (a->range_low < old)
11373 stb__arith_carry(a);
11374 while (a->range_high - a->range_low < 0x1000000)
11375 stb__renorm_encoder(a);
11376}
11377
11378void stb_arith_encode_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq)
11379{
11380 unsigned int range = a->range_high - a->range_low;
11381 unsigned int old = a->range_low;
11382 range >>= totalfreq2;
11383 a->range_low += range * cumfreq;
11384 a->range_high = a->range_low + range*freq;
11385 if (a->range_low < old)
11386 stb__arith_carry(a);
11387 while (a->range_high - a->range_low < 0x1000000)
11388 stb__renorm_encoder(a);
11389}
11390
11391unsigned int stb_arith_decode_value(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq)
11392{
11393 unsigned int freqsize = a->range / totalfreq;
11394 unsigned int z = a->code / freqsize;
11395 return z >= totalfreq ? totalfreq-1 : z;
11396}
11397
11398void stb_arith_decode_advance(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq)
11399{
11400 unsigned int freqsize = a->range / totalfreq; // @OPTIMIZE, share with above divide somehow?
11401 a->code -= freqsize * cumfreq;
11402 a->range = freqsize * freq;
11403 while (a->range < 0x1000000)
11404 stb__renorm_decoder(a);
11405}
11406
11407unsigned int stb_arith_decode_value_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2)
11408{
11409 unsigned int freqsize = a->range >> totalfreq2;
11410 unsigned int z = a->code / freqsize;
11411 return z >= (1U<<totalfreq2) ? (1U<<totalfreq2)-1 : z;
11412}
11413
11414void stb_arith_decode_advance_log2(stb_arith *a, unsigned int totalfreq2, unsigned int freq, unsigned int cumfreq)
11415{
11416 unsigned int freqsize = a->range >> totalfreq2;
11417 a->code -= freqsize * cumfreq;
11418 a->range = freqsize * freq;
11419 while (a->range < 0x1000000)
11420 stb__renorm_decoder(a);
11421}
11422
11423stbfile *stb_arith_encode_close(stb_arith *a)
11424{
11425 // put exactly as many bytes as we'll read, so we can turn on/off arithmetic coding in a stream
11426 stb__arith_putbyte(a, a->range_low >> 24);
11427 stb__arith_putbyte(a, a->range_low >> 16);
11428 stb__arith_putbyte(a, a->range_low >> 8);
11429 stb__arith_putbyte(a, a->range_low >> 0);
11430 stb__arith_flush(a);
11431 return a->output;
11432}
11433
11434stbfile *stb_arith_decode_close(stb_arith *a)
11435{
11436 return a->output;
11437}
11438#endif
11439
11441//
11442// Threads
11443//
11444
11445#ifndef _WIN32
11446#ifdef STB_THREADS
11447#error "threads not implemented except for Windows"
11448#endif
11449#endif
11450
11451// call this function to free any global variables for memory testing
11452STB_EXTERN void stb_thread_cleanup(void);
11453
11454typedef void * (*stb_thread_func)(void *);
11455
11456// do not rely on these types, this is an implementation detail.
11457// compare against STB_THREAD_NULL and ST_SEMAPHORE_NULL
11458typedef void *stb_thread;
11459typedef void *stb_semaphore;
11460typedef void *stb_mutex;
11461typedef struct stb__sync *stb_sync;
11462
11463#define STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL NULL
11464#define STB_THREAD_NULL NULL
11465#define STB_MUTEX_NULL NULL
11466#define STB_SYNC_NULL NULL
11467
11468// get the number of processors (limited to those in the affinity mask for this process).
11469STB_EXTERN int stb_processor_count(void);
11470// force to run on a single core -- needed for RDTSC to work, e.g. for iprof
11471STB_EXTERN void stb_force_uniprocessor(void);
11472
11473// stb_work functions: queue up work to be done by some worker threads
11474
11475// set number of threads to serve the queue; you can change this on the fly,
11476// but if you decrease it, it won't decrease until things currently on the
11477// queue are finished
11478STB_EXTERN void stb_work_numthreads(int n);
11479// set maximum number of units in the queue; you can only set this BEFORE running any work functions
11480STB_EXTERN int stb_work_maxunits(int n);
11481// enqueue some work to be done (can do this from any thread, or even from a piece of work);
11482// return value of f is stored in *return_code if non-NULL
11483STB_EXTERN int stb_work(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code);
11484// as above, but stb_sync_reach is called on 'rel' after work is complete
11485STB_EXTERN int stb_work_reach(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_sync rel);
11486
11487
11488// necessary to call this when using volatile to order writes/reads
11489STB_EXTERN void stb_barrier(void);
11490
11491// support for independent queues with their own threads
11492
11493typedef struct stb__workqueue stb_workqueue;
11494
11495STB_EXTERN stb_workqueue*stb_workq_new(int numthreads, int max_units);
11496STB_EXTERN stb_workqueue*stb_workq_new_flags(int numthreads, int max_units, int no_add_mutex, int no_remove_mutex);
11497STB_EXTERN void stb_workq_delete(stb_workqueue *q);
11498STB_EXTERN void stb_workq_numthreads(stb_workqueue *q, int n);
11499STB_EXTERN int stb_workq(stb_workqueue *q, stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code);
11500STB_EXTERN int stb_workq_reach(stb_workqueue *q, stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_sync rel);
11501STB_EXTERN int stb_workq_length(stb_workqueue *q);
11502
11503STB_EXTERN stb_thread stb_create_thread (stb_thread_func f, void *d);
11504STB_EXTERN stb_thread stb_create_thread2(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_semaphore rel);
11505STB_EXTERN void stb_destroy_thread(stb_thread t);
11506
11507STB_EXTERN stb_semaphore stb_sem_new(int max_val);
11508STB_EXTERN stb_semaphore stb_sem_new_extra(int max_val, int start_val);
11509STB_EXTERN void stb_sem_delete (stb_semaphore s);
11510STB_EXTERN void stb_sem_waitfor(stb_semaphore s);
11511STB_EXTERN void stb_sem_release(stb_semaphore s);
11512
11513STB_EXTERN stb_mutex stb_mutex_new(void);
11514STB_EXTERN void stb_mutex_delete(stb_mutex m);
11515STB_EXTERN void stb_mutex_begin(stb_mutex m);
11516STB_EXTERN void stb_mutex_end(stb_mutex m);
11517
11518STB_EXTERN stb_sync stb_sync_new(void);
11519STB_EXTERN void stb_sync_delete(stb_sync s);
11520STB_EXTERN int stb_sync_set_target(stb_sync s, int count);
11521STB_EXTERN void stb_sync_reach_and_wait(stb_sync s); // wait for 'target' reachers
11522STB_EXTERN int stb_sync_reach(stb_sync s);
11523
11524typedef struct stb__threadqueue stb_threadqueue;
11525#define STB_THREADQ_DYNAMIC 0
11526STB_EXTERN stb_threadqueue *stb_threadq_new(int item_size, int num_items, int many_add, int many_remove);
11527STB_EXTERN void stb_threadq_delete(stb_threadqueue *tq);
11528STB_EXTERN int stb_threadq_get(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *output);
11529STB_EXTERN void stb_threadq_get_block(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *output);
11530STB_EXTERN int stb_threadq_add(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *input);
11531// can return FALSE if STB_THREADQ_DYNAMIC and attempt to grow fails
11532STB_EXTERN int stb_threadq_add_block(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *input);
11533
11534#ifdef STB_THREADS
11535#ifdef STB_DEFINE
11536
11537typedef struct
11538{
11539 stb_thread_func f;
11540 void *d;
11541 volatile void **return_val;
11542 stb_semaphore sem;
11543} stb__thread;
11544
11545// this is initialized along all possible paths to create threads, therefore
11546// it's always initialized before any other threads are create, therefore
11547// it's free of races AS LONG AS you only create threads through stb_*
11548static stb_mutex stb__threadmutex, stb__workmutex;
11549
11550static void stb__threadmutex_init(void)
11551{
11552 if (stb__threadmutex == STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL) {
11553 stb__threadmutex = stb_mutex_new();
11554 stb__workmutex = stb_mutex_new();
11555 }
11556}
11557
11558#ifdef STB_THREAD_TEST
11559volatile float stb__t1=1, stb__t2;
11560
11561static void stb__wait(int n)
11562{
11563 float z = 0;
11564 int i;
11565 for (i=0; i < n; ++i)
11566 z += 1 / (stb__t1+i);
11567 stb__t2 = z;
11568}
11569#else
11570#define stb__wait(x)
11571#endif
11572
11573#ifdef _WIN32
11574
11575// avoid including windows.h -- note that our definitions aren't
11576// exactly the same (we don't define the security descriptor struct)
11577// so if you want to include windows.h, make sure you do it first.
11578#include <process.h>
11579
11580#ifndef _WINDOWS_ // check windows.h guard
11581#define STB__IMPORT STB_EXTERN __declspec(dllimport)
11582#define STB__DW unsigned long
11583
11584STB__IMPORT int __stdcall TerminateThread(void *, STB__DW);
11585STB__IMPORT void * __stdcall CreateSemaphoreA(void *sec, long,long,char*);
11586STB__IMPORT int __stdcall CloseHandle(void *);
11587STB__IMPORT STB__DW __stdcall WaitForSingleObject(void *, STB__DW);
11588STB__IMPORT int __stdcall ReleaseSemaphore(void *, long, long *);
11589STB__IMPORT void __stdcall Sleep(STB__DW);
11590#endif
11591
11592// necessary to call this when using volatile to order writes/reads
11593void stb_barrier(void)
11594{
11595 #ifdef MemoryBarrier
11596 MemoryBarrier();
11597 #else
11598 long temp;
11599 __asm xchg temp,eax;
11600 #endif
11601}
11602
11603static void stb__thread_run(void *t)
11604{
11605 void *res;
11606 stb__thread info = * (stb__thread *) t;
11607 free(t);
11608 res = info.f(info.d);
11609 if (info.return_val)
11610 *info.return_val = res;
11611 if (info.sem != STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL)
11612 stb_sem_release(info.sem);
11613}
11614
11615static stb_thread stb_create_thread_raw(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_semaphore rel)
11616{
11617#ifdef _MT
11618#if defined(STB_FASTMALLOC) && !defined(STB_FASTMALLOC_ITS_OKAY_I_ONLY_MALLOC_IN_ONE_THREAD)
11619 stb_fatal("Error! Cannot use STB_FASTMALLOC with threads.\n");
11620 return STB_THREAD_NULL;
11621#else
11622 unsigned long id;
11623 stb__thread *data = (stb__thread *) malloc(sizeof(*data));
11624 if (!data) return NULL;
11625 stb__threadmutex_init();
11626 data->f = f;
11627 data->d = d;
11628 data->return_val = return_code;
11629 data->sem = rel;
11630 id = _beginthread(stb__thread_run, 0, data);
11631 if (id == -1) return NULL;
11632 return (void *) id;
11633#endif
11634#else
11635#ifdef STB_NO_STB_STRINGS
11636 stb_fatal("Invalid compilation");
11637#else
11638 stb_fatal("Must compile mult-threaded to use stb_thread/stb_work.");
11639#endif
11640 return NULL;
11641#endif
11642}
11643
11644// trivial win32 wrappers
11645void stb_destroy_thread(stb_thread t) { TerminateThread(t,0); }
11646stb_semaphore stb_sem_new(int maxv) {return CreateSemaphoreA(NULL,0,maxv,NULL); }
11647stb_semaphore stb_sem_new_extra(int maxv,int start){return CreateSemaphoreA(NULL,start,maxv,NULL); }
11648void stb_sem_delete(stb_semaphore s) { if (s != NULL) CloseHandle(s); }
11649void stb_sem_waitfor(stb_semaphore s) { WaitForSingleObject(s, 0xffffffff); } // INFINITE
11650void stb_sem_release(stb_semaphore s) { ReleaseSemaphore(s,1,NULL); }
11651static void stb__thread_sleep(int ms) { Sleep(ms); }
11652
11653#ifndef _WINDOWS_
11654STB__IMPORT int __stdcall GetProcessAffinityMask(void *, STB__DW *, STB__DW *);
11655STB__IMPORT void * __stdcall GetCurrentProcess(void);
11656STB__IMPORT int __stdcall SetProcessAffinityMask(void *, STB__DW);
11657#endif
11658
11659int stb_processor_count(void)
11660{
11661 unsigned long proc,sys;
11662 GetProcessAffinityMask(GetCurrentProcess(), &proc, &sys);
11663 return stb_bitcount(proc);
11664}
11665
11666void stb_force_uniprocessor(void)
11667{
11668 unsigned long proc,sys;
11669 GetProcessAffinityMask(GetCurrentProcess(), &proc, &sys);
11670 if (stb_bitcount(proc) > 1) {
11671 int z;
11672 for (z=0; z < 32; ++z)
11673 if (proc & (1 << z))
11674 break;
11675 if (z < 32) {
11676 proc = 1 << z;
11677 SetProcessAffinityMask(GetCurrentProcess(), proc);
11678 }
11679 }
11680}
11681
11682#ifdef _WINDOWS_
11683#define STB_MUTEX_NATIVE
11684void *stb_mutex_new(void)
11685{
11686 CRITICAL_SECTION *p = (CRITICAL_SECTION *) malloc(sizeof(*p));
11687 if (p)
11688#if _WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0500
11689 InitializeCriticalSectionAndSpinCount(p, 500);
11690#else
11691 InitializeCriticalSection(p);
11692#endif
11693 return p;
11694}
11695
11696void stb_mutex_delete(void *p)
11697{
11698 if (p) {
11699 DeleteCriticalSection((CRITICAL_SECTION *) p);
11700 free(p);
11701 }
11702}
11703
11704void stb_mutex_begin(void *p)
11705{
11706 stb__wait(500);
11707 if (p)
11708 EnterCriticalSection((CRITICAL_SECTION *) p);
11709}
11710
11711void stb_mutex_end(void *p)
11712{
11713 if (p)
11714 LeaveCriticalSection((CRITICAL_SECTION *) p);
11715 stb__wait(500);
11716}
11717#endif // _WINDOWS_
11718
11719#if 0
11720// for future reference,
11721// InterlockedCompareExchange for x86:
11722 int cas64_mp(void * dest, void * xcmp, void * xxchg) {
11723 __asm
11724 {
11725 mov esi, [xxchg] ; exchange
11726 mov ebx, [esi + 0]
11727 mov ecx, [esi + 4]
11728
11729 mov esi, [xcmp] ; comparand
11730 mov eax, [esi + 0]
11731 mov edx, [esi + 4]
11732
11733 mov edi, [dest] ; destination
11734 lock cmpxchg8b [edi]
11735 jz yyyy;
11736
11737 mov [esi + 0], eax;
11738 mov [esi + 4], edx;
11739
11740yyyy:
11741 xor eax, eax;
11742 setz al;
11743 };
11744
11745inline unsigned __int64 _InterlockedCompareExchange64(volatile unsigned __int64 *dest
11746 ,unsigned __int64 exchange
11747 ,unsigned __int64 comperand)
11748{
11749 //value returned in eax::edx
11750 __asm {
11751 lea esi,comperand;
11752 lea edi,exchange;
11753
11754 mov eax,[esi];
11755 mov edx,4[esi];
11756 mov ebx,[edi];
11757 mov ecx,4[edi];
11758 mov esi,dest;
11759 lock CMPXCHG8B [esi];
11760 }
11761#endif // #if 0
11762
11763#endif // _WIN32
11764
11765stb_thread stb_create_thread2(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_semaphore rel)
11766{
11767 return stb_create_thread_raw(f,d,return_code,rel);
11768}
11769
11770stb_thread stb_create_thread(stb_thread_func f, void *d)
11771{
11772 return stb_create_thread2(f,d,NULL,STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL);
11773}
11774
11775// mutex implemented by wrapping semaphore
11776#ifndef STB_MUTEX_NATIVE
11777stb_mutex stb_mutex_new(void) { return stb_sem_new_extra(1,1); }
11778void stb_mutex_delete(stb_mutex m) { stb_sem_delete (m); }
11779void stb_mutex_begin(stb_mutex m) { stb__wait(500); if (m) stb_sem_waitfor(m); }
11780void stb_mutex_end(stb_mutex m) { if (m) stb_sem_release(m); stb__wait(500); }
11781#endif
11782
11783// thread merge operation
11784struct stb__sync
11785{
11786 int target; // target number of threads to hit it
11787 int sofar; // total threads that hit it
11788 int waiting; // total threads waiting
11789
11790 stb_mutex start; // mutex to prevent starting again before finishing previous
11791 stb_mutex mutex; // mutex while tweaking state
11792 stb_semaphore release; // semaphore wake up waiting threads
11793 // we have to wake them up one at a time, rather than using a single release
11794 // call, because win32 semaphores don't let you dynamically change the max count!
11795};
11796
11797stb_sync stb_sync_new(void)
11798{
11799 stb_sync s = (stb_sync) malloc(sizeof(*s));
11800 if (!s) return s;
11801
11802 s->target = s->sofar = s->waiting = 0;
11803 s->mutex = stb_mutex_new();
11804 s->start = stb_mutex_new();
11805 s->release = stb_sem_new(1);
11806 if (s->mutex == STB_MUTEX_NULL || s->release == STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL || s->start == STB_MUTEX_NULL) {
11807 stb_mutex_delete(s->mutex);
11808 stb_mutex_delete(s->mutex);
11809 stb_sem_delete(s->release);
11810 free(s);
11811 return NULL;
11812 }
11813 return s;
11814}
11815
11816void stb_sync_delete(stb_sync s)
11817{
11818 if (s->waiting) {
11819 // it's bad to delete while there are threads waiting!
11820 // shall we wait for them to reach, or just bail? just bail
11821 assert(0);
11822 }
11823 stb_mutex_delete(s->mutex);
11824 stb_mutex_delete(s->release);
11825 free(s);
11826}
11827
11828int stb_sync_set_target(stb_sync s, int count)
11829{
11830 // don't allow setting a target until the last one is fully released;
11831 // note that this can lead to inefficient pipelining, and maybe we'd
11832 // be better off ping-ponging between two internal syncs?
11833 // I tried seeing how often this happened using TryEnterCriticalSection
11834 // and could _never_ get it to happen in imv(stb), even with more threads
11835 // than processors. So who knows!
11836 stb_mutex_begin(s->start);
11837
11838 // this mutex is pointless, since it's not valid for threads
11839 // to call reach() before anyone calls set_target() anyway
11840 stb_mutex_begin(s->mutex);
11841
11842 assert(s->target == 0); // enforced by start mutex
11843 s->target = count;
11844 s->sofar = 0;
11845 s->waiting = 0;
11846 stb_mutex_end(s->mutex);
11847 return STB_TRUE;
11848}
11849
11850void stb__sync_release(stb_sync s)
11851{
11852 if (s->waiting)
11853 stb_sem_release(s->release);
11854 else {
11855 s->target = 0;
11856 stb_mutex_end(s->start);
11857 }
11858}
11859
11860int stb_sync_reach(stb_sync s)
11861{
11862 int n;
11863 stb_mutex_begin(s->mutex);
11864 assert(s->sofar < s->target);
11865 n = ++s->sofar; // record this value to avoid possible race if we did 'return s->sofar';
11866 if (s->sofar == s->target)
11867 stb__sync_release(s);
11868 stb_mutex_end(s->mutex);
11869 return n;
11870}
11871
11872void stb_sync_reach_and_wait(stb_sync s)
11873{
11874 stb_mutex_begin(s->mutex);
11875 assert(s->sofar < s->target);
11876 ++s->sofar;
11877 if (s->sofar == s->target) {
11878 stb__sync_release(s);
11879 stb_mutex_end(s->mutex);
11880 } else {
11881 ++s->waiting; // we're waiting, so one more waiter
11882 stb_mutex_end(s->mutex); // release the mutex to other threads
11883
11884 stb_sem_waitfor(s->release); // wait for merge completion
11885
11886 stb_mutex_begin(s->mutex); // on merge completion, grab the mutex
11887 --s->waiting; // we're done waiting
11888 stb__sync_release(s); // restart the next waiter
11889 stb_mutex_end(s->mutex); // and now we're done
11890 // this ends the same as the first case, but it's a lot
11891 // clearer to understand without sharing the code
11892 }
11893}
11894
11895struct stb__threadqueue
11896{
11897 stb_mutex add, remove;
11898 stb_semaphore nonempty, nonfull;
11899 int head_blockers; // number of threads blocking--used to know whether to release(avail)
11900 int tail_blockers;
11901 int head, tail, array_size, growable;
11902 int item_size;
11903 char *data;
11904};
11905
11906static int stb__tq_wrap(volatile stb_threadqueue *z, int p)
11907{
11908 if (p == z->array_size)
11909 return p - z->array_size;
11910 else
11911 return p;
11912}
11913
11914int stb__threadq_get_raw(stb_threadqueue *tq2, void *output, int block)
11915{
11916 volatile stb_threadqueue *tq = (volatile stb_threadqueue *) tq2;
11917 if (tq->head == tq->tail && !block) return 0;
11918
11919 stb_mutex_begin(tq->remove);
11920
11921 while (tq->head == tq->tail) {
11922 if (!block) {
11923 stb_mutex_end(tq->remove);
11924 return 0;
11925 }
11926 ++tq->head_blockers;
11927 stb_mutex_end(tq->remove);
11928
11929 stb_sem_waitfor(tq->nonempty);
11930
11931 stb_mutex_begin(tq->remove);
11932 --tq->head_blockers;
11933 }
11934
11935 memcpy(output, tq->data + tq->head*tq->item_size, tq->item_size);
11936 stb_barrier();
11937 tq->head = stb__tq_wrap(tq, tq->head+1);
11938
11939 stb_sem_release(tq->nonfull);
11940 if (tq->head_blockers) // can't check if actually non-empty due to race?
11941 stb_sem_release(tq->nonempty); // if there are other blockers, wake one
11942
11943 stb_mutex_end(tq->remove);
11944 return STB_TRUE;
11945}
11946
11947int stb__threadq_grow(volatile stb_threadqueue *tq)
11948{
11949 int n;
11950 char *p;
11951 assert(tq->remove != STB_MUTEX_NULL); // must have this to allow growth!
11952 stb_mutex_begin(tq->remove);
11953
11954 n = tq->array_size * 2;
11955 p = (char *) realloc(tq->data, n * tq->item_size);
11956 if (p == NULL) {
11957 stb_mutex_end(tq->remove);
11958 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
11959 return STB_FALSE;
11960 }
11961 if (tq->tail < tq->head) {
11962 memcpy(p + tq->array_size * tq->item_size, p, tq->tail * tq->item_size);
11963 tq->tail += tq->array_size;
11964 }
11965 tq->data = p;
11966 tq->array_size = n;
11967
11968 stb_mutex_end(tq->remove);
11969 return STB_TRUE;
11970}
11971
11972int stb__threadq_add_raw(stb_threadqueue *tq2, void *input, int block)
11973{
11974 int tail,pos;
11975 volatile stb_threadqueue *tq = (volatile stb_threadqueue *) tq2;
11976 stb_mutex_begin(tq->add);
11977 for(;;) {
11978 pos = tq->tail;
11979 tail = stb__tq_wrap(tq, pos+1);
11980 if (tail != tq->head) break;
11981
11982 // full
11983 if (tq->growable) {
11984 if (!stb__threadq_grow(tq)) {
11985 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
11986 return STB_FALSE; // out of memory
11987 }
11988 } else if (!block) {
11989 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
11990 return STB_FALSE;
11991 } else {
11992 ++tq->tail_blockers;
11993 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
11994
11995 stb_sem_waitfor(tq->nonfull);
11996
11997 stb_mutex_begin(tq->add);
11998 --tq->tail_blockers;
11999 }
12000 }
12001 memcpy(tq->data + tq->item_size * pos, input, tq->item_size);
12002 stb_barrier();
12003 tq->tail = tail;
12004 stb_sem_release(tq->nonempty);
12005 if (tq->tail_blockers) // can't check if actually non-full due to race?
12006 stb_sem_release(tq->nonfull);
12007 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
12008 return STB_TRUE;
12009}
12010
12011int stb_threadq_length(stb_threadqueue *tq2)
12012{
12013 int a,b,n;
12014 volatile stb_threadqueue *tq = (volatile stb_threadqueue *) tq2;
12015 stb_mutex_begin(tq->add);
12016 a = tq->head;
12017 b = tq->tail;
12018 n = tq->array_size;
12019 stb_mutex_end(tq->add);
12020 if (a > b) b += n;
12021 return b-a;
12022}
12023
12024int stb_threadq_get(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *output)
12025{
12026 return stb__threadq_get_raw(tq, output, STB_FALSE);
12027}
12028
12029void stb_threadq_get_block(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *output)
12030{
12031 stb__threadq_get_raw(tq, output, STB_TRUE);
12032}
12033
12034int stb_threadq_add(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *input)
12035{
12036 return stb__threadq_add_raw(tq, input, STB_FALSE);
12037}
12038
12039int stb_threadq_add_block(stb_threadqueue *tq, void *input)
12040{
12041 return stb__threadq_add_raw(tq, input, STB_TRUE);
12042}
12043
12044void stb_threadq_delete(stb_threadqueue *tq)
12045{
12046 if (tq) {
12047 free(tq->data);
12048 stb_mutex_delete(tq->add);
12049 stb_mutex_delete(tq->remove);
12050 stb_sem_delete(tq->nonempty);
12051 stb_sem_delete(tq->nonfull);
12052 free(tq);
12053 }
12054}
12055
12056#define STB_THREADQUEUE_DYNAMIC 0
12057stb_threadqueue *stb_threadq_new(int item_size, int num_items, int many_add, int many_remove)
12058{
12059 int error=0;
12060 stb_threadqueue *tq = (stb_threadqueue *) malloc(sizeof(*tq));
12061 if (tq == NULL) return NULL;
12062
12063 if (num_items == STB_THREADQUEUE_DYNAMIC) {
12064 tq->growable = STB_TRUE;
12065 num_items = 32;
12066 } else
12067 tq->growable = STB_FALSE;
12068
12069 tq->item_size = item_size;
12070 tq->array_size = num_items+1;
12071
12072 tq->add = tq->remove = STB_MUTEX_NULL;
12073 tq->nonempty = tq->nonfull = STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL;
12074 tq->data = NULL;
12075 if (many_add)
12076 { tq->add = stb_mutex_new(); if (tq->add == STB_MUTEX_NULL) goto error; }
12077 if (many_remove || tq->growable)
12078 { tq->remove = stb_mutex_new(); if (tq->remove == STB_MUTEX_NULL) goto error; }
12079 tq->nonempty = stb_sem_new(1); if (tq->nonempty == STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL) goto error;
12080 tq->nonfull = stb_sem_new(1); if (tq->nonfull == STB_SEMAPHORE_NULL) goto error;
12081 tq->data = (char *) malloc(tq->item_size * tq->array_size);
12082 if (tq->data == NULL) goto error;
12083
12084 tq->head = tq->tail = 0;
12085 tq->head_blockers = tq->tail_blockers = 0;
12086
12087 return tq;
12088
12089error:
12090 stb_threadq_delete(tq);
12091 return NULL;
12092}
12093
12094typedef struct
12095{
12096 stb_thread_func f;
12097 void *d;
12098 volatile void **retval;
12099 stb_sync sync;
12100} stb__workinfo;
12101
12102//static volatile stb__workinfo *stb__work;
12103
12104struct stb__workqueue
12105{
12106 int numthreads;
12107 stb_threadqueue *tq;
12108};
12109
12110static stb_workqueue *stb__work_global;
12111
12112static void *stb__thread_workloop(void *p)
12113{
12114 volatile stb_workqueue *q = (volatile stb_workqueue *) p;
12115 for(;;) {
12116 void *z;
12117 stb__workinfo w;
12118 stb_threadq_get_block(q->tq, &w);
12119 if (w.f == NULL) // null work is a signal to end the thread
12120 return NULL;
12121 z = w.f(w.d);
12122 if (w.retval) { stb_barrier(); *w.retval = z; }
12123 if (w.sync != STB_SYNC_NULL) stb_sync_reach(w.sync);
12124 }
12125}
12126
12127stb_workqueue *stb_workq_new(int num_threads, int max_units)
12128{
12129 return stb_workq_new_flags(num_threads, max_units, 0,0);
12130}
12131
12132stb_workqueue *stb_workq_new_flags(int numthreads, int max_units, int no_add_mutex, int no_remove_mutex)
12133{
12134 stb_workqueue *q = (stb_workqueue *) malloc(sizeof(*q));
12135 if (q == NULL) return NULL;
12136 q->tq = stb_threadq_new(sizeof(stb__workinfo), max_units, !no_add_mutex, !no_remove_mutex);
12137 if (q->tq == NULL) { free(q); return NULL; }
12138 q->numthreads = 0;
12139 stb_workq_numthreads(q, numthreads);
12140 return q;
12141}
12142
12143void stb_workq_delete(stb_workqueue *q)
12144{
12145 while (stb_workq_length(q) != 0)
12146 stb__thread_sleep(1);
12147 stb_threadq_delete(q->tq);
12148 free(q);
12149}
12150
12151static int stb__work_maxitems = STB_THREADQUEUE_DYNAMIC;
12152
12153static void stb_work_init(int num_threads)
12154{
12155 if (stb__work_global == NULL) {
12156 stb__threadmutex_init();
12157 stb_mutex_begin(stb__workmutex);
12158 stb_barrier();
12159 if (*(stb_workqueue * volatile *) &stb__work_global == NULL)
12160 stb__work_global = stb_workq_new(num_threads, stb__work_maxitems);
12161 stb_mutex_end(stb__workmutex);
12162 }
12163}
12164
12165static int stb__work_raw(stb_workqueue *q, stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_sync rel)
12166{
12167 stb__workinfo w;
12168 if (q == NULL) {
12169 stb_work_init(1);
12170 q = stb__work_global;
12171 }
12172 w.f = f;
12173 w.d = d;
12174 w.retval = return_code;
12175 w.sync = rel;
12176 return stb_threadq_add(q->tq, &w);
12177}
12178
12179int stb_workq_length(stb_workqueue *q)
12180{
12181 return stb_threadq_length(q->tq);
12182}
12183
12184int stb_workq(stb_workqueue *q, stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code)
12185{
12186 if (f == NULL) return 0;
12187 return stb_workq_reach(q, f, d, return_code, NULL);
12188}
12189
12190int stb_workq_reach(stb_workqueue *q, stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_sync rel)
12191{
12192 if (f == NULL) return 0;
12193 return stb__work_raw(q, f, d, return_code, rel);
12194}
12195
12196static void stb__workq_numthreads(stb_workqueue *q, int n)
12197{
12198 while (q->numthreads < n) {
12199 stb_create_thread(stb__thread_workloop, q);
12200 ++q->numthreads;
12201 }
12202 while (q->numthreads > n) {
12203 stb__work_raw(q, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
12204 --q->numthreads;
12205 }
12206}
12207
12208void stb_workq_numthreads(stb_workqueue *q, int n)
12209{
12210 stb_mutex_begin(stb__threadmutex);
12211 stb__workq_numthreads(q,n);
12212 stb_mutex_end(stb__threadmutex);
12213}
12214
12215int stb_work_maxunits(int n)
12216{
12217 if (stb__work_global == NULL) {
12218 stb__work_maxitems = n;
12219 stb_work_init(1);
12220 }
12221 return stb__work_maxitems;
12222}
12223
12224int stb_work(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code)
12225{
12226 return stb_workq(stb__work_global, f,d,return_code);
12227}
12228
12229int stb_work_reach(stb_thread_func f, void *d, volatile void **return_code, stb_sync rel)
12230{
12231 return stb_workq_reach(stb__work_global, f,d,return_code,rel);
12232}
12233
12234void stb_work_numthreads(int n)
12235{
12236 if (stb__work_global == NULL)
12237 stb_work_init(n);
12238 else
12239 stb_workq_numthreads(stb__work_global, n);
12240}
12241#endif // STB_DEFINE
12242
12243
12245//
12246// Background disk I/O
12247//
12248//
12249
12250#define STB_BGIO_READ_ALL (-1)
12251STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_read (char *filename, int offset, int len, stb_uchar **result, int *olen);
12252STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_readf (FILE *f , int offset, int len, stb_uchar **result, int *olen);
12253STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_read_to (char *filename, int offset, int len, stb_uchar *buffer, int *olen);
12254STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_readf_to(FILE *f , int offset, int len, stb_uchar *buffer, int *olen);
12255
12256typedef struct
12257{
12258 int have_data;
12259 int is_valid;
12260 int is_dir;
12261 time_t filetime;
12262 stb_int64 filesize;
12263} stb_bgstat;
12264
12265STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_stat (char *filename, stb_bgstat *result);
12266
12267#ifdef STB_DEFINE
12268
12269static stb_workqueue *stb__diskio;
12270static stb_mutex stb__diskio_mutex;
12271
12272void stb_thread_cleanup(void)
12273{
12274 if (stb__work_global) stb_workq_delete(stb__work_global); stb__work_global = NULL;
12275 if (stb__threadmutex) stb_mutex_delete(stb__threadmutex); stb__threadmutex = NULL;
12276 if (stb__workmutex) stb_mutex_delete(stb__workmutex); stb__workmutex = NULL;
12277 if (stb__diskio) stb_workq_delete(stb__diskio); stb__diskio = NULL;
12278 if (stb__diskio_mutex)stb_mutex_delete(stb__diskio_mutex);stb__diskio_mutex= NULL;
12279}
12280
12281
12282typedef struct
12283{
12284 char *filename;
12285 FILE *f;
12286 int offset;
12287 int len;
12288
12289 stb_bgstat *stat_out;
12290 stb_uchar *output;
12291 stb_uchar **result;
12292 int *len_output;
12293 int *flag;
12294} stb__disk_command;
12295
12296#define STB__MAX_DISK_COMMAND 100
12297static stb__disk_command stb__dc_queue[STB__MAX_DISK_COMMAND];
12298static int stb__dc_offset;
12299
12300void stb__io_init(void)
12301{
12302 if (!stb__diskio) {
12303 stb__threadmutex_init();
12304 stb_mutex_begin(stb__threadmutex);
12305 stb_barrier();
12306 if (*(stb_thread * volatile *) &stb__diskio == NULL) {
12307 stb__diskio_mutex = stb_mutex_new();
12308 // use many threads so OS can try to schedule seeks
12309 stb__diskio = stb_workq_new_flags(16,STB__MAX_DISK_COMMAND,STB_FALSE,STB_FALSE);
12310 }
12311 stb_mutex_end(stb__threadmutex);
12312 }
12313}
12314
12315static void * stb__io_error(stb__disk_command *dc)
12316{
12317 if (dc->len_output) *dc->len_output = 0;
12318 if (dc->result) *dc->result = NULL;
12319 if (dc->flag) *dc->flag = -1;
12320 return NULL;
12321}
12322
12323static void * stb__io_task(void *p)
12324{
12325 stb__disk_command *dc = (stb__disk_command *) p;
12326 int len;
12327 FILE *f;
12328 stb_uchar *buf;
12329
12330 if (dc->stat_out) {
12331 struct _stati64 s;
12332 if (!_stati64(dc->filename, &s)) {
12333 dc->stat_out->filesize = s.st_size;
12334 dc->stat_out->filetime = s.st_mtime;
12335 dc->stat_out->is_dir = s.st_mode & _S_IFDIR;
12336 dc->stat_out->is_valid = (s.st_mode & _S_IFREG) || dc->stat_out->is_dir;
12337 } else
12338 dc->stat_out->is_valid = 0;
12339 stb_barrier();
12340 dc->stat_out->have_data = 1;
12341 free(dc->filename);
12342 return 0;
12343 }
12344 if (dc->f) {
12345 #ifdef WIN32
12346 f = _fdopen(_dup(_fileno(dc->f)), "rb");
12347 #else
12348 f = fdopen(dup(fileno(dc->f)), "rb");
12349 #endif
12350 if (!f)
12351 return stb__io_error(dc);
12352 } else {
12353 f = fopen(dc->filename, "rb");
12354 free(dc->filename);
12355 if (!f)
12356 return stb__io_error(dc);
12357 }
12358
12359 len = dc->len;
12360 if (len < 0) {
12361 fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
12362 len = ftell(f) - dc->offset;
12363 }
12364
12365 if (fseek(f, dc->offset, SEEK_SET)) {
12366 fclose(f);
12367 return stb__io_error(dc);
12368 }
12369
12370 if (dc->output)
12371 buf = dc->output;
12372 else {
12373 buf = (stb_uchar *) malloc(len);
12374 if (buf == NULL) {
12375 fclose(f);
12376 return stb__io_error(dc);
12377 }
12378 }
12379
12380 len = fread(buf, 1, len, f);
12381 fclose(f);
12382 if (dc->len_output) *dc->len_output = len;
12383 if (dc->result) *dc->result = buf;
12384 if (dc->flag) *dc->flag = 1;
12385
12386 return NULL;
12387}
12388
12389int stb__io_add(char *fname, FILE *f, int off, int len, stb_uchar *out, stb_uchar **result, int *olen, int *flag, stb_bgstat *stat)
12390{
12391 int res;
12392 stb__io_init();
12393 // do memory allocation outside of mutex
12394 if (fname) fname = stb_p_strdup(fname);
12395 stb_mutex_begin(stb__diskio_mutex);
12396 {
12397 stb__disk_command *dc = &stb__dc_queue[stb__dc_offset];
12398 dc->filename = fname;
12399 dc->f = f;
12400 dc->offset = off;
12401 dc->len = len;
12402 dc->output = out;
12403 dc->result = result;
12404 dc->len_output = olen;
12405 dc->flag = flag;
12406 dc->stat_out = stat;
12407 res = stb_workq(stb__diskio, stb__io_task, dc, NULL);
12408 if (res)
12409 stb__dc_offset = (stb__dc_offset + 1 == STB__MAX_DISK_COMMAND ? 0 : stb__dc_offset+1);
12410 }
12411 stb_mutex_end(stb__diskio_mutex);
12412 return res;
12413}
12414
12415int stb_bgio_read(char *filename, int offset, int len, stb_uchar **result, int *olen)
12416{
12417 return stb__io_add(filename,NULL,offset,len,NULL,result,olen,NULL,NULL);
12418}
12419
12420int stb_bgio_readf(FILE *f, int offset, int len, stb_uchar **result, int *olen)
12421{
12422 return stb__io_add(NULL,f,offset,len,NULL,result,olen,NULL,NULL);
12423}
12424
12425int stb_bgio_read_to(char *filename, int offset, int len, stb_uchar *buffer, int *olen)
12426{
12427 return stb__io_add(filename,NULL,offset,len,buffer,NULL,olen,NULL,NULL);
12428}
12429
12430int stb_bgio_readf_to(FILE *f, int offset, int len, stb_uchar *buffer, int *olen)
12431{
12432 return stb__io_add(NULL,f,offset,len,buffer,NULL,olen,NULL,NULL);
12433}
12434
12435STB_EXTERN int stb_bgio_stat (char *filename, stb_bgstat *result)
12436{
12437 result->have_data = 0;
12438 return stb__io_add(filename,NULL,0,0,0,NULL,0,NULL, result);
12439}
12440#endif
12441#endif
12442
12443
12444
12446//
12447// Fast malloc implementation
12448//
12449// This is a clone of TCMalloc, but without the thread support.
12450// 1. large objects are allocated directly, page-aligned
12451// 2. small objects are allocated in homogeonous heaps, 0 overhead
12452//
12453// We keep an allocation table for pages a la TCMalloc. This would
12454// require 4MB for the entire address space, but we only allocate
12455// the parts that are in use. The overhead from using homogenous heaps
12456// everywhere is 3MB. (That is, if you allocate 1 object of each size,
12457// you'll use 3MB.)
12458
12459#if defined(STB_DEFINE) && ((defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_M_AMD64)) || defined(STB_FASTMALLOC))
12460
12461#ifdef _WIN32
12462 #ifndef _WINDOWS_
12463 #ifndef STB__IMPORT
12464 #define STB__IMPORT STB_EXTERN __declspec(dllimport)
12465 #define STB__DW unsigned long
12466 #endif
12467 STB__IMPORT void * __stdcall VirtualAlloc(void *p, unsigned long size, unsigned long type, unsigned long protect);
12468 STB__IMPORT int __stdcall VirtualFree(void *p, unsigned long size, unsigned long freetype);
12469 #endif
12470 #define stb__alloc_pages_raw(x) (stb_uint32) VirtualAlloc(NULL, (x), 0x3000, 0x04)
12471 #define stb__dealloc_pages_raw(p) VirtualFree((void *) p, 0, 0x8000)
12472#else
12473 #error "Platform not currently supported"
12474#endif
12475
12476typedef struct stb__span
12477{
12478 int start, len;
12479 struct stb__span *next, *prev;
12480 void *first_free;
12481 unsigned short list; // 1..256 free; 257..511 sizeclass; 0=large block
12482 short allocations; // # outstanding allocations for sizeclass
12483} stb__span; // 24
12484
12485static stb__span **stb__span_for_page;
12486static int stb__firstpage, stb__lastpage;
12487static void stb__update_page_range(int first, int last)
12488{
12489 stb__span **sfp;
12490 int i, f,l;
12491 if (first >= stb__firstpage && last <= stb__lastpage) return;
12492 if (stb__span_for_page == NULL) {
12493 f = first;
12494 l = f+stb_max(last-f, 16384);
12495 l = stb_min(l, 1<<20);
12496 } else if (last > stb__lastpage) {
12497 f = stb__firstpage;
12498 l = f + (stb__lastpage - f) * 2;
12499 l = stb_clamp(last, l,1<<20);
12500 } else {
12501 l = stb__lastpage;
12502 f = l - (l - stb__firstpage) * 2;
12503 f = stb_clamp(f, 0,first);
12504 }
12505 sfp = (stb__span **) stb__alloc_pages_raw(sizeof(void *) * (l-f));
12506 for (i=f; i < stb__firstpage; ++i) sfp[i - f] = NULL;
12507 for ( ; i < stb__lastpage ; ++i) sfp[i - f] = stb__span_for_page[i - stb__firstpage];
12508 for ( ; i < l ; ++i) sfp[i - f] = NULL;
12509 if (stb__span_for_page) stb__dealloc_pages_raw(stb__span_for_page);
12510 stb__firstpage = f;
12511 stb__lastpage = l;
12512 stb__span_for_page = sfp;
12513}
12514
12515static stb__span *stb__span_free=NULL;
12516static stb__span *stb__span_first, *stb__span_end;
12517static stb__span *stb__span_alloc(void)
12518{
12519 stb__span *s = stb__span_free;
12520 if (s)
12521 stb__span_free = s->next;
12522 else {
12523 if (!stb__span_first) {
12524 stb__span_first = (stb__span *) stb__alloc_pages_raw(65536);
12525 if (stb__span_first == NULL) return NULL;
12526 stb__span_end = stb__span_first + (65536 / sizeof(stb__span));
12527 }
12528 s = stb__span_first++;
12529 if (stb__span_first == stb__span_end) stb__span_first = NULL;
12530 }
12531 return s;
12532}
12533
12534static stb__span *stb__spanlist[512];
12535
12536static void stb__spanlist_unlink(stb__span *s)
12537{
12538 if (s->prev)
12539 s->prev->next = s->next;
12540 else {
12541 int n = s->list;
12542 assert(stb__spanlist[n] == s);
12543 stb__spanlist[n] = s->next;
12544 }
12545 if (s->next)
12546 s->next->prev = s->prev;
12547 s->next = s->prev = NULL;
12548 s->list = 0;
12549}
12550
12551static void stb__spanlist_add(int n, stb__span *s)
12552{
12553 s->list = n;
12554 s->next = stb__spanlist[n];
12555 s->prev = NULL;
12556 stb__spanlist[n] = s;
12557 if (s->next) s->next->prev = s;
12558}
12559
12560#define stb__page_shift 12
12561#define stb__page_size (1 << stb__page_shift)
12562#define stb__page_number(x) ((x) >> stb__page_shift)
12563#define stb__page_address(x) ((x) << stb__page_shift)
12564
12565static void stb__set_span_for_page(stb__span *s)
12566{
12567 int i;
12568 for (i=0; i < s->len; ++i)
12569 stb__span_for_page[s->start + i - stb__firstpage] = s;
12570}
12571
12572static stb__span *stb__coalesce(stb__span *a, stb__span *b)
12573{
12574 assert(a->start + a->len == b->start);
12575 if (a->list) stb__spanlist_unlink(a);
12576 if (b->list) stb__spanlist_unlink(b);
12577 a->len += b->len;
12578 b->len = 0;
12579 b->next = stb__span_free;
12580 stb__span_free = b;
12581 stb__set_span_for_page(a);
12582 return a;
12583}
12584
12585static void stb__free_span(stb__span *s)
12586{
12587 stb__span *n = NULL;
12588 if (s->start > stb__firstpage) {
12589 n = stb__span_for_page[s->start-1 - stb__firstpage];
12590 if (n && n->allocations == -2 && n->start + n->len == s->start) s = stb__coalesce(n,s);
12591 }
12592 if (s->start + s->len < stb__lastpage) {
12593 n = stb__span_for_page[s->start + s->len - stb__firstpage];
12594 if (n && n->allocations == -2 && s->start + s->len == n->start) s = stb__coalesce(s,n);
12595 }
12596 s->allocations = -2;
12597 stb__spanlist_add(s->len > 256 ? 256 : s->len, s);
12598}
12599
12600static stb__span *stb__alloc_pages(int num)
12601{
12602 stb__span *s = stb__span_alloc();
12603 int p;
12604 if (!s) return NULL;
12605 p = stb__alloc_pages_raw(num << stb__page_shift);
12606 if (p == 0) { s->next = stb__span_free; stb__span_free = s; return 0; }
12607 assert(stb__page_address(stb__page_number(p)) == p);
12608 p = stb__page_number(p);
12609 stb__update_page_range(p, p+num);
12610 s->start = p;
12611 s->len = num;
12612 s->next = NULL;
12613 s->prev = NULL;
12614 stb__set_span_for_page(s);
12615 return s;
12616}
12617
12618static stb__span *stb__alloc_span(int pagecount)
12619{
12620 int i;
12621 stb__span *p = NULL;
12622 for(i=pagecount; i < 256; ++i)
12623 if (stb__spanlist[i]) {
12624 p = stb__spanlist[i];
12625 break;
12626 }
12627 if (!p) {
12628 p = stb__spanlist[256];
12629 while (p && p->len < pagecount)
12630 p = p->next;
12631 }
12632 if (!p) {
12633 p = stb__alloc_pages(pagecount < 16 ? 16 : pagecount);
12634 if (p == NULL) return 0;
12635 } else
12636 stb__spanlist_unlink(p);
12637
12638 if (p->len > pagecount) {
12639 stb__span *q = stb__span_alloc();
12640 if (q) {
12641 q->start = p->start + pagecount;
12642 q->len = p->len - pagecount;
12643 p->len = pagecount;
12644 for (i=0; i < q->len; ++i)
12645 stb__span_for_page[q->start+i - stb__firstpage] = q;
12646 stb__spanlist_add(q->len > 256 ? 256 : q->len, q);
12647 }
12648 }
12649 return p;
12650}
12651
12652#define STB__MAX_SMALL_SIZE 32768
12653#define STB__MAX_SIZE_CLASSES 256
12654
12655static unsigned char stb__class_base[32];
12656static unsigned char stb__class_shift[32];
12657static unsigned char stb__pages_for_class[STB__MAX_SIZE_CLASSES];
12658static int stb__size_for_class[STB__MAX_SIZE_CLASSES];
12659
12660stb__span *stb__get_nonempty_sizeclass(int c)
12661{
12662 int s = c + 256, i, size, tsize; // remap to span-list index
12663 char *z;
12664 void *q;
12665 stb__span *p = stb__spanlist[s];
12666 if (p) {
12667 if (p->first_free) return p; // fast path: it's in the first one in list
12668 for (p=p->next; p; p=p->next)
12669 if (p->first_free) {
12670 // move to front for future queries
12671 stb__spanlist_unlink(p);
12672 stb__spanlist_add(s, p);
12673 return p;
12674 }
12675 }
12676 // no non-empty ones, so allocate a new one
12677 p = stb__alloc_span(stb__pages_for_class[c]);
12678 if (!p) return NULL;
12679 // create the free list up front
12680 size = stb__size_for_class[c];
12681 tsize = stb__pages_for_class[c] << stb__page_shift;
12682 i = 0;
12683 z = (char *) stb__page_address(p->start);
12684 q = NULL;
12685 while (i + size <= tsize) {
12686 * (void **) z = q; q = z;
12687 z += size;
12688 i += size;
12689 }
12690 p->first_free = q;
12691 p->allocations = 0;
12692 stb__spanlist_add(s,p);
12693 return p;
12694}
12695
12696static int stb__sizeclass(size_t sz)
12697{
12698 int z = stb_log2_floor(sz); // -1 below to group e.g. 13,14,15,16 correctly
12699 return stb__class_base[z] + ((sz-1) >> stb__class_shift[z]);
12700}
12701
12702static void stb__init_sizeclass(void)
12703{
12704 int i, size, overhead;
12705 int align_shift = 2; // allow 4-byte and 12-byte blocks as well, vs. TCMalloc
12706 int next_class = 1;
12707 int last_log = 0;
12708
12709 for (i = 0; i < align_shift; i++) {
12710 stb__class_base [i] = next_class;
12711 stb__class_shift[i] = align_shift;
12712 }
12713
12714 for (size = 1 << align_shift; size <= STB__MAX_SMALL_SIZE; size += 1 << align_shift) {
12715 i = stb_log2_floor(size);
12716 if (i > last_log) {
12717 if (size == 16) ++align_shift; // switch from 4-byte to 8-byte alignment
12718 else if (size >= 128 && align_shift < 8) ++align_shift;
12719 stb__class_base[i] = next_class - ((size-1) >> align_shift);
12720 stb__class_shift[i] = align_shift;
12721 last_log = i;
12722 }
12723 stb__size_for_class[next_class++] = size;
12724 }
12725
12726 for (i=1; i <= STB__MAX_SMALL_SIZE; ++i)
12727 assert(i <= stb__size_for_class[stb__sizeclass(i)]);
12728
12729 overhead = 0;
12730 for (i = 1; i < next_class; i++) {
12731 int s = stb__size_for_class[i];
12732 size = stb__page_size;
12733 while (size % s > size >> 3)
12734 size += stb__page_size;
12735 stb__pages_for_class[i] = (unsigned char) (size >> stb__page_shift);
12736 overhead += size;
12737 }
12738 assert(overhead < (4 << 20)); // make sure it's under 4MB of overhead
12739}
12740
12741#ifdef STB_DEBUG
12742#define stb__smemset(a,b,c) memset((void *) a, b, c)
12743#elif defined(STB_FASTMALLOC_INIT)
12744#define stb__smemset(a,b,c) memset((void *) a, b, c)
12745#else
12746#define stb__smemset(a,b,c)
12747#endif
12748void *stb_smalloc(size_t sz)
12749{
12750 stb__span *s;
12751 if (sz == 0) return NULL;
12752 if (stb__size_for_class[1] == 0) stb__init_sizeclass();
12753 if (sz > STB__MAX_SMALL_SIZE) {
12754 s = stb__alloc_span((sz + stb__page_size - 1) >> stb__page_shift);
12755 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
12756 s->list = 0;
12757 s->next = s->prev = NULL;
12758 s->allocations = -32767;
12759 stb__smemset(stb__page_address(s->start), 0xcd, (sz+3)&~3);
12760 return (void *) stb__page_address(s->start);
12761 } else {
12762 void *p;
12763 int c = stb__sizeclass(sz);
12764 s = stb__spanlist[256+c];
12765 if (!s || !s->first_free)
12766 s = stb__get_nonempty_sizeclass(c);
12767 if (s == NULL) return NULL;
12768 p = s->first_free;
12769 s->first_free = * (void **) p;
12770 ++s->allocations;
12771 stb__smemset(p,0xcd, sz);
12772 return p;
12773 }
12774}
12775
12776int stb_ssize(void *p)
12777{
12778 stb__span *s;
12779 if (p == NULL) return 0;
12780 s = stb__span_for_page[stb__page_number((stb_uint) p) - stb__firstpage];
12781 if (s->list >= 256) {
12782 return stb__size_for_class[s->list - 256];
12783 } else {
12784 assert(s->list == 0);
12785 return s->len << stb__page_shift;
12786 }
12787}
12788
12789void stb_sfree(void *p)
12790{
12791 stb__span *s;
12792 if (p == NULL) return;
12793 s = stb__span_for_page[stb__page_number((stb_uint) p) - stb__firstpage];
12794 if (s->list >= 256) {
12795 stb__smemset(p, 0xfe, stb__size_for_class[s->list-256]);
12796 * (void **) p = s->first_free;
12797 s->first_free = p;
12798 if (--s->allocations == 0) {
12799 stb__spanlist_unlink(s);
12800 stb__free_span(s);
12801 }
12802 } else {
12803 assert(s->list == 0);
12804 stb__smemset(p, 0xfe, stb_ssize(p));
12805 stb__free_span(s);
12806 }
12807}
12808
12809void *stb_srealloc(void *p, size_t sz)
12810{
12811 size_t cur_size;
12812 if (p == NULL) return stb_smalloc(sz);
12813 if (sz == 0) { stb_sfree(p); return NULL; }
12814 cur_size = stb_ssize(p);
12815 if (sz > cur_size || sz <= (cur_size >> 1)) {
12816 void *q;
12817 if (sz > cur_size && sz < (cur_size << 1)) sz = cur_size << 1;
12818 q = stb_smalloc(sz); if (q == NULL) return NULL;
12819 memcpy(q, p, sz < cur_size ? sz : cur_size);
12820 stb_sfree(p);
12821 return q;
12822 }
12823 return p;
12824}
12825
12826void *stb_scalloc(size_t n, size_t sz)
12827{
12828 void *p;
12829 if (n == 0 || sz == 0) return NULL;
12830 if (stb_log2_ceil(n) + stb_log2_ceil(n) >= 32) return NULL;
12831 p = stb_smalloc(n*sz);
12832 if (p) memset(p, 0, n*sz);
12833 return p;
12834}
12835
12836char *stb_sstrdup(char *s)
12837{
12838 int n = strlen(s);
12839 char *p = (char *) stb_smalloc(n+1);
12840 if (p) stb_p_strcpy_s(p,n+1,s);
12841 return p;
12842}
12843#endif // STB_DEFINE
12844
12845
12846
12848//
12849// Source code constants
12850//
12851// This is a trivial system to let you specify constants in source code,
12852// then while running you can change the constants.
12853//
12854// Note that you can't wrap the #defines, because we need to know their
12855// names. So we provide a pre-wrapped version without 'STB_' for convenience;
12856// to request it, #define STB_CONVENIENT_H, yielding:
12857// KI -- integer
12858// KU -- unsigned integer
12859// KF -- float
12860// KD -- double
12861// KS -- string constant
12862//
12863// Defaults to functioning in debug build, not in release builds.
12864// To force on, define STB_ALWAYS_H
12865
12866#ifdef STB_CONVENIENT_H
12867#define KI(x) STB_I(x)
12868#define KU(x) STB_UI(x)
12869#define KF(x) STB_F(x)
12870#define KD(x) STB_D(x)
12871#define KS(x) STB_S(x)
12872#endif
12873
12874STB_EXTERN void stb_source_path(char *str);
12875#ifdef STB_DEFINE
12876char *stb__source_path;
12877void stb_source_path(char *path)
12878{
12879 stb__source_path = path;
12880}
12881
12882char *stb__get_sourcefile_path(char *file)
12883{
12884 static char filebuf[512];
12885 if (stb__source_path) {
12886 stb_p_sprintf(filebuf stb_p_size(sizeof(filebuf)), "%s/%s", stb__source_path, file);
12887 if (stb_fexists(filebuf)) return filebuf;
12888 }
12889
12890 if (stb_fexists(file)) return file;
12891
12892 stb_p_sprintf(filebuf stb_p_size(sizeof(filebuf)), "../%s", file);
12893 if (!stb_fexists(filebuf)) return filebuf;
12894
12895 return file;
12896}
12897#endif
12898
12899#define STB_F(x) ((float) STB_H(x))
12900#define STB_UI(x) ((unsigned int) STB_I(x))
12901
12902#if !defined(STB_DEBUG) && !defined(STB_ALWAYS_H)
12903#define STB_D(x) ((double) (x))
12904#define STB_I(x) ((int) (x))
12905#define STB_S(x) ((char *) (x))
12906#else
12907#define STB_D(x) stb__double_constant(__FILE__, __LINE__-1, (x))
12908#define STB_I(x) stb__int_constant(__FILE__, __LINE__-1, (x))
12909#define STB_S(x) stb__string_constant(__FILE__, __LINE__-1, (x))
12910
12911STB_EXTERN double stb__double_constant(char *file, int line, double x);
12912STB_EXTERN int stb__int_constant(char *file, int line, int x);
12913STB_EXTERN char * stb__string_constant(char *file, int line, char *str);
12914
12915#ifdef STB_DEFINE
12916
12917enum
12918{
12919 STB__CTYPE_int,
12920 STB__CTYPE_uint,
12921 STB__CTYPE_float,
12922 STB__CTYPE_double,
12923 STB__CTYPE_string,
12924};
12925
12926typedef struct
12927{
12928 int line;
12929 int type;
12930 union {
12931 int ival;
12932 double dval;
12933 char *sval;
12934 };
12935} stb__Entry;
12936
12937typedef struct
12938{
12939 stb__Entry *entries;
12940 char *filename;
12941 time_t timestamp;
12942 char **file_data;
12943 int file_len;
12944 unsigned short *line_index;
12945} stb__FileEntry;
12946
12947static void stb__constant_parse(stb__FileEntry *f, int i)
12948{
12949 char *s;
12950 int n;
12951 if (!stb_arr_valid(f->entries, i)) return;
12952 n = f->entries[i].line;
12953 if (n >= f->file_len) return;
12954 s = f->file_data[n];
12955 switch (f->entries[i].type) {
12956 case STB__CTYPE_float:
12957 while (*s) {
12958 if (!strncmp(s, "STB_D(", 6)) { s+=6; goto matched_float; }
12959 if (!strncmp(s, "STB_F(", 6)) { s+=6; goto matched_float; }
12960 if (!strncmp(s, "KD(", 3)) { s+=3; goto matched_float; }
12961 if (!strncmp(s, "KF(", 3)) { s+=3; goto matched_float; }
12962 ++s;
12963 }
12964 break;
12965 matched_float:
12966 f->entries[i].dval = strtod(s, NULL);
12967 break;
12968 case STB__CTYPE_int:
12969 while (*s) {
12970 if (!strncmp(s, "STB_I(", 6)) { s+=6; goto matched_int; }
12971 if (!strncmp(s, "STB_UI(", 7)) { s+=7; goto matched_int; }
12972 if (!strncmp(s, "KI(", 3)) { s+=3; goto matched_int; }
12973 if (!strncmp(s, "KU(", 3)) { s+=3; goto matched_int; }
12974 ++s;
12975 }
12976 break;
12977 matched_int: {
12978 int neg=0;
12979 s = stb_skipwhite(s);
12980 while (*s == '-') { neg = !neg; s = stb_skipwhite(s+1); } // handle '- - 5', pointlessly
12981 if (s[0] == '0' && tolower(s[1]) == 'x')
12982 f->entries[i].ival = strtol(s, NULL, 16);
12983 else if (s[0] == '0')
12984 f->entries[i].ival = strtol(s, NULL, 8);
12985 else
12986 f->entries[i].ival = strtol(s, NULL, 10);
12987 if (neg) f->entries[i].ival = -f->entries[i].ival;
12988 break;
12989 }
12990 case STB__CTYPE_string:
12991 // @TODO
12992 break;
12993 }
12994}
12995
12996static stb_sdict *stb__constant_file_hash;
12997
12998stb__Entry *stb__constant_get_entry(char *filename, int line, int type)
12999{
13000 int i;
13001 stb__FileEntry *f;
13002 if (stb__constant_file_hash == NULL)
13003 stb__constant_file_hash = stb_sdict_new(STB_TRUE);
13004 f = (stb__FileEntry*) stb_sdict_get(stb__constant_file_hash, filename);
13005 if (f == NULL) {
13006 char *s = stb__get_sourcefile_path(filename);
13007 if (s == NULL || !stb_fexists(s)) return 0;
13008 f = (stb__FileEntry *) malloc(sizeof(*f));
13009 f->timestamp = stb_ftimestamp(s);
13010 f->file_data = stb_stringfile(s, &f->file_len);
13011 f->filename = stb_p_strdup(s); // cache the full path
13012 f->entries = NULL;
13013 f->line_index = 0;
13014 stb_arr_setlen(f->line_index, f->file_len);
13015 memset(f->line_index, 0xff, stb_arr_storage(f->line_index));
13016 } else {
13017 time_t t = stb_ftimestamp(f->filename);
13018 if (f->timestamp != t) {
13019 f->timestamp = t;
13020 free(f->file_data);
13021 f->file_data = stb_stringfile(f->filename, &f->file_len);
13022 stb_arr_setlen(f->line_index, f->file_len);
13023 for (i=0; i < stb_arr_len(f->entries); ++i)
13024 stb__constant_parse(f, i);
13025 }
13026 }
13027
13028 if (line >= f->file_len) return 0;
13029
13030 if (f->line_index[line] >= stb_arr_len(f->entries)) {
13031 // need a new entry
13032 int n = stb_arr_len(f->entries);
13033 stb__Entry e;
13034 e.line = line;
13035 if (line < f->file_len)
13036 f->line_index[line] = n;
13037 e.type = type;
13038 stb_arr_push(f->entries, e);
13039 stb__constant_parse(f, n);
13040 }
13041 return f->entries + f->line_index[line];
13042}
13043
13044double stb__double_constant(char *file, int line, double x)
13045{
13046 stb__Entry *e = stb__constant_get_entry(file, line, STB__CTYPE_float);
13047 if (!e) return x;
13048 return e->dval;
13049}
13050
13051int stb__int_constant(char *file, int line, int x)
13052{
13053 stb__Entry *e = stb__constant_get_entry(file, line, STB__CTYPE_int);
13054 if (!e) return x;
13055 return e->ival;
13056}
13057
13058char * stb__string_constant(char *file, int line, char *x)
13059{
13060 stb__Entry *e = stb__constant_get_entry(file, line, STB__CTYPE_string);
13061 if (!e) return x;
13062 return e->sval;
13063}
13064
13065#endif // STB_DEFINE
13066#endif // !STB_DEBUG && !STB_ALWAYS_H
13067
13068#undef STB_EXTERN
13069#endif // STB_INCLUDE_STB_H
13070
